review_title: The best service I have ever experienced
review_text: Forgot my phone in the taxi upon arrival. Shawati and Daryl made sure I had it back within 25 minutes after check-in. They were constantly calling to make sure my trip didn't get off to a bad start. What a service!!! In addition, it is a very nice hotel and very friendly staff

I had a pleasant 4 days 3 nights stay here. Upon checking in, I was checked in by Front desk staffs Natalie & Debbie. It was a smooth & quick process which was great! They were friendly too & helped me when I was not familiar of the area here.

Upon checking in, the room was clean & room cleaning was done daily by Housekeeping staff Riza. Amenities were topped up in my room automatically without mentioning to the staffs which is really nice.

Lastly during check-out, it was quick as you could place your key cards in the Express check-out box. Front desk staffs Daryl & Aiman were helpful with my requests when I had some enquiries.

The location is very centralized & train stations are closed by too! It was a relaxing trip here to Hotel G!

Hotel location is very convenient to travel around the city area. Train station is just 3mins walk away. Great shout out to front desk staff Debbie, Daryl, Aiman and Natalie! Always smiley and attentive to our request. Housekeeper Riza also ensure our rooms are comfy when we return at night. Great hospitality and make you feel like home!

review_title: Superb location of location & great service from the hotel staff
review_text: Hotel location are few steps to the bus stop and Bencoolen Mrt station Courteous  and very helpful staffs. Requests are met in quickest way possible . Staff Named LAM  made sure our room is clean. And in pristine condition . 5star service 🙌

review_title: Nice staff and quick solve prpblem
review_text:
After Check-in I found my room it same have the leaking water from toilet. I worried for make me fall and accidents happen. So, i request them change the room. Before that he ask maintenance staff for check and confirms it.
Lastly they change the room and upgrade to bigger room with complimentary red wine.

Awesome hotel and better staff! Very conveniently located just about a block away from multiple subway stations.

Special Thanks to Khin in housekeeping for keeping everything in order for me!

A BIG Shoutout to Sharan and Debbie for their excellent customer service.

Lastly, a big THANK YOU AND AWESOME JOB, to Daryl who took care of all of my needs when arriving early in the morning after a 33 hour trip to make it to Singapore. Daryl is the perfect example of how customers are always #1 while not losing sight that the hotel and its guests’ experience are the most important part of his job.

All in all, a bit small rooms but the staff makes it back two fold!

I will definitely stay at Hotel G next time I’m in Singapore.

Nice and clean, very comfy beds and great shower. Super close to MRT and Bugis street shopping. The hotel itself did not provide good cheap food options though, so you will need to head out to eat. I also feel bad for the drivers needing to drop people off up that hectic entry. Overall I would recommend this hotel

Nice hotel. Excellent staff especially Mr. Lam was super nice. Rooms are indeed relatively small, including bathroom but worth the price. Breakfast was also good. The best part is the location. You can easily walk to downtown from the hotel. Takes 25-30 min walk. Subway is 5 min. walking from the hotel.

review_title: ‘G’reat hotel in a good location, perfect for a couple of nights
review_text:
The room had everything you need, comfy bed, good WiFi connection and room to store your items. The rooms are perfectly clean and the staff very friendly and helpful even making genuine conversation, especially Lam (housekeeping team).
Located only a couple of minutes walk the MRT stations it was really easy to get around. I did t use any of the in-house restaurants or breakfast as there are so many good places to try nearby/across Singapore.

Room looks small but everything is enough. Amenities is sufficient and smell good. No musty smell no ant no insect is really important!
Water pressure is good and no restrict on hot water. There is no shower curtain or door so the floor and toilet bowl a bit wet after shower. But it will dry overnight, not a big question.
Sound insulation is acceptable, can’t hear noise at night. But I feel like the music playing in corridor is annoying in the morning and also can here sound of housekeeping making room upstair or neighbours.
Also the location is good, it nears two mrt stations ,bus station on the opposite side and can walk to bugis around 10 minutes.
There has a small centre where included famous ya kun kaya toast and dessert.
適合單人/情侶，房間細但用品齊，水壓好夠而且沒有限熱水
地點好，附近有兩個地鐵站和對面就有巴士站，也有24小時的 7-11，樓下有三家餐廳都通宵營業，不用怕沒食的
地理位置靠近大部分景點，去哪都方便
但不會很吵 聽不到沒有酒吧/汽車噪音

review_title: Amazing stay! Housekeeper Mr. Lam made our experience a 10/10!
review_text: We had a great stay in Hotel G and it was very clean and great location. On top of that the service was amazing. Our Housekeeper Mr. Lam was very friendly, helpful and nice. He gave us a beyond service. He gave us a room service right away when we requested. He communicated to us so friendly with warm heart. Thank you very much for your great service, Mr. Lam.

Thanks for my housekeeping RAS to take good care of my room everyday for my 18 days trip. I really appreciate that. Nice breakfast, and conveniently located. The room is clean, quiet. The air conditioning is nice

review_title: I highly commend Miao Jing for her warm service
review_text: I'm happy here. I highly commend Miao Jing for her warm service. First of all, the hotel is beautiful and I enjoy it very much. Then, the bed is so big and soft that I don't want to get up every morning. It's great here. If I ever come to this country again, I want to live here again.

Small but tastefully furnished. Well located.  Duty manager was highly attentive to a minor irregularity I encountered in the room and was fast to make good on the issue.  Impressive commitment to deliver on a high level of service.   👍
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_title: Good value hotel with a nice location
review_text:
Very efficient, comfortable and fairly priced hotel in a great location in Singapore.

The rooms are not the biggest but was especially fine for me travelling solo and only with a very small bag.

The few staff I met were all very helpful and the location is definitely a big plus. Easy walking distance from shopping areas and plenty of restaurants or bars in the immediate vicinitiy.

Hotel G is good located. It is close to the metro station Bencoolen. Breakfast could be better. Hotel staff is really friendly, especially Thi Thi our housekeeper was really nice! She made a great job!
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: Very Good Stay at Hotel G, the location is good & MRT station nearby. Many food around the hotel, especially thanks to the housekeeping Thi Thi. She always welcome us when we out and back to the hotel room. Definitely will stay hotel g when come to Singapore

The moment I entered the hotel, i was amazed at how fast they checked me in despite reaching earlier as I was tired. The room I chose was single bed but it is very clean and cosy. All the amenities that i need is there. The bed is so soft and comfortable that I sleep well for my 2nights stay. The housekeeper Thi Thi did a great job for maintaining the cleanliness. There are many eateries around hotel area which is convenient for me to just walk over. Pleasant stay as it is a quiet place. Will choose to stay here again in November business trip.

Great place to stay & food was amazing very close to MRT.  Most of the things including bar is inside hotel. Very welcoming staff house keeping yin yin kept the room cozy all the time. That’s 5* with cleanliness. Felt home great place over all

review_title: I commend the staff of Thi Thi
review_text: I came to Singapore for the first time and traveled alone. All the staff here are kind, too. In particular, Thi Thi employees are always smiling and clean up their rooms very neatly. When I run into the Thi Thi  employee, I feel like I made a new friend. I think it would be better if a Thi Thi employee works at a reception that is responsible for the hotel's image. If I go on a trip to Singapore next time, I really want to meet the Thi Thi employees again.

The housekeeping services were wonderful. Housekeeping Khin helped me a lot and all the hotel staff was extremely kind and gentle. I loved my stay here and recommend the experience to everyone. I’m glad I chose this hotel for my stay

Good: Room is clean and conformtable. Staffs are friendly. Have gym at level 3 so will very convenice for the person that has the habit of doing exercise.
Recommendation: Should have a wardobe in room as somebody will have many clothes.

Very clean, environment is very good, location is very convenient to other places, the staff is very nice! House keeper Miao Ting is very friendly! This is my 3rd trip stay in this hotel, I'm sure will stay again for next business trip!

Housekeeping khin is very good
Room is very clean and so kindly for she guset. Good service, she is friendly and so cute. When I need something She took good care of me. If I come back to this hotel I even let her take care of my room.

Small room but good interior clean ,got free iceGood location bar wine at first floor is oK Near MRT bencooleen  can walk form stunted city near library  international SGWill come again  next time will try Thai food it’s open 24 hour  and tim sum near by

Great location , great cleaning and view . Our housekeeping Khin had our rooms so nicely done . We stayed for 5 days . Would recommend to stay here . The receptionist were too helpful and supportive in all sense.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: Great hotel, always stay here. Excellent location, great food options. MRT stations nearby. Rooms are small and cosy, beds are great and now using a really nice brand shampoo/body wash. Staff are friendly and helpful

It’s a special  experience  during  check -in.Excellent  service, especially the staff name Howard, he really provides the amazing memories and services. It’s a relaxing place to stay here. Let’s visit!

Great location, near to the MRT. Restaurants are also all around, very convenient for both business and vacation purposes. Guest service and Housekeeping (Mr.Lam) delivered awesome services to us during our stay!

review_title: Way too expensive, unfair pricing and credit card policy, tiny rooms and seems to be a former garage. Avoid this place!
review_text: Pricing policy is unfair, it can be twice the price or more, as mentioned on Booking. Further, they quote and charge each room separately on your credit card. Finally, the rooms are very small and the reception is in the garage.. Avoid this place!!

Stay was great! Their cleaning staff are professional and keep things in great order - specially Thi Thi cleaned really well!

Hotel rooms are smaller, but it is high quality. Breakfast is fantastic.

review_title: Perfect hotel stay if planning for Singapore!!
review_text: I just loved the stay.  The hotel has the perfect location and amazing vibes. I must thank the pretty Thi Thi for making the stay super comfortable and looking after even the smallest of things needed.  Will visit back again soon. Highly recommended hotel.

Had a pleasant stay in the hotel. Smooth check in & check out. All staffs is friendly and polite especially the Front Desk staffs. Looking forward to stay here again in the future. Will surely recommend my friends and family.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: Very small room with limited facilities. eg. no fridge, shower above toilet, so toilet is mostly wet. No room space to walk. Hotel location is fantastic and close to everything.  Great food outlets nearby also.  Staff are friendly and a pleasure to deal with
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_title: Excellent hotel with great amenities and location
review_text: Excellent location, service is also top notch, very clean and comfortable. I appreciated the nice little details such as the boxed waters, mini fridge in room, emergency flash light, space under bed to store luggage, etc.

The Receiptionist name Aiman..
He's really kind.. polite n very helpful to us.. Thank you so much Aiman.. God bless you..

Hotel.. Very clean nice n strategic location
Hope will comeback n stay again at HOTEL G Spore..

review_title: Recommended hotel to stay in SG😁
review_text: The room is clean and need, the hotel service is really excellent, the price is affordable and for the staff name Aiman, he is really nice and welcoming person. Overall we really enjoyed our stay in this hotel😁

There’s a lot to like about Hotel G, the towels are fluffy, the bed’s comfortable, and the service is friendly and prompt. The housekeeping staff, Ras in particular, were very efficient and helpful. I even broke a glass by accident one evening and a staff member arrived pretty quickly with a vacuum cleaner to clear it up.

Some reviews have complained about noisy neighbours, but the only time we ever heard people outside our room was briefly in the corridor outside. Nobody was ever so noisy that we couldn’t sleep.

Space is at a premium in Singapore and Hotel G have done their best to make their rooms comfortable in a limited space. The bed in our room was against the window to maximise floor space, meaning one of us had to climb over the other to get to their side. Not an issue for us, but if your mobility limited it would be frustrating. The bathroom is small and the shower doesn’t quite wet the toilet, but it’s close. The sink is outside the bathroom, but not facing the bed so it didn’t feel like it was in the bedroom. Some people might not like that, it didn’t bother us.

Getting to hear from the airport is a breeze. Get off at Expo and get the DT line to Bencoolen. It’s a 2 minute walk from there.

There’s a lot to do, easy to get around on the super cheap buses, and the Fortune Centre across the road had some excellent food.

Overall a comfortable place to stay for a few night in Singapore and worth the price.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text:
Pros:
- soft bed
- decent location

Cons:
- The shower floods the entire bathroom every time the shower is on for more than 15 seconds because the floor is not sloped towards the drain and there’s nothing blocking the water. It becomes necessary to use all towels in the room to mop up the floor
- Bathroom and parts of hotel smell of mold or mildew
- Lots of noise from outside and inside. Strange popping noise from windows at random times often waking me up. Noisy AC (the hotel fixed this after complaining). Loud doors that slam shut ensure you wake up along with the first person on your floor.
- Air conditioning behaves strangely. I kept AC at 20 at all times but sometimes it would become very cold or hot over night

Service staff at reception were polite and efficient, and our room is always kept clean throughout our entire 1 week stay. Housekeeper is also really helpful and sweet :) thank you Miao Ting for always keeping our room clean.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: I've stayed at Hotel G for the second time and their pillows and the beddings are always the best and the fluffiest. Also, their interior is quite nice and subtle making our stay relaxing. Their housekeeper, Lam, who cleaned our room is also very kind and helpful. I only mentioned i want the rubbish to be cleared not realizing the bathroom needs cleaning as well but Lam took the initiative to clean it without me needing inform him. Thanks, Lam! Thanks, Hotel G for the comfiest stay ever!

review_title: G-hotel is a good place to stay
review_text: Nice hotel, in the centre nearby the metro. Everything was good especially Thi Thi, she did a very good job for cleaning our room. The hamburgers from restaurant 25 degrees were also very tasty. Go and taste it yourself

The location of this hotel is very convenient, with plenty of bus stops and subway stations nearby. Thank you to Housekeeping Lam for always making the room feel brand new with every cleaning. The only minor issue is that the waiting time for the elevator is slightly longer.

My pillows were clean and my room and toilet were very clean and organized. The attention of the housekeeper who cleans very well. Including the service of drinking water in the room is also very good.

Unfriendly staff in the restaurant. Even on asking for basic help they redirect to lobby.  Extremely small rooms, no swimming pool, no facilities provided, uncomfortable beds so you can't even sleep properly. So if travelling with family, please avoid this hotel.

Khin who cleaned the room was nice. The hotel staff was quite helpful and accommodating. Hotel is also located perfectly and very well connected to the city. Breakfast was great too with many vegetarian options

Very nice hotel, very well located, absolutely stylish, good breakfast, small rooms, but all you need, we liked it. We have been staying there three times, so very happy being at Hotel G. By the way: Extremely nice staff, thank you Thi Thi ;-)

Here is a good place to stay. The location is also good, downstairs has some bars and restaurants and it's just a 5 mins walk to the T. Mr. Lam, a great cleaning service. I deduct 1 star because the elevator was so confusing and slow.

I always go to hotel g for my business trips as it’s centrally located with food and transport nearby. I like that their bed is big and it comes with a comfortable desk next to it, since I have to work throughout the night. I also found that their breakfast spread is quite complete.  Anyway just wanted to give a shout out to Miao Jing, who was from the housekeeping crew.   I stayed for a week this time, and she kept the room spotlessly clean each everyday when I got back.   Am grateful for your hospitality ^_^

Staying in 1223 for 20 days. I would say I made a good choice. Hotel g really provides good service. HSKP Rena is always so friendly and supportive. She always kept smile and made me feel warm in this new country. Reception is also great 👍

review_title: Great stay with convenient location and clean room
review_text: We booked a "Good King" room, everything was very good. Location is brilliant, walkable from Bencoolen MRT station, lots of eateries nearby. I got a great "Book 2nights, stay 3 nights" deal from the hotel website, and this I thought was great value for money. Check-in and Check-out was both smooth, room was good, it seems they made very good use of the small room space, so everything we needed was there in the room, size is small which is normal in Singapore. House-keeping can be set to on-request which I thought was nice. Overall, we enjoyed our stay here, and would definitely return back if visiting Singapore again.   TIP: Book directly on the hotel website to get good deals.

Hotel G was always our number one choice! The service is beyond superb! The staff are so nice and approachable, Fifi (Front desk), Debbie (Front Desk) and Thi Thi (Room attendant) in particular, took very good care of us. We will definitely book this hotel again and surely recommend this to our friends and family who will visit Singapore.

Good hotel in a great location. Rooms are very small 15 square meters which is tiny.   Breakfast is adequate nice selection. Very functional hotel which is expensive for the size but Singapore generally is expensive everywhere. Hard to get hotels at a decent price.

We had stayed there for 5 days, though the rooms are small - this is what we get in most of the hotels in Singapore. From our arrival, people were very friendly - especially you know we are tourists to a new country. Must take a special name here - Mr.Daryl Goh, I feel he understood our nervousness as we arrived little early with 2 kids. He made us feel confortable, gave us early check in (which we were lucky, as it was subject to availability ). And the stay was confortable - they had maintained everything well, must say the daily maintenance person did a good job to make everything look fresh. Best wishes to the whole team. God bless. Dr. Alex India

review_title: Good value hotel in a good location
review_text: We enjoyed our stay at Hotel G. We were in a room on the top floor, which was good to have as we could here no outside or road noise from the room. The room is on the smaller side, but was big enough for the two of us. It was clean, quiet, and the beds were comfortable.  Location is good, with a good amount of places to eat nearby, and a couple of subway stations within 10 minutes walk. The staff were friendly and overall the hotel is good value for money.

wei xiong from reservations was outstanding. he helped setup drop off of supplies for my girlfriend's birthday. Daryl and Debbie from front desk was friendly and helpful in setting the room up.  Definitely return for another staycation soon

The bed was very comfortable, not too soft nor hard. Room small but good enough for me 1 person. Max 2 will still be fine but don’t expect much space. Though small all necessary amenities are provided for. The room is clean and the staff are very polite and efficient. I like the quaint set up of the hotel

Stayed with my family for 4 nights. We are vegetarian and the breakfast options for our diet were 'extremely limited' . Despite that, i am giving 5 star rating because of the housekeeping services, especially by Ras. She made our stay comfortable. very satisfied!

Great Experience and excellent workers. They are ready to assist and cooperate. They are supportive and the room service is awesome. Nice spacious rooms with great art and Gallery. The food isn't bad at all.

Repeated visit to Hotel G Singapore as location is great! Super accessible to great food.  Absolutely comfortable beds. Pillows are abit too thick this time. Service was also excellent from front desk staff Bella, Aiman & Nana. Thank you to the housekeeping team as well. Cant wait for the next stay!

review_title: Friendly staff and hotel surrounded by amenities
review_text: Friendly and helpful housekeeping staff (LAM) and good hotel location. Recommended for family vacation as it was near to lot of amenities within walking distance.  Con - hotel room abit small for Queen room.

review_title: A must stay hotel in Singapore
review_text: This hotel really go beyond my expectations. They have everything covered. First the hotel welcomes you with great smells just like 5 stars hotels did. The bed and pillows are really comfortable which will provide you a good night rest and we are refreshed the next day. Amenities are well provided with good shampoos and conditioner as well the hair dryer has the strongest blow in which will make you feel the treatment of a 5 stars, just this is in a mini and economical scale because the room size are smaller and retro feel. For restaurants and dining, there are fine Italian restaurant just below and also the 25 degree burger which makes perfect meal. Also, there are many local eateries nearby and this hotel has a perfect location in the middle of the city. Thank you Hotel G and

Hotel was busy when we visited. Slow waiting time for lift. However, we like the rooms. Front desk was friendly. Rooms were compact but cosy. Lastly, we will recommend our relatives coming here to stay at hotel G Singapore….

Hotel G is situated along middle road. Nice location with great local food around. Upon check in, we had several requests but was promptly assisted by Howard. Thank you for the hospitality and we will be back again.

Was there for a trip with my group of friends. Small but cosy hotel. Special thanks to Howard and his team for arranging rooms on the same level for us. We are very happy with his service. We will recommend this hotel to our friends coming to Singapore.

review_title: Great hotel in a great location just around Bugis Street
review_text: The hotel is centrally located and offers everything you need. The rooms are small but stylish and comfortable. The most important part of the experience was the hotel staff - everyone is so nice, professional and helpful. A special thanks to Gina from the retaurant who took such good care of us - btw the restaurant is awesome! :-)

I really love the style of the hotel. Modern,  simple and elegant. Staffs are always professional, especially Reena from HSKP. Always provide best service and kind help, which really makes my day!❤️❤️

Great service from the team. The room is clean, comfortable, and well-designed. Order the service, but cutlery is not provided, small things but I end up using the coffee spoon, which makes even more bites than the regular spoon.

review_title: Enjoyable stay with parents and kids
review_text: This is my 2nd stay in the hotel. We traveled 7 person, 2 elder and 2 kids on Jun 29 to 2 Jul 2023 (3 nights). Shower is perfect, bed and pillow are comfy and the room is clean and well maintained. There are western, Thai and Indian restos in the ground level. And many other restos in the nearby buildings.

review_title: A cozy super tiny room in the heart of the city
review_text: I stayed at Hotel G for 5 nights during a conference.  The room is super tiny but clean and very equipped with all toiletries. Due to the size of the room, it is good only for a single occupancy.  The breakfast is fine but you may get bored after a few days. Tips  1.  Daily cleaning is not default. In case you want your room cleaned every day, you have to inform the reception during check in. 2. The closest MRT is Bras basah which is also near department stores and eateries.

Lam, the housekeeping really keeps my room clean and fresh. I love the fact that he ensures I never get thirsty by always topping up fresh water in the room. Sheets and towels are always changed. Toilet always clean.

The staff gave me a free upgrade to a double room. The best bed and pillows of my trip around Asia so far which contributed my first full nights sleep of the whole trip. I would happily recommend Hotel G to anyone staying in Singapore.

review_title: Unbelievable experience at Hotel G Singapore
review_text: I sleep in this hotel for 3 night with my family and everything it’s perfect.The service is really good and the room very clean The style on this hotel very unique and modern Overall i like this hotel so much and hopefully want to comebacks again later.

review_title: Visited 2nd time after 3yrs, still the best choice
review_text: Visited here 3 yrs ago. Now, price goes up a lot the same as other hotels in Singapore.  Anyway, I still feel it is worth money and the best in this price range. Room is small but very well-designed. They are partnered with Metis amenity brand, love it.  I didn’t have breakfast this time as it is pricey to add up, but remember it was very nice back then. Downstair has a bar as well, cannot comment, but 10 steps walking away there are local Thai restaurant and Indian restaurant (24hrs).    Bencoolen is easy to travel to anywhere, but quiet and not crowded. If you like running, Fort Canning is open 24hrs, 5 mins running to, and a nice place to run up/downhill.

Today 23 Jun 2023 we staying at Hotel G which is near to Bugis area.  When I reached hotel reception and Mr Daryl who assist me to do check in l. He was very friendly guy and he was probably provided excellent service for me. So appreciated what he did for me. Besides that the Hotel G room interiors also very simple design and nice. I definitely have a great experience with Hotel G. Highly recommended.

review_title: Room is very clean n tidy .Housekeeping service by Ras is best she is so polite n kind person I give her 5 out 5 rating
review_text: The pillows n bed is most comfortable I ever slept on .Room is small but equipped with all facilities that's the best part.Housekeeping girl RAS is the best staff .she did job perfectly well done room is so clean n tidy .

review_title: Clean room, good location, but could be better!
review_text: The location is excellent — Bencoolen station is a short walk away and it’s a walk away from Bugis. Other interesting places to go are a few train rides away, too. There are lots of places to eat around the hotel.   The room was clean and new looking when we arrived. The hot water however wasn’t hot enough, and the room is quite small. There is also no bidet. The hotel doesn’t have a lobby and we had some difficulty locating where check in would be.   Lam was our housekeeper who we encountered when we asked for room service, and he worked quickly and efficiently. He was also friendly and personable.   This hotel is highly recommended for those who are traveling light and eager to discover places around Singapore while walking around.

Housekeeping Lam who in charge of level 15, he is really nice, helpful & responsible. We talked for a while when I was requesting new towel from him & he told me to look for him if I required anything & also asked me how was my stay here. Providing good service with right attitude 👍🏻  Hotel G location is really good & convenient. Walk for 5mins to reach MRT, 2 stops to Chinatown, 7mins walk to Bugis+ shopping mall, reception provides taxi service for us too.

review_title: Great place to sleep over😎 especially the pillow so good
review_text: We are handled by  Daryl, very nice fo staff.. Helpful information and very kind hearted.. Area is quite nice, many choices of food and walking distance to mrt  1st floor place to chill also reasonable price

Hotel was great, comfortable clean and everything we needed as a base for exploring this incredible city. Breakfast selection was good, the bar is great, best Singapore sling I had, and the staff were very friendly. Wouldn’t hesitate to stay here again. Thank you x

Very strategic location … very friendly staffs … very helpful housekeeping … very responsive housekeeping … very great breakfast … good experience staying here … will definitely come back again in the future …

been here for business. even the room is small but clean and nice. They have very nice bar downstairs. I met very nice reception who give me free early check in without extra charge. I'll definitely come back here if I have chance.

Great location in the Bencoolen area close to Little India. Fabulous bar. Hotel room on the small side, but everything you need is there. Took some choreography getting in and out of bed as two sides of the bed are against the wall. The shower is in the same room as the toilet so there is a constant wet floor. Good value for money and great for an overnight stay. Staff very helpful calling us taxis for the airport and even upgraded us to a larger king room. Breakfast was good and had the best hash browns I have ever eaten.

review_title: An Amazing 2 Days 1 Night Stay in Hotel G!
review_text: I had an amazing stay here at Hotel G & it makes me want to come back again!  During check-in, Front Desk staffs Daryl & Bella assisted me with my check-in. They were friendly & attention to detail as I needed some help around the area. Service was great!  The room was spacious enough for 2, room amenities were sufficient & the TV allows screen-mirroring which is really convenient as it allows me to watch videos & play some music when I am in the room but it only works with Andriod phones. The bed was huge as I booked the Greater King room which is totally recommended if you love a spacious room!  I ordered some take-aways from 25Degrees & the food was delicious! I had the 25D wings & other sides as well. Thank you staff Dinesh for his recommendations on what to order!  On the

This was our first trip to Singapore and we LOVED the Hotel G.  Great location - convenient to train and to things we wanted to do/see.  The bed was comfortable for us. We liked the compact efficient style of the room, we are minimal travelers, prefer that style and prefer to focus on being out of the room and exploring the city. The breakfast was AMAZING. I couldn't believe it. There were buffet stations of all kinds of styles of food and fabulous coffee plus big windows to look out at the street while eating. The breakfast really set tone for our day and we started off each day so happy. Liked the two levels of the restaurant, nice layout. The staff at the desk was super friendly to us. Also, it was spotless clean.  Convenient charging stations for phones in room, also a safe

Amazing stay! The vibe was chill, staff were extremely friendly and the rooms were very clean! Although the rooms are slightly compact as compared to other hotels (I already knew about this prior to staying as I did my homework and checked), the rooms are tastefully designed and totally sufficient and cosy!   For those who prefer a bigger room, you can opt for an upgrade at the reception for the Great or Greater rooms!   Thank you Shawati, Bella, Natalie, Aiman and Debbie for making this stay a memorable one! Will be back definitely!

Had a wonderful staycation with husband and baby at Hotel G. We entered the hotel from the street at Level 1 in the evening. Entrance was just in between Ginett and 25 Degrees restaurant. Since we have a stroller, we didn’t use the stairs (left side) to go to the lift lobby. Instead, we used the manual lift (right side).  Perfect for those having troubles with the stairs.  Front Desk staffs Natalie and Yvonne are friendly and check in was quick and easy.  We were assigned to a wheelchair friendly room and it is indeed spacious with a lowered bed. The staffs took the initiative to arrange for us a playpen and baby bath tub which is a kind gesture.  Not sure who cleaned the room but he/she definitely did a great job! My baby loves the playpen and the bed so much. He slept soundly

Room smelled of mold & impacted my breathing / sleeping. Effectively there is poor air circulation / humidity control in the hotel. Toilet lacks separation from the shower so it’s hard to avoid getting your clothing bottoms from getting wet.

It was a wonderful stay at this hotel, my wife and I enjoy every moment. The staff was amazing. The view was breathtaking. Thank you to the team for a safe and fun stay - Wishing you all a best work stay

review_title: Wonderful living experience in G hotel
review_text: I am self-guided tour from Taiwan ,this is my first time to be in SG.I saw this hotel got many like from  the internet, after living here .I can say it's High CP and great service, if you are single traveler. highly recommend you to stay here for few day, small room with all function.

review_title: Noisy room - lack of hotel lobby/somewhere to sit
review_text: The location of the hotel is good, it is walking distance between two MBT stations and close to the main sights we wanted to see. The room is  also clean and tidy as well.  The hotel is clean, however the rooms are so noisy! The first room, we were put next to the lift shaft so all day/night you can hear the lift clanging. We changed rooms after that.  The second room we were in was on a lower level and we could hear EVERYTHING in the room before us.  We didn't have the energy to change rooms again though as it would probably be the same issue again.  I didn't realise how important it was to have a social space until I got to this hotel. When your room doesn't have any seats, it's nice to be able to sit SOMEWHERE that isn't a bar/restaurant and this hotel doesn't have it. It

Hotel is clean, well maintained! Definitely will recommed to other friends. Service are good, check in fast. House keeping also very polite and fast service.  I will come back again for my next travelling.

lovely hotel and lovely service. excellent service from the housekeeper - syifa. they always change the bed cover and refill the water. such a nice hotel, even the room is quite small but like all the beautiful detail

Great location, walking distance from all main attractions, clean. cool merch (mugs, laundry bags). AC and mattress were perfect for great sleep and recovery  grateful to have Rasbhinder as our housekeeper

The stay felt luxurious to me. The cloud soft bed/pillows. The ambience. The entertainment interface on the TV. The space (I prefer a good distance from my bed to the bathroom). The rain shower. The boxed mineral water. The restaurants connected to the hotel were convenient and had a delectable selection of food (I would've liked to sample their menu if my stay was longer). Also, I had problems with my stay and the staff were kind and accommodating enough to arrange for my extension (three time requests!) at a good rate.   I rarely write reviews unless they're worth the recommendation.

review_title: Perfect location but our room was too compact for us
review_text: Our stay was split into 2 due to our trip to Malaysia.  First for a night followed by 6 nights second time.  Check in both times was quick & easy.  First time we had a wonderful & a very efficient receptionist Eiwie who checked us in & we were able to get an early complimentary check in.  Thank you Eiwie! My only concerns were that the rooms were very compact & there was no space to walk around the double bed.  My husband & I found that very difficult at our age therefore I have given 4 stars.   There were no closets therefore our 2nd stay of 6 days  was not so comfortable.  Not enough room for our big suitcases. Apart from that the hotel is well located & very clean.  Staff are polite & friendly.

review_title: We are coming back for sure G!
review_text: We stayed here for almost a week and really felt comfortable throughout the stay! Warm and friendly reception staff and housekeeping.  Rooms are tiny but cozy and comfortable. If you are staying with kids better to go for the greater room.  I’d booked our stay with breakfast and it was a good spread indeed.  Special thanks to Daryl for helping us till we boarded the taxi to airport. We are coming back soon 🙂

review_title: Great hotel and excellent location. Good value
review_text: Hotel G excellent location and room size was good in terms of size and comfort. The room facilities were clean and tidy.   Special thanks to Lam who cleaned our room brillianty each day. We stayed for week and Lam was friendly and made sure we had everything we needed to make our stay enjoyable. He really kept our room clean.

Average hotel, rooms are extremely small but clean. Expensive given that it does not have the perks of a larger hotel chain. Gym visits had to be booked, which was inconvenient and pointless if people didn’t show up. No work space in room, but silly free gift on check in.  Very much a tourist hotel and not for business travellers

review_title: Great value hotel in a convenient location.
review_text: Amazing location just minutes from Bencoolen MRT and easy to walk to many places of interest. Room was clean, bed large and mattress very comfortable. Although the room is compact it’s fine for one person. I liked the sink and mirror being in the room rather than the bathroom as meant that it wasn’t steamed up and hot from the shower when using it. The corridors/lift/reception area were a bit tired. Staff very friendly and helpful. Would’ve been great to have water stations in the hotel as the room sink is too shallow to re fill a bottle.

I really have a nice stay here for my solo trip.. Thanks Shawati to show me the room before I’m checkin which I would like I’m really stay in the safety room. 😆The hotel really clean and feel relax to stay. Lastly Thanks for the hotel allowed me to check in early even late.. Love 💕

review_title: GREAT EXPERIENCE STAY IN G HOTEL
review_text: Pleasant stay, we spent 2 nights here, the service was great and  amazing. Thanks Yvonne for the great customer services. The location is very strategic, i am sure will spend time in Hotel G very soon.

review_title: Hotel G was a great   experience
review_text: Nice  staff  "Nana" was  great  staff person. room  was clean, and the staff was very helpful  with  information. Great  water pressure, the smell of the  room was nice.  excellent mattresses  were very  comfortable. Nice  pillows.  Located  near  numerous  restaurants. TV shows  great  pictures.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: The location of the hotel is perfect (work experience with meetings in and out of downtown). The athmosphere is relaxing. A special thank you for Daryl and Fifi for their so valable assistance in day-to-day practical challenges, and for their kindness.

living in 16 floor, good view and clean room, bed is small but comfortable. simple decoration and very suitable for young generation. its more like a cool student accommodation. you can find anything just go down stair.

I am visit for business trip. Once I arrive, the reception area is too small for even for 10 persons. Only single sofa. No space for resting. Reception is not gentle and Not polite.
I checked 15:30 but room is not ready. Delay for 30 minutes. No phone call. I need to call back to check.

Not recommended.
I won't go back to this hotel anymore,

A modern hotel in Singapore.
We checked in late past mid-night & front desk was super friendly.
Beds & pillows were soft & incredibly comfortable.
Many places to see & eat within walking distance.
Love the interior decor & art details.
Price is affordable.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: I was attended to by Daryl. He was very friendly and attentive. The checkout out time is 10am if I’m not mistaken. He gave me a complimentary late checkout so that i could rest well as i only checked in at midnight which i appreciated very much. The hotel room is cute and quirky and complete with all the amenities. Bed is super comfy. The room size might be small for some but I’d definitely recommend it for couples or solo travellers. I can’t say much on transport as i had a friend drive me around. I did’t get to sample the breakfast as well as it was fasting month.  Overall I had a very enjoyable stay.

I love this cozy hotel , good location , near by city, when we check in our room got wifi connection issues, the staff here are very patient and help us to solve it🥰🥰 (served by a Chinese lady)  . Then the last day we met Fifi, she is very helpful and friendly , next time we will come to G hotel again.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_title: The people are very nice . Especially FiFi Daryl
review_text:
The room is to small , no closet as it is a boutique hotel. Open shower. It’s an experience. Places were walking distance and accessible.

Thanks to Daryl & FiFi for the great service. They recommended me to places.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_title: Near bugis area,nice location and staff
review_text: check in smooth and fast, Staff Fifi was helpul and nice. Hotel was clean and nice design, this is my 3rd times stay with Hotel G, love location, some food stall around also,mrt within 10minit, will be back soon.

The hotel is trendy and clean. Thanks Rena for housekeeping our messy room.   The hotel location is quite good. With tasty restaurants nearby.  Can access to mrt for 3 different lines within 15 minutes.

review_title: Wonderful hotel location and friendly staffs at Hotel G
review_text: We had a wonderful experience here. All staff members we had interacting with from the check- in to the cleaning staff were delightful and eager to help! Risa, the house keeper is so helpful. She is always ask and care if we need something. Thank you so much. When we come back to Singapore, we will always book Hotel G. And we will recommend to our friends. 🥰🧸✨️

review_title: Lam - The best house keeper in the world
review_text: The housekeeper, Lam, was genuinely one of the kindest I have ever met. He has made the trip exceptional for us and really went the extra mile. This man deserves a promotion/raise and has been the best thing about the hotel

Very comfortable, small rooms, but serviceable. Great location.  Staff were very friendly and accommodating. Unfortunately early check in was hard to get, but understandable given how busy they looked.

The staff RAS for house keeping was very helpful and kind. She guided us really well Thankyou so much for the kind gesture  A nice stay and comfortable. The room was super clean and all sorts of facilities were there. Thumbs up

review_title: Clean, efficient and ideally located at a great price.
review_text: Spartan, clean and ideally located boutique vibe hotel.  Perfect for one and a bit of a squeeze for two. The staff was friendly and helpful. In a place you want to be out and exploring, a clean comfortable room is the perfect fit. The shower/toilet is close quarters. Everything was compact and comforting. The location is perfect for walking to so many landmarks. And tons of great food just minutes away. A wonderful price point for clean, safe, haven to springboard into wonderful Singapore. Air conditioning at just the right temperature.

The room was really clean and neat, service provided was fabulous. Stayed for one night, didn’t explore much but the bed was comfortable and staffs were really nice  Special mentions to these few for making my stay a wonderful one:  daryl debbie bella howard  yvonne shawatti

Good aesthetic hotel. Convenient Well taken care of by staff daryl, debbie,  bella, howard.  Toilet is clean, room is sound proof. Good to know there is a restaurant just below the hotel and there is in house guests discounts.

review_title: Excellent service given by the front office staff
review_text: Had a staycation recently with my friends at hotel g and the service provided by front office staff are always consistent and good throughout my stay. They are very friendly and are willing to go extra miles for their guest!! will definitely come back again!! special mention to daryl, debbie, bella , howard, yvonne and shawatti for assisting me throughout my stay!!

Love the ambiance. Perferct for short stay. Check in was handled by Fifi was fast and efficient. Must visit again for next strip.   Room was cozy and clean. Not too big but good for single traveller. Wifi service is fast. Personal VPN usage is encouraged.

I had a warm welcome at the lobby from the manager Daryl. Check in was a breeze, and I was impressed by Daryl’s prompt service and warm smile.   The room is very cosy with the cove lighting and warm colours. The ceiling is high too, which really helps extend the space visually. I love the design of the room.   The bed is wonderfully good, I slept like a baby through the night.   Didn’t have time to check out the gym, but I hope to next time.  Thanks for the great stay :)

G Hotel is the modern and comfortable hotel among all the hotels that I stayed. The room is tidy,clean and modernist. The location of the hotel is at the centre of busy place,Bugis. I also would like to compliment to all the staffs in G Hotel, special mention to Daryl,Dayana,Bella and Howard. Thank you for your hospitality service.

The service was awesome! the staff greeted us very warmly and was very helpful. My boyfriend and I always choose Hotel G in sg! The hotel room is small but compact and cozy! everything you need is in the room and any other we need was just one call away to the front desk and they are very prompt with their service! during this stay, the staff named FiFi helped us smoothly with our check in and needs. Kudos to her! also, the location is accessible to many places too! really enjoyed the stay here all the time, we definitely will come back :)

Aiman is an amazing human being! He was really helpful and kind to me and my girlfriend. I would say this is the staff that hold 5 stars hotel level, no even staff in 5 stars hotel can’t compare not even those from st Regis or four season

review_title: Hotel G for a day use stopover
review_text: Hotel G was the best option for our 24 hour stop-over for linking flights out of Changi. The room we initially booked was very small so we opted to pay another $55 on top of the $185 for a bigger room. It was a durables room with 4 extra square meters of space. The alternative was to pay $140 dollars on top of the $185 for a suite. That would have been the better option. The disabled room has a very short double bed that is hard to access for one party. It has a shower head at a height for a wheelchair customer only and it has no black-out curtains. It is noisy too from wheels on hard surfaces with little sound damping.It has a really great restaurant /bistro downstairs with a really nice included breakfast. It dies not have a pool. Taxi access is good for a second floor entry.

Very unlike the photos you see on the internet. The room is very much smaller than the photos. Not much space for us to put our bags and things, only given one room card, when asked for another, we were told only one per room. Basin is clogged. Location is good though, plenty of food and drinks. Good for solo travel but still think it's too pricey for a small room. II will never stay here again. There are plenty of other hotels nearby.

180.00 a night for very small room and another 80 if u want to check in early.... That half the cost of a room to check in 5 hrs early  Atleast the ac works well but don't think it's worth the price  See pictures attached also will be doing a video on it

review_title: I'd go other hotels next time
review_text: The entire room only has 1 plug that is next to a small work desk, my husband and I had  to charge our phones, laptops, we also need to boil water, dry  hair, only 1 plug in the room is very inconvenient.  The room is tight, there's no space for opening two suitcases, no ironing facilities, no fridge, which is overall again inconvenient.   The staff are friendly and it's in the middle of many shops and the location is very centered.

The room is a little tight for us but good service from Thi Thi and Yin Yin.  I will be staying for a few more days and I’m sure everything will be fine. Front fest service was very good as well. Thank you Guys!

First time staying in hotel g. Room is nicer than hotels nearby. Will recommend for a short stay. Room is on a smaller side. Service from the front line staff make up for the shortfall. Nice hotel to recommend

nice and comfortable room. had breakfast for 3 days. food is of good quality but hope for more variety. apart from that, stay Is comfortable with friendly and helpful front desk staff. will recommend this hotel

2nd stay in hotel G Singapore! Tired the greater room this time round. Room is clean with helpful and cheerful front desk staff especially Aiman who assisted us with check in. Will recommend this hotel to my friends coming to Singapore

Staffs here are friendly and helpful. Even the housekeepers (especially Lam) are super helpful and polite too! Requests are attended after minutes and they always make sure my request is fulfilled.
Thanks!

review_title: The Khin chronicles of Hotel G!
review_text: We loved our stay at hotel G. The rooms are cozy but fun with friends! We stayed in a room with 2 single beds. We had clean towels and water every day! The standard of cleanliness is world class and the staff are super friendly and always happy to assist especially Khin!

Interesting design.... Location is amazing.... Staff are great.. .IN particular Ziwei, Bella and Aiman! Thanks for making this stay so relaxing..... Definitely come back here and would recommend to others...

My fiancé and I enjoyed our stay at Hotel G! The manager Daryl, who received us, was very accommodating and even upgraded our bed from Queen to King size when he found out we were engaged.

The room itself was very clean and spacious, very comfortable. All the room features were definitely up to par. I only hope that next time we stay over the water dispensers on each floor are available. But overall it was a pleasant experience.

At checkout, the concierge, Debbie, even helped us by booking a Grab car for us to the airport.

Thank you Hotel G!! Til next time! :)
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_title: Nice place for a short stay
review_text: Nice location, clean rooms and good restaurant. The large balcony in my upgraded room was a pleasant surprise. I do not have any hesitation in recommending this boutique hotel for short stays especially for single person, rooms bit smaller for double occupancy.

review_title: Hotel in a good location but very small room
review_text:
Very good location near downtown and Bugis Junction
But the hotel doesn’t have swimming pool
Hotel needs to improve its cleanliness, some hair are still in the room
Hotel room was very small for a 4 star hotel

review_title: We are very happy with this hotel.
review_text: We liked the hotel. It is small and cosy and adequate for us. Staff are very friendly and helpful. We asked for water and lotion and we were given more than we asked for. Room is small but nice and bed is very comfortable. Pillows were great! The shower is open to the toilet area and will get wet as Asian bathrooms go. Room service is as requested, whether to clean your room daily or not. This hotel's location is awesome. We walked everywhere. There is also a bar/eatery downstairs, and cheaper eats just round the corner.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: We always stat in G when we were in the city. Clean, pretty much has all the things you need. Nice breakfast, however after staying for 4 nights it’s kinda boring to have same breakfast every day. Our room was squeaky clean, kudos to Lam, the housekeeping guy. Definitely will be back.

Centrally located, it’s not the first time that I spend some night here. There are some good as well as not so good points to mention.   Good: Very comfortable and large bed (at least for my liking, I read some reviews complaining about “too tall” pillows, some other “too soft” mattress – which I didn’t find to be so). Tap drinking water – good enough for coffee or tea! Two USB direct charging stations, saves one socket for gadgets charging. Safe (in the bed frame), drawer style, easily accessible.   Not so good: the sink is extremely tiny, quite unpractical to wash the face. There is no fridge in the room. On arrival, just out of the lift, there was some smell of smoke in the hallway of the room floor (my room was a no-smoking one, so I suppose that at least all the floor (if

review_title: Personal Trip after three years of no travel
review_text: At check in we were met by Michelle the GM and Howard, Front Office Manager  who were  exceedingly courteous, welcoming  and helpful. I was helped to get started on my Apple Wallet as I did not know how to do it. The room is excellent, a request for extra water was fulfilled in a matter of minutes as was the changing of a bulb. We also had excellent service at breakfat with a big smile followed by delicious lunch at Ginette, Gayathiri and Azlina were exceedingly attentive and came back a few times to check on us. Food was great value and delicious  I also went back to ask for help with Grab, I am clearly technically challenged and appreciated Howard's time again  It really feels so nice to be in this big city and feel so comfortable and at home. I would love to come back again

I started and ended my trip in Singapore, so I stayed here and Hotel Mi (nearby) during my time here. Hotel G has aesthetic but lacks function, whereas Mi is the opposite. At Hotel G, you will find a bunch of hipster and trendy decor that makes it more of a boutique hotel feel, but, in all that decor, it loses some function. My top complaint is that they lock the thermostat. I think 22 C was the minimum you could go. I called and ask and the excuse I got was that it would cause the electricity to go out. I suspect the hotel is just being cheap. The other complaint is that all the pillows are massively high. Even for side sleepers, it's like putting your head on a skyscraper. If you call down, they will find you a normal pillow, but I'm not sure if they think their clientele are

Pros: We stayed at the level where the rooms are attended by Riza. The room is super well kept with minimal dust (except for the oft missed out TV's extendable arm) and truly deserves the SG clean certification. Even their phone is clean and normally hotels' desk phones are grimy. Definitely impressed and thank you Riza for doing up the room so well! Room is spacious enough for 2 petite people. Eateries everywhere around and super short distance from the famous Chinese and Indian temple, and a short distance away from Bugis Street. They do have a gym on lvl 3, but you'll need to book time slot as max 2 people can access at any one time.  Cons: We didn't like how one of the receptionist was super nice to the guest after us but treated us with impatience during check-in. The

I thought the hotel was too cool for my taste because of the industrial interiors but the style grew on me during my stay. I like how it practiced sustainability with its water, shower supplies and linens. The breakfast is bot a must have though, since the selection is limited and you can find restaurants and cafes around. I will consider this hotel if I have a chance to come back!

Third time around. Commin back for the third time says it all I think :-)  Athough the rooms are small they are cleverjy designed . Everything you need is there ,Even for a business trip where I need a small desk  to work .....

Good ambience good for food n very near MRT BENCOLEN so I will recommended to my friend and family also so I will come back to stay again. Keep up the good work. You hard to find another hotel like this again. It’s my second stay at the hotel G with my family. Thanks

review_title: I recommended for Solo trip only.
review_text: The Room is narrow but it is clean and fresh.  If you come solo just like me, it is suitable for you. If you are ming with your relationship it may be narrow. The place is situated at downtown and can go anywhere. The bar counter is very nice & hospitality.

We stayed in the good room queen which was a nice size for two people. I would recommend getting a bigger room if you have more luggages.   We really enjoyed our stay. The staff from reception to housekeeping were all very friendly and helpful. The location was very nice. It was close to MRT station. There was a lot of good food options in the area.

The location is excellent! The hotel is new and modern. The rooms are a bit small. The bathroom has no shower curtain, so it gets very wet after shower. Water would flow out to the bedroom after shower. Room attendant Thi Thi was very good and took care of our room very well. Service is good.

review_title: Good place to stay in singapore
review_text: Location was good, close to everywhere. Hotel room was relatively small for big travelers, but for couple like us, it’s a perfect place to stay. Check in process was quick. Room design was very unique and functional, yet still giving us some space to put our luggages.  Things to note : if you come here with your luggages by car, make sure the driver drops you at level 2. A little hassle to find , but that’s where the lobby is located. I saw some people arrived here by car and the driver dropped them at level 1 (at the restaurant). There are few steps of stairs to the elevator alley so I think it’ll be hard to carry the luggages up the stairs . Another thing to note, since this hotel goes green, instead of plastic water bottle, they give the water in milk box container. Love the

Good location ...nice brakefast....clean place .  Housekeeping staff  was great. Thank you Lam !    We found this hotel online.Reasonable  price .  At the beginning  room felt a bit   tiny, but we got used to it after first night.  This is Singapore ....

Very happy with my overall experience and stay. Staff was welcoming and helpful. Super fast check-in/check-our process. Excellent arrangement for drop on/off location and easily reached by taxi (compared to usual traffic in the area). Rooms are fresh, modern, original and clean

review_title: Amazing Stay, Definitely Will Come Back Again
review_text: We stayed just for 3 days 2 nights at Hotel G Singapore. This is our first trip to Singapore for my birthday and honeymoon getaway, so we had very tight schedule. After made booking, I directly sent email to the hotel reservation and requested to have early check in around 12-1 PM. At first they said early check in is subject to availability due to the hotel is expecting high arrival on 17th Feb. Then 2 days before our check in date, I sent again our early check in request via Agoda apps. I was very happy because my room finally ready earlier upon our arrival time at 1:30PM. We was assisted by the Nana-the reception upon arrival and departure, she did great job, our check in and check out progress was express, and no queue at all.  We booked for a Queen Bed Room, it's a very

Staff is helpful and the room is clean, surrounding got alot of food choice, recommended for those who are looking for chinese food, there is a street who full of steamboat and chinese food to be serve

Very Nice hotel to stay with. Room is cozy and clean. Location is very strategic. Lots of good food around and also places to go. Near mrt station and bus stop.   I will surely stay here again if visiting Singapore again.

review_title: Recommended for single or couple travelers
review_text: Although the room is super small but it is very comfortable and enough for both of us. Recommended for single or couple travelers.   Very near to 2 met stations. Lots of good food. Near shopping malls.

I will like to recommend housekeeper- Lam in taking pride in his work with great aptitude. Overall stay was pleasant and comfortable. Buffet breakfast spread is sufficient with tasty baked goods. Thank you, Hotel G.

The hotel location is excellent, near to the shopping area, and surrounded by a good food. They have a great staff, efficient check in, clean and neat room.   Hana the HK attendant is super friendly and generous she knows what she's doing. Smile everyday and passionly do her job every day!  Cheers, Corry

review_title: Mr aymen and lam and thinesh .make my stay enjoyable
review_text: Good place to stay good vibes and grwat housekeepers  ( LAM THINESH ) .i totally enjiy mu stay here and for sure i ll come back,lication great reception guy mr aymen was very helpful too and the weather.....................................

It's been awhile since we finally traveled and it's Singapore as our destination. The hotel is situated in Bencoolen street which is surrounded by art institutes with a short walking distance to the bus stops, subway and 15 minutes walk to the tip of Orchard road Singapore Plaza. The rooms were small as we tried queen size and later two single beds room but it was cosy and most important are the friendly and helpful staff. There is no pool or gym but there are two very popular expat restaurant and bar on the ground level. One serving italian, wine and wide selections while the other is a popular burger outlet. The price for the accomodation is average by Singapore hotel rates standard and is almost in the heart of the city. Stay healthy !

review_title: Water heater did not work at all.
review_text: Water heater did not work at all. Had to take cold shower in the middle of night. It was not helpful at all by the hotel staff. No room change was offered on the night. Since need to check out early tomorrow, ask for help to fix it before, but was offered to take shower in another room if it has not been fixed by then. Imagine to take shower at another room at 5am?!!!

The room is clean. But it’s so small it’s almost comical. My head and feet hit the wall at the head and foot of the bed. No wardrobe. No space luggage. A few hangers on the wall across from the shower with no curtain or glass. So while you’re not directly over the toilet you are very close to being so. This would be horrible for a couple or a family. Just enough space to change your mind. But it’s clean and kinda cute.

Lovely hotel and Daryl & Hema were so nice at reception - very accommodating of my reservation snafu. The room is nice and clean; I love the hip decor and the dream catcher. Also super convenient to have a bar and restaurant downstairs. Would recommend!

review_title: Perfect location to discover all the main attractions Singapore has to offer.
review_text: Location was perfect and quite easy to travel anywhere (MRT stations within 5 to 10 minutes walk, lots of buses nearby). The hotel is super clean, I really appreciated the Go Green policy (changing bed sheets or towels based on request). Staff was extremely friendly and professional. Breakfast was good with a nice selection of food. The room was functional and well equipped, beds were really comfortable and I had the longest sleep ever for a long time (or was that because of my daily 18km-walks? Lol). The restaurant was full every day for lunch or dinner, but didn’t go and eat there so I won’t judge, but looked really popular.  This is not really a big thing and I assume this is Singapore standard: the size of the room. however again, very functional with all amenities and we
Housekeeping Lam is doing great job and nice attitude, it’s really good services, I will look forward to come and visit hotel G again.

We stayed for 3 nights , it was great, really close to underground, 30 minutes walk to marina bay and gardens by the bay. The room was super clean, breakfast has lots of options. I whole heartedly recommend.  The gym is also good, there are a few machines, and at the ground floor there are plenty of restaurants and caffes

Good services and good location. Near MRT and many restaurants nearby. Walkable distance to shopping malls.  Nice decoration in the room, good for person to stay long or for business trip.  Overall - good for value. Will come back again. 👍👍👍👍

Got the Good Room for 7am to 7pm as my own house is not available for stay-in that day. Room is small but is very cozy, clean and comfortable for a good rest, some self-study and work. Basic toiletries are provided. In room dining is available as takeaway from the 2 restaurants (Ginett and 25 degree) below the hotel if you do not wish to dine out. Room is not very soundproof but good enough for WFH and a short nap. Bed is comfortable but pillow is a little high. Overall satisfied with my short stay here as basically what you need for a short stay is well provided. Location of hotel is good too as it is a 3 mins walk from Bencoolen MRT station. Duration is also sufficient for a day's work. Will definitely book here again if there is a need again.

Very clean and stylish rooms, loved the water in boxes and their claim to being green! Was disappointed with their standard 3pm check-in. Never in the world have I had check-in time exceed 2pm? I paid for breakfast but was not informed where to go, nor was it clear on the tv screen information. Would recommend this stay to anyone, but hotel procedures need improvement.

We found the rooms were extremely small and with the double bed in the corner, it meant climbing over each other.

The rooms are very modern, clean, kettle with coffee and tea, hairdryer, the bed was very comfortable and the hotel was quiet. The location was ok. Very close to little India and about 2km from China town. We walked everywhere but the bus service was supposed to be very good.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: The Hotel check is is fine but slow. The cup in our room was not cleaned and one of the towel smell. When we check in ,Our toilet bowl was not cleaned properly. Inform front desk however it take 4o minute for housekeeping to clean again the bath room

Read the positive reviews and decided to try the hotel by booking an initial 2 nights. I super love the sunshine service of Bella who showed me around plus comfortable environment that I extended my stay by a further 9 nights.

Am still presently a guest at the hotel and the service is truly what another reviewer described as a 4-star hotel but with 5-star service.

Special thanks and shout out to Yvonne, Daryl, Nana and also Diana & Tan from reservations who embody what excellent service mindset is. Their cheerfulness, attentiveness and helpfulness have made my stay to-date a very pleasant one.

As part of the hotel’s Green drive, guests need to request for Make Up Room when required which is great. I would like to commend Sheeba from housekeeping who greeted me warmly and checked with me if I wanted my room to be done when I bumped into her at the corridor. I thought it’s nice that on her own initiative, she decided to check with me even though a yes would have meant more work for her. 😜

The hotel is conveniently located with easy access to bus services and walking distance to MRT stations. There’s a wide variety of food places catering to different budgets and cuisine preferences around the hotel.

I’ve hosted a business meeting at Ginett, a bistro-style French restaurant and wine bar, based in the hotel. The food was great and it has a nice buzzing environment. Yet to try the hotel’s other restaurant, 25 degrees, a burger bar.

There is no swimming pool. There is a small chic looking gym. You can book a slot with the reception to use it.

As for room type, mine is Good Room Queen. It’s a compact comfy room.

Been recommending the hotel to family and friends.

Overall really happy with this hotel. It was super clean, staff were helpful and location is great. The boutiquey bar and work space on the bottom floor creates a great vibe. My  gripes  are that the room is smaller than shown in pictures. It was fine for my purposes but if you want to stay awhile and unpack it could be tricky.  Also internet was choppy but better in the bar.

Stayed here in transit from Australia to Ireland
Good value room
However room was small but was perfect for our needs -rest
Was allowed a complimentary late check out until 1pm
As our flight was late at night our cases were kept safe at hotel
Hotel is central and very near MTR stations
Would highly recommend
Book direct with hotel for best rates
Debbie and her colleagues on the front desk were superb.
Nothing was too much.
Would stay again definitely
Bravo
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_title: Bohemian, eclectic, fit-for-purpose hotel room, with a touch of Bay Area customer service
review_text: This is part of a hotel chain, so you would be surprised to know it keeps a unique style that I may call bohemian, eclectic, and well-planned for short stays. The space is carefully dimensioned to your necessities as it is expected you will make your stay in Singapore outside of your hotel room. My husband and I have a preference for windows, so if you are booking these rooms be thoughtful that spaces are engineered for your necessities not for spending time inside. Therefore my only request was to have windows and I was certainly happy about this - my small room had two! I was well impressed by the bathroom too - in other hotels. You will find that they keep no distance between the shower and your loo, this one has plenty for a tiny bathroom. Great views and decoration, amenities are top-notch, and my bed was fabulous. After a long haul on a North-South trip, we rested peacefully albeit in one of the bustling central regions in Singapore. I enjoyed. Be prepared for a distant customer service that reminded me of any Bay area trendy hotel - as cool as northern California to go with the air conditioner.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_title: Stylish hotel in a nice location
review_text: Cant count how many times ive stayed in this hotel. The room is clean and very stylish. Our houskeeping mr.lam very accommodating and friendly when I request for extra pillow, water and vanity kits. Definitely will come back! <3
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: Great experience, modern facilities, fantastic location in the vicinity of two MRT stations, friendly and helpful staff, reception is always available to help. Very clean housekeeping - credits to Lam and company

Great hotel with a good location. Friendly and helpful staff. Breakfast was diverse and yummy. Room was quite small but it was not a problem for us because we travelled with only hand luggage. The bar was also nice and cozy. Would recommend to everyone and will go there again if visiting Singapore.

Be ready to open your wallet if you want to stay in Singapore for a visit! My room was 300$ per night after a 67% discount! I was allowed to ask for a big bed but did deal whit separated  that an extra would a changed for the one I was suppose to have! Room is modern (A must with four stars) but very very small. The Bathroom is so little that the sink and mirror were placed outside of it! Maybe all the hotels are like that in the city where the spaces are rare?   However, Hotel G is nicely situated in downtown. Absolutely no danger to go out at night. You can walk to see what Singapore have to proposed. MRT (subway)  is eficient whit clear indications to find your way.

review_title: Great area and has all you need for a short stay
review_text: This hotel is modern and clean, with several dining options and friendly staff. I felt well taken care of here. The room itself is compact but that’s par for the course in Singapore. I didn’t really like how the sink was in the main room but I understand that they need to optimize space. Definitely check out the French restaurant attached to the hotel - it’s a great place to work as well as eat

I booked three rooms for three nights and we love this hotel. Great location - near Bencoolen and Rochor MRT station; lots of food choices nearby, and walking distance to shooping area (Bugis Junction and Plaza Singapura). The staffs are very helping, special thanks to Kalai who gave us early check in as compliment 👍👍

Excellent budget hotel set in a good area of Singapore - very close to the bus stop, MRT lines and little India. Most tourist attractions walkable in a maximum of 10-30mins  Hotel bar and restaurant full of locals and good vibe - food and drink ok.  Hawker Albert great for cheap eats and plenty other decent restaurants close by

in the middle of the city with lots of restaurants and shopping mals close by. The gym is great. Lam from house keeping did a great job too. We enjoyed our stay in this hotel and i can really reccomend it

If you are only staying in Singapore for a couple of nights this place is fantastic. If you are staying longer and Singapore is your primary vacation I would go ahead and splurge for a nicer hotel. The key here is VALUE. For what I paid and the short amount of time I was here it was an incredible value. I booked a Queen bed room. Although small it is fine for solo or couple. The bed & pillows were super comfortable. Rain shower had good pressure and consistent hot water. The room had blackout shades and I slept very well. I didn't use the gym or restaurant attached. The staff were very friendly. Can walk everywhere but a bit further to Marina Bay or Chinatown (only 10-15 min jog to Marina Bay which I recommend going around 6am to have it all to yourself). I highly recommend

Very good experience ~  Especially impressed by Lam’s housekeeping. Soon, clean and nice ! I think the hotel goes an extra mile to make customers feel at home. During the Christmas Day they also provided us with delicious and cute icecreams! Definitely a good experience!

I have wonderful experience staying at G hotel with my family. they’ve tried their best to make us comfortable. They love their jobs. thanks to Debbi and all house keeping teams they’re  love their job. Rooms are clean and well maintained, a bit troublesome if you want to pick up at hotel lobby due to their hotel entrance

Very impressed with the service level from the staffs in front counter, we checked in with ease and felt comfy to ask the questions and got very helpful information.  The room is well design and clean.  Near MRT and food center.

review_title: Perfect mix of price, service, hardware and location !
review_text: Cozy, stylish place that you ll love stay after a full day of intense business conference and crazy parties, the highly accessible location just makes the whole package even better Affordable fee but absolute 5 star services from super friendly and helpful staff  Special shout-out for my bro Daryl for being so professional in helping with everything i need during the stay

Room a bit small. No mini fridge(sad). The pressure of the door closed from other rooms pretty scary, i got a shock it was so loud and the walls in my room shakes. Hahaha. Othe than that, i took a bath and the water flows out of the bathroom(refer to the photo attached).  On top of that, friendly staffs, called housekeeping due to the mini floods in the room from the shower. I will like to compliment housekeeping Lam who attended the room service, he cleaned the waters, put extra towelsss on the floor to prevent the water to flow out again, he is also very friendly. Good job!!

Satisfied by the great service provided by friendly staffs. Lam was very helpful. The hotel is located in the city Center with lots of restaurants around, fair price is also just around the corner. Recommended

I was pleasantly surprised with the hotel and our room. Wasn’t sure what to expect really, but the only downside is the room is small. However, it was enough room for my wife and I, and the big King sized bed, great shower, clean modern room, and location is all very great.   If you’re on the fence, book it. It’s a great hotel for this price range.   Pro tips: - Fortune Centre across the street has some really great little hidden hawker stalls, especially the one on the 3rd floor we ate at (forget the name but it was busy and delicious). Also the dumpling guy hidden at the back of the 2nd floor had delicious dumplings…15 for $4! Do yourself a favour and wander around all the levels and pick a spot for cheap eats.  -If you’re craving a burger the burger bar downstairs has really

very  small  location is good  cleanvxclkV:DKf;k"SDKfl;skldksflkf;sdls'fldkgkkfdlf lgkgeotwr03awitoea'dljtergiui3t0[pikelfdklzfkdflkzdf'lkgdf ge'lsdml;sgd.,k'l;k'kkl;k;lk;lkp]of]seotktepoetop4\e[pt][erot][pert][ertp

Hotel great location, breakfast could be better but my room was kept really clean by the housekeeper Lam - thank you Lam .   The rooms are small but comfy bed and good shower.   Good gym but need to bring own towel and water Breakfast is on two levels so can easily miss items as the staff don’t inform you  Will stay again

My Neighbour is noisy .I feedback to front desk however the room beside me still noisy.They were watching football Noise from 11pm to 3am  When I ask late check out till 3 pm and it was declined.Even I informed them about the noise. No sympathy from the front desk

I stayed at Hotel G for a few days and was checked in by Matthew at the front desk. He gave such warm, friendly, kind, and patient assistance, which I have never experienced at a hotel before! He helped me figure out where the best restaurants in Singapore are and even recommended a fun music festival to attend! Thanks to his assistance and recommendations, he helped me make my time in Singapore so memorable. For that, I will always be grateful for him! Hotel G provided a very comfortable and safe accommodation. I was thrilled with everything and couldn’t recommend this experience enough!
