Nice clean, quirky hotel, great location, good food and bar, nothing negative to say except lifts are slow (but one out of three was out of order during my stay)and personal preference but I love a swimming pool and unfortunately there is not one here.......................

A good place to stay in Singapore close to subway station and many visiting attractions I d definitely love to stay at this hotel again. The restaurant on the first floor is also good. I totally recommend this place.

From the time we got to the hotel till the time we left the staff were very helpful and polite. The rooms were what we expected they weren't the biggest we had been in but they were clean an tidy .the bed was huge could have done with a bit more storage. The tv was great with some English channels. The phone in the room was good it allowed us to phone australia at no cost .we had tea and coffee in the room with a kettle.they also have the same plugs as us 3 pin. Location was excellent very near the town centre. Enjoyed my stay hear .will use this hotel again if we come back. Thanks all at hotel G dazza and Judy

It's the wonderful experience. The air-conditioner does very well. The receptionist was very kindly and smart. Hotel's location is very good, and near to Ya Kun Kaya Toast. Next time I go to Singapore, Hetel G is always my choice.

I didn't expect the room to so cosy but it was very comfy and stylish.Had some issues opening the suitcase due to the small space but awesome design.Good breakfast (I'm a sweet brekky person so can't say about savoury),

Stylish deco and staff are friendly. Rooms are rather small so if you won't be spending a lot of time in your room,  it's perfectly fine. Great location and prices are reasonable. Didn't have a chance to eat at the restaurant but it's always busy so food should be good.

review_title: Reasonably priced hotel that meets expectations
review_text: Every amenity you could want. Reasonable priced rooms (for Singapore). Throughly enjoyed my stay. Rooms are small but have everything needed. Breakfast is modestly priced and meets expectations for a buffet. Has two bars which are open very late by Singapore standards. Will stay again.

Overall is good. Hotel look new, clean and near to MRT, shopping mall, market, food court, india temple, chinese temple, restaurant & etc... Just the hotel lift too slow and hotel staffs not friendly.

review_title: Lovely hotel but short fall service in some area
review_text: My wife has planned for her birthday trip over 6 months and she preferred to visit Singapore rather than other countries and she hand picked Hotel G by herself beside few other hotels by the riverside which I let her made a decision.  If you want to stay at Hotel G, you have to understand that there is no fridgr in the guest room but common fridge on level 2 of the hotel. However, they provided water cooler and ice machine on every gueat floor which can make up on this and the other thing we booked a Deluxe Room which the room is tiny, no sofa and no space for luggage lack but they design all built-in furniture to extend their maximum for guest usage in the room.   I do like the water pressure in the bathroom is extremly strong and the hair dryer is super strong blow power,

When we arrived at 530pm to check in, our room was not ready. They made us look up the email with the booking because I assume they had lost it. Check in is meant to be at 2pm. If we had asked for a late check out they would charge us so therefore I don’t expect to turn up well past check in time and not be allowed into our overpriced room.   The majority of staff were pleasant, apart from one rude waitress that works at breakfast. She was sour and bitter when approached for assistance.  This hotel in my opinion is overpriced and overrated. Compared to other 4 star hotels this place does not match up.   I’d advise that if you stay here, to choose a room on a lower level as the lifts take a very long time!   Location and air conditioning in the room is good.

Wonderful looking rooms with nice view. Rhe bed was perfect and the shampoo smelled great too. Would recommend 100% to friends and family. Easy accessible by taxi from the airport. Got a welcome drink which is always a plus!

I can go sleep easily cause I don’t hear any noise from outside. And all of the staff can give us useful and timely help.Its location is convenient to take the MRT and it’s near marina bay. So I will advise my friends who haven’t been Singapore try to live in.

One of the best recommendations due to pricelevel you could get at the moment in Singapore. The area is perfect for a city trip, all needed requirements are in the room, the bar is also perfect and the offered lunch and dinner was ideal

It’s for a study trip in Singapore. But if check-in located on 1st floor will be better. We have to carry our big luggage and walk up with stairs and lift is super slower. Wait for long time to get in and out.

I can understand Singapore is very small, so my room is totally fine to be small. However, the shower room and toilet are connected together and only use a curtain to separate. It cause the toilet become very wet after showering. Second, the front desk staff was not really well-educated. If your hotel have service corporation with shuttle bus to airport, your staff should tell the customers where to wait for the bus. I was waiting for my shuttle bus on time but because I didn’t know where to wait leading to miss the bus.

Been a repeating customer for this Hotel. Room is Comfortable. Hotel provides not hotel ordinary toiletries, which I personally love a lot. Location is good. Walking distance to Bugis and easily get Taxi/Grab service. Friendly front line staff.

Very small rooms,no value for money,no good service and tragic facilities.The location is in a very good area and breakfast is not bad I would say.All the rest are really tragin and its too expensive for the offered facilities.There is no space even to move in the room and bed is 1 meter away from the toilet.Next time I prefer to pay double to another hotel and not stay ever again there.

The room was extraordinarily small, much smaller the the picture displayed.  The shower was adequate without proper pitch so the entire floor got wet.  There was so little counter space that a brush or toothbrush would fall on the floor when placed next to the sink.  There is a bonus stoop to perch on in the corner near the platform bed.   The bed is difficult to maneuver around as one needs to jump over your partner to access the toilet.  Very little space is available to walk. Since we stored a suitcase in the hall leading to the door we had to negotiate our way around it to access the door.  What this placed lacked in room space it made up for in service and adjacent restaurants.  Very nice breakfast each day in Ginett and lunch at 25 degrees restaurant was very good.  They

With good location and convenient to MRT station. But a bit disappointment about room facilities which bathing area do have have blockage to avoid water spreading. An theirs is no small fridge inside the bedroom. You can't buy cold drinks to store.

The hotel is a great place to rest your weary travelling head. What it lacks in size makes up for the room amenities. The room itself is thoughtfully designed to suit a traveller’s need. The room we had was a hip and industrial microhotel room that can sleep 2 people comfortable. The breakfast buffet had plenty of choices. Good place to stay in the midtown area.

Small room but pleasant location, bathroom can be improved.Hand wash basin placed outside the bathroom is too small and the water pressure is quite low. Good for couples but average for family, overall pleasant stay.

This hotel should serve as a model for other space limited accommodation providers. At every turn there is a unique and quirky thing waiting to discover. The "G"'s on the lift door, the cork board in the room, the drinks near the left... they are all brilliant additions to a hotel that ranks among the best value I have ever stayed in.  One evening the internet failed. The staff were incredible in their response, the manager even offering me his computer! The issue was fixed fast with a temporary work around in place. I don't think you can offer more than that!  Yeah, I know what you're thinking... this is a fake review. NO it is genuine, for a genuinely good place. We will definitely be back. Not only because of Singapore, but also for the pleasure of staying at Hotel G.  Thanks

Room is small but Clean and confortable to stay ! But the shower room is quite small ! With nice location, Close to the MRT station ! Many restaurants and supermarket nearby! We had a nice experience to stay !

I spent my last few days in Singapore by myself and Hotel G was perfectly located close to Bugis; I was very close to the shopping district and MRT station. It was easy to travel to Orchard, Tiong Bahru and Raffles (to name a few places) to meet friends and family. One of my favourite aspects was getting a quick breakfast at Toast Box or Ya Kun Kaya Toast near by before exploring the rest of the day. My room was spotless, had great air conditioning and I loved how comfy the bed is! I was unsure what to expect for the solo room as photos can be deceiving, however it exceeded my expectation. The staff are friendly and accommodating, especially helping store my friend's luggage at their hotel before they left that evening even though they were not guests. I highly enjoyed my staff

Room size is average with full accommodation. Hotel location seem a bit far from MRT station but able to call a Taxi. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Breakfast in Hotel is standard. Elevator is not enough for passengers.

Although Hotel G is in a nice area of Singapore near to many places of interest and reasonably priced, the rooms are small and poorly laid out.  We arrived early in the morning and "upgraded" for an extra $20/night.  I hate to think what our originally booked room would be like.  There was no closet and no place to put the luggage other than on the floor which made the room even more cramped. The worst of it however was that the bed is on a platform about 15 inches off the floor with virtually no clearance at the end of the bed. This is really awkward in terms of getting out of bed to go to the bathroom during the night as it is almost impossible not to disturb the other person in the bed.  Not recommended for older people especially with limited mobility.  The room was clean

We were there for 1 week. One of the 3 elevators was under maintainence for the whole time.  So everytime to go out in rush hours is a 10 min wait to go up or go down. A room service guy said they have to climb stairs at time. But i never seen any maintenance people working.  To stop 1 elevator and has a very slow 2 other ones  is very ignoring.

Room was comfortable, room amenities were nice and staff was helpful and friendly.The A/c system in my room was hard to control, usually set very cold and could not warm up my room. Elevators take WAY too long, 1 elevator was out of service but I was there for 4 days and it was not fixed, so this might be the case ongoing, it do not seem to be getting service. Lobby was packed, especially during checkout making it a slow process. Entry and exit from the building was inconvenient as you need to enter/exit through the restaurant. Speaking of the restaurant, while the breakfast was good with many options, the layout of the restaurant for the breakfast time was poorly thought out often leading to long lines waiting for coffee or access to a certain food, and not enough tables at

The hotel was beautifully clean and had everything we needed. Location is close to bars, restaurants and tourist sights in Singapore. Front desk were always able to organise taxis for us. Very enjoyable stay.

Was glad that room was new and clean although slightly small. Plus point was that there was a water dispenser in the corridor near the lifts, something that I think every hotel should have because it's so basic but yet valuable to guests.

For our first experience in Singapore, it was a very good experience. The location is good, rooms are very clean, but small, ok for one Night. We had a good quality of sleep, Breakfast was good and various. Staff was very helpful and kind. It was a very good experience, most probably we will recommend your hotel and we will come again.

The breakfast is good, the room is unique, and really good people. The service is amazing, I will definitely come back to this hotel. Area is need with bus stop and easy to reach orchard. Should come here.

The front desk staff was very polite and the luke staff was very good. I stayed at the hotel in 2017. At that time, the restaurant staff at the breakfast table, a young man wearing glasses and a girl wearing glasses, were also very polite. When you enter the restaurant for breakfast, you will say morning, then ask the room number. It is a warm welcome to treat you as a hotel guest. The current restaurant staff is cold, and it is obviously not enthusiastic to ask your room number directly. The hotel is conveniently located and the breakfast is very good

The second stay here in a short time and the staff were friendly and very helpful throughout. the environment is very relaxing and well located to easily get around to the big sites.I would only ask for an early check in but even this was well handled with baggage storage and taxis obtained, quite unrealistic given the number of people who must be moving through on a daily basis.

My husband and I arrived at the hotel to find reception staff that lacked friendliness. Their lack of compassion to people not familiar with Singapore left a bitter taste in our mouth. However, we also noticed that the local people are not the friendliest.

Nicely located to some of the best foods and shopping around the hotel area. Hotel got a cool restaurant and bar plus not forgetting the awesome staff both front and back of the house. Definitely gonna come back again!

Grreat atmosphere, decor and facilities. Both restuarants are excellent, really good value and great food.The only big downside was how long you had to wait for lifts up or down. That plus a bit of noise came into the room from the corridor.

The hotel is good overall; excellent location with a lot of eateries and close proximity to the MTR. The standard room is small but quite functional, however I did not like the fact that in the tiny bathroom the toilet and the shower are more or less “combined”! The staff are very helpful, and there are very good restaurants as part of the hotel.

We stayed at Hotel G for nine nights with our little 5 months old daughter. The room was so lovely, everything in the hotel is very nice. The rooms are small, but that doesn’t matter, enough place even for a couple with baby. The metro is so close, so you can reach everything very fast. We would stay there again.

review_title: A great hotel I have never seem in Singapore
review_text: Although the room is not large but the things in the room is full range of, and the food was so delicious. Last the employees there was so friendly to solve our problems. It's a nice choice to live in G hotel when everyone goes to Singapore to play.

I really appreciated the early check-in at noon-ish. The receptionist was very professional. The room was cozy and bed was very comfortable. Ambience very chic. I booked the queen bedroom, so actually just enough space for one person. The housekeeping staff I encountered in the hallways were friendly. There is a nice bar/restaurant on the first floor. Breakfast buffet was average, and the wait staff didn't seem like they wanted to be there. There was one lift out of three under maintenance, but it wasn't such a big issue; just go before peak times at breakfast and check-in/check-out. Location was very convenient for my 30-min Grab ride to the airport.

Everything's good except the rooms are very small and only have an "open wardrobe". Not recommended to bring large-sized luggages. Would also not recommend for 2 or more persons imo since the space is kinda cramped, although I'm not really sure if they offer larger spaces. For reference, my room is about 4 queen-sized beds placed side by side.

Beautiful and clean city. Nice to visit Marina bay gardens. My wife loved to walk in the malls. Also good food in the restaurants. The jump on/off guided bus tour in Singapore town was an experience. Easy to get taxi whenever needed, short waiting time, and fearly low price.

Great hotel, central, very comfy beds, rooms small and no wardrobe, just limited hanging space and no drawers so need to live from suitcase which again has limited space to store  in room. This would be my only criticism as we liked everything else.

Seriously it's 2019. Rooms should have temperature control that can be set above 23 degrees. What kind of system do they have? It's not comfortable or environmentally friendly. Otherwise the rooms are clean and the beds very comfortable. This would be a good place if I were a polar bear....

review_title: Small room but big heart staff
review_text: As i check in the reception informed me that my booking comes with breakfast. I acknowledged but informed him that i will be catching an early flight thus leaving at 4am. The next day when i check out, they have prepared a take away breakfast pack for me. How thoughtful...

awesome stay. great high quality and ambience in breakfast and evening bar wine bistro..great for visiting city atractions. 1 block away from bencoleen subway station. clean gym and rooms. hard working staff.

review_title: Good if you just want somewhere conveniently located to sleep
review_text: The rooms are compact , just enough for the bed and a toilet/shower. However, they have made good use of the space - the safe is under the bed and the toilet is in the shower - and the rooms are clean so it is fine if all you want to do is sleep in the room. The location is also convenient. The hotel is only 200m from the Bencoolen MRT so it is easy to go elsewhere in the city if you want although there are several restaurants and bars in the vicinity.

Good hotel and fast check in on reception. Room was good for 1 person, 2 person may a bit too small and bed was clean and comfy even wifi was strong. Breakfast was good and few selection choice to choose. For the lift in the hotel need to improve and when is crowded was slow and have to wait for long time for that. Overall was excellent.

We enjoyed our stay at Hotel G, the staff were very friendly and helpful and addressed a couple of issues we had quickly. The rooms are a bit on the cosy side, perhaps the bathrooms lack a bit of privacy. The lifts are an iconic reality of the building everyone just gets used to. The breakfast was superand bar was fantastic..

review_title: Very good place to stay for a business visit
review_text: The hotel has clean, cozy and well appointed rooms. It is a five minute walk to two MRT stations. So it is very easy to get around the city. There are plenty of restaurants, cafes and shopping nearby. The service is also very good.

Location is good and close to multiple subway station. And Service are good. Staffs are friendly. Breakfast can be taken at 1 st floor which is like open cafe. But one complaint is that elevator is always crowded and felt some stress always.

review_title: Always very good, sometimes excellent. Gym equipment currently broken.
review_text: I've stayed at Hotel G many times now and the rooms are always neat and clean, with beds and pillows comfortable and noise low. However, some of the rooms can be a little too small to feel truly comfortable. The downstairs restaurant and burger joint are excellent though - do take advantage of the house wines that are excellent value. One recent let down though is the gym, with several pieces of equipment not working and needing repair.

review_title: Fancy on the outside, mouldy and noisy on the inside
review_text: The staff was very friendly and the restaurants on first floor are nice and fancy. Unfortunately the room is very bad. The room (tiny) had a mouldy smell. No wonder as the air condition vent was covered with mould. Also parts of the wooden doorframe. But they don't seem to care.Also whenever the wind was blowing outside there was a loud banging noise. Apparently parts of the outer wall are loose. Woke up several times because of that. Would definitely not go back.

For our first experience in Singapore, it was a very good experience, the location is good, not far from Hop on - Hop station and other buses station, rooms are very clean and we had a very good quality of sleep, but very small (at least, comparing with other experiences around the world). Breakfast was good and various (maybe more fruits?).Staff was, generally, helpful and kind, some improvements could be done on the restaurant (some of them are not very happy serving clients). Anyway, generally, it was a very good experience, most probably we will recommend your hotel and we will come again.

Comfortable stay in a good location. Near to food court.Nice wine bar at the premises with friendly staff. Clean room. Room was a bit cold even after adjusting the temperature. Expedient check in. Should offer f & b vouchers for frequent guests

Service is bad and no complimentary car parking at all. Each hour is $2. And the lifts are slow to the max. Service staff is not compassionate enough and just out to catch guests in order to penalise them at s$300. Don't be fooled by this property.

Quite, small room but functional, you don't feel uncomfortable at all. I would highly recommend. It is also very close to MRT station, and close to Bugis district where is the place for food, shopping and etc.

review_title: No very good value for money
review_text: Room very poor and very small.Breakfast acceptable but need to be improve. People quite friendly.Location in a good area and easy to go to all directions.  Probably I will not recommend this hotel to friends..

The hotel is located conveniently near tge city centre, even though not immediately adjacent to MTR. Good overall conditions, good breakfast. However, one must be warned about tiny size of standard rooms (a bed alone occupies almost all the room). This did not bother us during our two-night stay but for longer stays such "tininess" may be not so nice!

Almost 100% except face wash so small, you become more younger with new concept hotel which appreciate for space one of Buddhist culture. Walking distance to Kwan Im Thong, from Changi airport can use MRT blue line. While to check in level 1 should pass restaurant / bar, if you used big luggage bit trouble should come from car drop at level 2. Very recommend to try and rate it at TripAdvisor, good luck 🙏

The hotel restaurant is the main redeeming feature.Breakfast is worth your while, so do that, but go early because they shut it down quickly and don't replenish often.Elevators are slow as molasses, probably wasted a solid ten minutes a day waiting for it.Rooms are small but clean.

The location of G Hotel in Singapore is good because it’s close to most tourist attractions and shopping malls. The level of cleanliness is also quite good. The hotel rooms are very small and the room size is only 15 M2.  The bathroom also is very small and the hand wash sink is not more than 25 cm in diameter. The elevator only reaches the first floor and the stair must be used to reach the ground floor. Unfortunately there is no Wardrobe for clothes in the room.

review_title: Not Worth The Money I Paid For BUT Very Good Location
review_text: Elevator is TERRIBLE its VERY SLOW and malfunctions often Clearly the Hotel does not do REGULAR check-ups. I felt unsafe bec this lift could just FALL or Shoot Up anytime since its not maintained properlyThe Room is clean but small. Housekeeping LADY is terrible sometimes she refills the toiletries and water and sometimes she DOESN'T I also suspect shes been using my makeup. Also Housekeeping LADIES are very noisy they close the doors very loud they dont care if there are guests still sleeping. Walls are also paperthin so if there are guests talking at the next room u can hear it. The Bed Linens and Towels DONT have a Funky Smell but has black spots and tears/holes. The Faucet is TERRIBLE with the very very weak water pressure I am burdened to brush my teeth in the cramped

Reception Staff were efficient in providing answers to our questions and assisted us without hesitation whenever necessary which was a great relief in getting our job done the same day.They took decisions to ensure we were given the accommodation that was suitable for our ages and offered assistance in all our needs.  Very satisfactory and every staff of the teams were knowledgeable in providing us with the information we asked for as far as transportation.

Boutique hotel with good trendy decor located close to shopping markets and public transit. Rooms were small but comfortable, and restaurant options attached to the hotel were modern fare with decently priced drinks. No pool and lobby check in is on the 2nd floor via parking garage. This can be confusing for taxis for Grab rides to find and not ideal for wheelchair access. Ideal hotel for short business trips to Singapore. I liked the free smart phone option available during your stay. And the auto music play on the tv when entering the room. Gives a good vibes feel when you come back to your room or getting ready to go out on the town.

Rooms were far too small.  Could not walk around the bed and vanity was in the bedroom   The bed touched the wall at the head and end of bed and no room to walk around bed.  The meal in the restaurant was ok. It would not recommend because of the size of the room

review_title: Kind of tricky to check in and beds are just toooooo soft.
review_text: Stay was good (although the bed is so soft that you feel it's swallowing you), room a little tight, but I knew that before arriving. Awesome shower. But arriving there is kind of tricky since there is no reception until you pass through the restaurant and go up the stairs, which is really, really inconvenient for people with huge suitcases who don't arrive by taxi.

Room was very compact, but clean and great shower, staff attentive and breakfast worth having loved having access to a phone. All in all a good place to base yourself while seeing the sites of Singapore.

Okey. So yes the rooms are small but that is in the description, if you read it and still go there to complain something  is wrong  with you.   Is a very clean hotel, kind and helpful service, easy access  and great location. You just have to make sure if this the kind of place you would like to stay or not before going.

Very close to MRT station Bencoolen. Waking distance to many attractions. Very good morning buffet. Room very fonctionnel but very small, no way to get up both side of the bed. I suggest to ask and pay for un upgrade to have a bigger room.  Juice and candy station beside elevator for the kid in you! Love it . Hope to come back again in Singapour in this hotel
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: Hotel G is a good located hotel, close to everything I needed  and very conventient. Clean and nice. Breakfast is good. Rooms are a little bit small, I guess standard in Singapore. Check in process was good and staff were helpful with luggage after checking out.

Great location. Very close to metro station. Room small but ok. Bed configuration not very convenient for tall people .  You can not go around the bed since it fit the wide of the room. Helpful staff at the reception.  Bed very confortable. Good shower.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: Overall is good, but the maintenance and cleanliness are dropped compare my last previous stays. During my stay, one of the lighting in bathroom was flashing for about 2 days when switched on. On the last night, that light was totally blackout.Regarding the cleanliness, you can obviously see the dirty stains on the basin drain area and overflow passage, that’s disgusting. Somehow can see mosses around the edge of wet area, e.g. bathroom door, windows, basin edge etc. Besides that, there’s dusty on the luggage storage area, underneath the bed. Are you thinking no people will care about or didn’t notice the dirtiness on that area? The room is already small, the dirtiness should be able to detected and cleaned easily. Please keep well maintained as well as the cleanliness. As a frequent stay partner (not only me but whole company), really hope next stay can see some improvement, as there’re a lot of competitors just around you with competitive price. Thank you.

Great hotel. Breakfast, staff and cleanliness top qualities. Good location close to little India, 20min walk to the bay. Small rooms, as described during the booking. Nice restaurants in the building.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_title: Hotel G - Good Great but where is Gabriel?
review_text:
Hotel G as always! But wait! where are the staff hanging around at the front desk area?
there is this sweet sunshine her name starts with S ( im the guy who asked for the extra toothbrush) and where is Gabriel!?! place looks ssso ssserious now ... smiles are not pretty or just vacant stares ... sad sad but still your check in check out is so efficient like a factory production line! Thanks anyways for the extra toothbrush!

I stayed with my boyfriend in the Good King Room. The room was too tiny, no place for clothes, toilet too tiny and edge of the bed is located exactly at the wall. I am diabetic and need to pee a lot during the night. So I always need to wake up my partner to pass and jump from a very high bed. I'm lucky i did not break a leg during my stay.Everytime we need clothes we have to open the luggage alternately. In the morning is very hard to prepare at a tiny corridor and no place for make up and toiletries. Rainshower in a tiny cubicle makes the whole toilet and corridor wet. Everytime you shower there is no space to move and shower curtain keeps on being sucked by the ventilation towards  the person showering. My whole 3 days here was hell considering the size of luggage we have. The room was not so clean also that our first night i was itchy and can still smell the previous person who sleep in that bed.  There is no slipper provided and the floor was so cold (cement floor not carpeted). So i end up bringing 2 slippers I got from a previous hotel we stayed in. Lift was too slow and 1 is down, A lot to complain about but there are also good points. Restaurant downstairs was really nice, breakfast was good and quality food. We were given a room at top floor and saw the NYE fireworks. Overall all it was a bad hotel with good restaurnats
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_title: location is good, price is on average
review_text: The location is near to bencolen and bugis, which onlytakes few minutes of walking. Only minor thing to improve, which is get the breakfast session more organize when there is more customer. Food and plate is short. 1 lift is under repair, causing jam during peak time.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_title: Central and stylish but small rooms
review_text:
We stayed here for one night.
Positiv:
Location is great near Bugis Junction. Lots of food courts, restaurants and shopping centers around. Train nearby.
Stylish and clean rooms. WiFi is fast.

Negativ:
Breakfast only after 7am. Earlier would be better! We had to leave to the airport at 7am and weren’t able to have breakfast at all
Rooms are super small, with two people you can barely move. Personally I think it’s too expensive for what you get!
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: Service would have been very good but unfortunately the elevators have been a pain:  one night only 1 out of 3 was working and we had to queue at least 15 minutes to get to the floor.Rooms is quite small but ok. But the air conditioning was directed to the bed, impacting the quality of the sleep
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: The location and service of staff are impressive. The manager on duty from reception helped me to get a room with quiet AC and slightly larger space after I complained about the buzzing motor of AC around mid night, ensuring my peace of mind during my 4-night stay. Every one from front desk was very responsive. I had a lot of favor to ask, including storing the soft drinks & fruits & take-outs at the fridge, micro-waving the food, late check-out, calling for a taxi, etc. Hotel staffs helped out on all those and made my day.  Additionally, the hotel's location was just beyond my expectation. Walking distance to the sites for whoever is an art & nature & history lover - fort canning park (a challenging uphill short-distance jogging if you're interested), Singapore Art Museum,

Good stay overall with good service and nice complimentary wine and Kreme doughnutsRecommended for short stay cation with easy access to MRT and other places of interest. Will stay there again next time

Great service and atmosphere overall, awesome facilities, hidden hotel kinf of vibe, great place to stay for the price. Would highly reccomend for staycation between couples or some friends. And they have treats for you while you wait for the lift.

excellent service and great prices ，it was very clean and every day would be clean it ，thanks very much for 他the wine which compliments us ，it make us feel good and have a good mood to travel～ so i love the hotel G and if i go back Singapore again i will came hotel G again。 ❤️ happy new year❤️

Pro - very good decoration. Good taste, good style - aroma diffuser every floor creates good atmosphere  - the location is superb  - staffs are friendly  Con - rooms quite small. Ok for one guest but would feel cramped for two.  The shower area is way too small.   - walls are not sound-proof.  Heard knocks and ppl voice all night.  Not recommended for light sleepers.   - these make me feel like staying in a boutique hostel rather than a hotel

Reception is small too crowded. E lift is very slow it skips ur level n goes all e way up and when it comes to my turn its already full. Sleep perturbed noisy n unnecessary knock on e door from hotel staff. U shld give gifts/ complimentary upon check in or  place it in e room before guest enter. Not coming back again.

the elevator is too slow. One is not working. others remain full most of the times. passenger elevator & service elevator is same. coming from 9th floor to downstairs was not an easy task with long queue an time wasting. there is no room service available in this hotel, which was not mentioned anywhere.

room rather small. Need to increase the size of the room if twin sharing. The lift is rather slow egthe waiting time. It is rather difficult of take the luggage bags to the lift from the ground floor.

Love this hotel..near every where..and we gan enjoy the nice room with aromaterapi ..we enjoy staying at this when we have vacatiom at Singapore country, the hotel near with MRT bancollen which direct to expo n Changi airport n near with bugis street

review_title: Staff wanted to clean the rooms at 630 and 930pm Long wait for the lift at busy times
review_text: Bijou rooms are to be expected.However at this price I would expect the rooms to be cleaned daily,during the day. First day they were cleaned whilst we were out until 4pm.Second day returned at 430 pm,having left the clean me please sign on the door.Room not made up despite the trolley being in the corridor when we left and when we returned,knock on the door at 630pm did we want the room done?.Day3 similar to the previous day except the knock on the door came at 930pm!! We had informed the hotel of a 230am departure!!.  Whilst on the 5 floor it was not too much of a hardship to walk down during the morning “rush hour” There was always one of the 3 lifts out of order.According to a frequent visitor this was always so. When I checked out the manager offered to take the breakfast

The room was clean with adequate necessities. Really enjoyed my stay, and all the staffs there were all very friendly. There was alos a wide variety to breakfast options to choose from and the location is very near to the mrt too!!

This hotel seems new based on the fixtures and paintwork & quality of the room.Wonderful location,great ambience and clean environment makes this hotel a must stay location when visiting Singapore.The staff are well trained and are able to fulfill my requests speedily & accurately.I enjoyed the quality of the in-house food when I had my breakfast.Parking is available but at a steep price of $2/hr.I found the lifts quite slow and can be frustrating moving from your room to the lobby and vice-versa.Price for the room I stayed was reasonable.

The Hotel Rooms in my opinion is too small, especially for a couple. The breakfast could improve as well for the price paid. However, the location is excellent and central to all areas in Singapore. The front desk officers gave us an exceptionally good service by allowing us an early check-in, after a tiring early morning flight from Sri Lanka. Credit to Hotel G for that :)

review_title: We need to search the hotel again rather than pushing for the price.
review_text: What does it mean cost-effective?We had to put up with the mistake of booking for 2 days in a hotel room, which is too small to accommodate two people."cost-effectiveness" does not apply anywhere.Breakfast was okay and we could have tolerated walking up the 7th floor because of the broken elevator, but the rooms that are too narrow are not really recommended.In a hot and hot Singapore, book a spacious hotel even if you pay more.

Sadly the rating is only up to 5 stars because I would give a 6 if it’s possible.Customer service upon checking in was fast and efficient. The comfy feeling that the room provide was awesomely pleasant. As hotel is locate right in the middle of the city, travelling to any tourist attraction is convient. Highly recommended.

I wonder why the room always has only one set of toothbrush and slippers for every visit with 2 guests registered.  I also am not sure which room types will have the view facing Bencoolen Street or Sunshine Plaza?  I have tried all types of room except Family Room, but still failed to have one can have the view for either one.

Good rooms are not expensive or cheap, but also close to many places to go there. It is also very convenient and there are also 24-hour convenience stores nearby.this is a good hotel you can choices on the room

Horrible experience during my stay last week. My arm and  thigh has been bitten by the flea, red spots  around and much itching. I already complained to your staff, need to concentrate the clean up of bed sheet and the environment hygiene.  No next time to stay at your hotel.

I love the small quaint and simple design of the hotel. Makes me feel at home and I love the simple decoration inside with all the necessary amenities available and the staff especially the housekeeping service are impeccable. Thank you so much for the amazing stay!

Very convenient location (near shops and eateries), love the boutique style/theme of the hotel. Rooms are a bit on the small side which is fine solo but may be a bit tight for pairs. 24/7 access to hotel gym is great.

review_title: Small but comfortable room, could be even better
review_text: Room is comfortable and water (both hot and cold) is available each floor. Location is nearby to bugis, 5-10 minutes walk to nearby MRT station. If you’re driving, the parking at hotel is not complimentary and could be expansive. Hope to see free parking in future.

The room was very small. The toilet was also flooded when showering which made it very slippery. It would be better if the shower area and WC had a divider. But the service from the hotel was good, they were prompt in attending to our needs.

Very good experience stay with Hotel G. We are here to celebrate christmas, and received very warm surprise from Hotel. Even just a very small box of doughnuts with greeting cards,but it's so warm and lovely that the hotel are so into details. Very friendly and professional hotel staff.Highly recommended.

Staying in Hotel G Singapore is definitely the right choiceIt is close to all kind of public transport to travel around the city.Thanks for the Christmas Treat (Krispy Kreme), it does surprised me after a tired day tour around the city.Definitely will return for a stay in Hotel G SingaporeAppreciated all everything and the kind services Hotel G Singapore.

review_title: Great customer service with hiccups in between
review_text: The room is pretty small but it's well decorated and clean. I would think it's more suitable for solo or couple trip. I brought my toddler along and there's no space for him to move around.   Handy phone is provided but strongly suggest you test the phone on day 1. I couldn't use the handy phone at all when I need it for my 4 days 3 nights trip. 1st day was leaving it for charging; 2nd day realised there's battery issue and got the staff to replace it; 3rd day I got a new phone but there's SIM card issue. No network!! 😭 Hence, I was surviving without data throughout the trip. Thanks to our pre-downloaded offline map.   Out of 3 lifts, 1 on maintenance and 1 were down. Left with 1 working lift during peak hour.. Pretty inconvenient. Thank god I was on 5th floor, so taking the

Location was good and good for a short stay - Staff was friendly and room condition was good! Bathroom is slightly small and only a curtain to separate the bathroom and the toilet (toilet floor abit wet sometimes) but other than that, was an overall pleasant stay! :-)

review_title: Dont be Fooled by fake great reviews and instagram pictures of this Hotel
review_text: Elevator - Way TOO SLOW and NOT properly maintained It always malfunctions and Im scared one day it might just go up or crash down VERY Unsafe Room - Way TOO SMALL Good for 1 Tiny Asian ... Linens are NOT Smelly but Towels have some dirt NO Fridge in the Room Toilet Sink has very weak water pressure  Housekeeping is TERRIBLE coz they keep slamming the doors so loud when they clean the rooms NOT a care for guests who are resting sleeping in their rooms TV Channels - ALL News that run RERUNS everyday Nothing entertaining to watch like FoxLife AXN Nickelodeon or Local Channels (NEWS is not considered entertaining) Reception Area is way too small and crowded and is on the 2nd Floor so very hard to get a Taxi back to airport. Staffs are surprisingly Nice.  My expnesive Room came with

I had a good time staying in this accommodation. The only thing I would have to give mention is that the lifts are rather slow and inefficient. Hope that can be worked on. Everything else was generally good for me. It's in a side of town where there is easy access to anything from food, transport, etc.

Great location, and great service. Front desk was very friendly to welcome us. Very close to MRT: only takes 5 mins walk to either Bencoolen or Bugis. However, if your room is very close to the lift, you might find it annoying early in the morning.

The food is delicious,and The service was very satisfactory.receptionist  Very patient degradation considerations.If I go to travel next time,I will still choose to check in Hotel G Singapore.thanks a lot !

Clean and small room. Near MRT and Bugis center. We can go anywhere easily. A litle bit hard to find out the hotel, because it is on the 2nd floor. We have to wall around 3 time to find out the way to the hotel.

Booked a Good single room which was perfect for the solo traveller. The room was tiny as expected, but had everything I needed. The bed was very comfy. My only complaint is the toiletries weren't restocked properly, i.e. I used the body wash and lotion on the first day, but the next day housekeeping only restocked the shampoo and conditioner (which i did not even open), so that was a bit strange. The vanity kit and shower cap which i had used was also not restocked.

Excellent stay. Great service from staff. Gym facilities were great ad private . Location easily accessible to many food locations and multiple mrt lines in the area. Nice neighbourhood to explore. ...

We couldn't recommend hotel g highly enough - friendly staff, lovely room and an impressive breakfast. Great value. The location was also great - just a short walk to a mrt stop. We would definitely stay again.

A really cool hotel with a funky restaurant, lobby and rooms. The rooms were pretty tight and small but totally expected for Singapore. Overall a great stay at cool hotel in a great location too.The tekka center a block away was great for Indian food!

The room was surprisingly small but the hotel provided everything we needed. It was nice and clean. We enjoyed our 3 nights stay at Hotel G. Location was great, close to MRT station, downtown line and circle line. Staffs were friendly.

Overall A Memorable Stay Once Again ... Staff are Extremely Courteous, Hotel Facilities are Very Good & Location is perfect ... Recommend they extend better fares especially to frequent returning guests !!!!

review_title: nice front desk,nice breakfast,nice location,good price!
review_text: the room is a little bit small but neat,the bed is soft.hotel is near the MRT station and near the bufis street.Though bathroom is not separate from washroom,when I took a shower,the water flow out the bathroom and the floor is all wet, it is a good hotel .

Great hotel with great location.. The breakfast spread is the best I’ve experienced so far! Thumbs up!Room size slightly small but the bed is good. Check in process can be improved. Multiple MRT stations around, very convenient

Room was very comfortable, neat, spacious and clean. The aesthetics of the room was great. The front desk staff was hospitable and nice. Service was great. I like how the room looks. feels homey and comfortable. thanks for the stay. will definitely come back here

Thank you very much for the excellent and friendly service that your staff have extended to our friends  with disabilities from Asean.  They were made to feel at home, well received and situated as most of them were here for the 1st time.  The wheelchair friendly rooms were more than adequate  for those using wheelchairs.  However, it would be good if some of the amenities in the rooms like clothes hanger, towel rack could be lowered to within their reach.

The rooms are cramped. The “great room” was not great. Bed against the wall means clambering over your partner. Staff are variable from very very good to a waste of time. Breakfast 3 star. Location is superb for MRT so if you are young and don’t mind some discomfort, this is a good hotel. Older folk may want to look elsewhere

The girl who service at 2 November morning(about 7am) and 4 November at night(about 11pm)is very good. Thank you all.When my friend and me are late for MRT to go to the airport, the girl make a reservation at grab,let we could go to airport in time and be comfortable.thank you~ meet you at next time:)

Everything was very good,, service was great, staff great,, location good,, breakfast was very good,,, room was a little small then I would prefer,, but all in all it was comfortable enough. Pleasant place to stay for a couple days in Singapore.

The room was a bit tight but the overall value of this hotel was very good. Location is very central.  Service was efficient and friendly. Breakfast was lovely and had lots of choices. Can't go wrong with this hotel!

Just needed an overnight stay in the city and Hotel G was very affordable given the area and neighbouring hotels. Room was very well designed and a good size. Shower had good pressure, which is important. Also had a very decent buffet breakfast.

The quality of the hotel is quite nice given the reasonable price. Especially, the hotel locates in a convenient place and the room is clean, quiet, and easy to use. The quality of service is also nice although not super nice.

Need to have more clear guide/signature for Taxi/Car can know how to drive to the entrance gate of hotel. On the date we arrived, it is mid-night and taxi drop us in front of the restaurant and we have to find the hotel reception by ourself.

review_title: Not sure what to title this?
review_text: We stayed 5 nights. We did not request or need "housekeeping". Hotel and Room were clean. Staff very professional and helpful. We recomment drawers or shelves to put clothes, etc on/in.  My husband and I would stay here again.

This is my second time staying here.  The rooms are small as all reviewers say, but once you get over that everything else is good.  Staff are very helpful.  The restaurant/bar downstairs is much better than the normal 'cold' hotel offerings and is clearly popular with locals.  There is also a terrific and super cheap restaurant around the corner for rotis and Malaysian food. The hotel is close to the metro.

Good location whetc is easy to access to many tourist location. Then again the room was not that spacious for 2 persons to maneuver. Overall it is still worth the stay. Will consider if there is a promotion in near future.

the room is big & clean, also the environment is quiet, i relly like Hotel G. But i also recommend that the hair dryer not be put in the package, this leads to a litte inconvenience. by the way, the light is a little dark

We stayed in 1506 for two nights and we were very happy with everything. Guests should know in advance that the rooms are VERY small -- and we didn't care. If you're planning to spend most of your time sight-seeing in Singapore and simply want a clean, modern, comfortable, secure room to return to then Hotel G is perfect.  It's really well situated between the Bugis and Bencoolen MRT stations.  It was an easy walk to Little India.  Staff at Hotel G were very kind. We showed up early and they were happy to securely store our luggage prior to check-in.

Lets just say that I've never seen such a concept of hotel and this is my first experience of it. First time to stay in Hotel G and they already "wow-ed" me to the max. Starting from the booking time, their own website have a few on-going promotions, I registered as member, got a 15% discount and got a complimentary breakfast together with my room. Fast forward to check-in, the hotel was strangely located at level 2, which took me a while to find it, but no big deal. Went to check in at 4.30pm and there's roughly any queue, which makes the check in fast and hassle free. Got my keycard and went to the room. The room itself was not spacious as one would have imagine, but bear in mind this is Singapore. The room itself was exactly the same as the pictures in their website, except

breakfast is delicious and provide a variety of choices. comfortable matress. shower is wide enough.  位置不错，在南洋艺术学院隔壁，离地铁站走路十几分钟，附近也有很多大排档之类的，离711 也很近。 早晨品种丰富，真的好吃！床非常舒适，就是被子有点薄，淋浴间大小合适，热水够热，服务人员态度还不错，灯光比较柔和，电视节目也多，房间不大但是布局合理，就是空调有点凉好像调不动，不过热带地区都这样吧，房间稍微有点潮。很安静。

The place is great! The staff were very friendly and helpful. Location is walkable to different line stations and shopping mall. Nevertheless the place is close to all the different food choices opposite both sides! :)

Room was small, but clean and decent value for money.  Staff helpful and location useful for Gardens by the Bay and Chinatown. Made use of the free baggage storage as well, have been charged at other hotels.

review_title: Nice hotel for a short stay
review_text: Stayed hee in november for 3 nights and noticed what a quirky hotel it is. Reception is up a ramp if your in a taxi and you can also head through the ground floor bar and up the stairs.The room was compact,the bed in the corner facing the tv and the sink was also outside the bathroom/toilet room.Breakast is split on two levels and i preferred to sit on the ground floor level just peple watching.The hotel was nice and clean and if you like the bits and bobs in your room you can purchase them at reception  .

review_title: Trendy hotel in a great location
review_text: Lots of on trend going on here but lacks warmth from reception staff, not rude but merely functional.  Rooms are tiny and a struggle for two adults for a 5 night stay. In a great location with a really trendy bar/restaraunt downstairs.  Lots of 7/11s nearby as well as cheap eating options.

review_title: Great location, hipster vibes, millennial friendly
review_text: Cute decor. The rooms were a bit small for us but maybe it's b/c we didn't choose the right kind. The gym was great, the service was impeccable, the location was very convenient (Bugis Street). We didn't spend a lot of time in the room so it was great for our trip.

Nice boutique hotel with uber cool intetrior, great bar downstairs and excellent accessibility, rooms are cozy with wash basin on the outside of the WC which explains the mild drainage odour before the room ventilation is turned on. Overall, if you’re travelling on a medium budget I’d recommend you to check it out.

I guess you get what you pay for in this hotel. The room we stayed in (good king) was a bit small but the layout with a small cubby hole for the luggage was smart. The bathroom is small, clean, but the shower and toilet are level, so the floor was always soaked.Service was so-so. I guess it depends on who was on duty when you need something.The air freshener in the halls was a little bit off-putting.Restaurant downstairs looks hip and great though.

realy we good location for exploring the city, about a 10 minute walk to the transit system. yes the rooms are small but we were out all day so we were not bothered about that.the bed was one best i have ever slept on straight out every night.breakfast was really good as well with a really good coffee machine.only downside was we could not get a shower when we got there, we had flown over night and had hope to get a shower before we headed out for the day( we were early) so ended up having to have a wash down and getting changed in the toilet, not a big deal. staff were really good and helpful . if i return to singapore a would stay there again.

Room is smaller than our camper. Much too small for 2 persons. They don't even have a wardrobe. The bathroom is 1 m2 and the sink is in the middle of the room. It s not nice for 2 persons. We don't recomend this rooms.

This is one of a chain of hotels - the G hotels are very good.  Nice change from the mainstay chain hotels. The hotel offers good food and wine and is in a good part of Singapore.  Recommend it is a choice for your next visit to Singapore business or pleasure.

review_title: Nice location and atmosphere, but a little bit small room.
review_text: We have stayed a week. Was quite convenient address to get to the downtown. Interior was also cute and sophisticated so that it was fun to see. The problem was the size of the room. Tiny and tight than photos we could see beforehand, so it was struggling for opening our luggage on the floor. Breakfast was good enough in terms of kinds, taste, and service. Would be better to have Singapore(local and Asian) foods more.

Simple & cozy room. Hotel Service was good but not in ginett restaurant just below the Hotel G.No fridge it's quite inconvenient. And no free parking . Have to purchase it for $15 .Everything was good .

Overall a pleasant experience, staff were friendly and helpful! Room is clean, bathroom is good but the bed is a little too soft, but then again that might be just my personal preference since I have back issues.

Everything ok it is very nice place,  the only thing is the entry of the hotel,  taxi drivers have some difficulties  to reach the right enter/drop off, although the position of this Hotel is good. I think should be reported in a better way where the cars must go.

Centrally located property with clean facilities. Staff is very friendly. I would personally recommend this hotel to all my fellow travellers. Only drawback is access to hotel entrance. Facilities are fantastic!

review_title: Modern, best located and attention to detail!
review_text: I didn’t had high expectations of this hotel at first but I have to say I was so impressed. Since the beginning the people from the front desk were so kind and helpful. All the service has been impeccable during all our stay. The best reason to choose Hotel G is because of the location. You can go walking to all the places and there is no need to take a taxi or metro. The room is small but cozy and clean. They have two restaurants which are fancy and so cosmopolitan, I loved them! One detail that made the difference is that in the room you have a smartphone that you can use during your stay, you can make calls and use it as gps while visiting the city, it is an awesome idea and I think all hotels located in a city should have it! I am pretty sure I’ll come back to Singapore and

Lets do this in terms of sequence from start to end:Check-in: Check in was hassle free and rather simple. The staff who assisted me was really polite and professional. Just took a while because of system stuff (which is rather normal for anyone checking into the hotel). Explained everything to us perfectly and even gave us complimentary drinks vouchers. Room: I think that all those who are going to book this place MUST understand that this hotel does not offer big rooms, but rather they minimise your room space. So please note this point before booking and not make a fuss after booking - to find out that the room is not as big as you seen in other hotels. (do not compare what you did not research)The room is definitely small, with a simple desk and bed and a shower. With 2 big

My stay during 2nd to 8th December in room 1226, I have asked for housekeeping twice and I lost my hair straighter after the second housekeeping! Worst experience! And stingy hotel in refilling the shampoo!

It was nice stay for me because of nice location of the hotel, nice design of interior, appropriate facility and they have nice bar at the ground floor. all staffs are friendly so I could enjoyed my stay.

review_title: Loved every aspect of my stay
review_text: Cozy rooms. All the amenities that you could need (cottom swabs, shampoo, toothbrush, toothpaste, water, coffee, everything!). Super comfy bed. Location can't be beat. And the staff was the best part. Especially at the wine bar downstairs Ginette. Bartender Firdaus made me feel so welcome and at home! Oh, and the food is absolutely ridiculous!! Breakfast, cheese board, salads, dinners, everything. I will definitely be back!! Thanks Hotel G!

Everything is good, just the receptionist guy is so rude. I arrived to the hotel around 11:30pm but had to wait for him to finish some calls before pay some attention to me. His attitude made me feel so bad.

Very pleased with having to book last minute arrangements for a one week period in Singapore. Location is friendly to the whole downtown area by foot, and the rooms made the most out of their small footprint. Top notch breakfast and friendly staff as well. No issues and will definitely return.

this was my second time staying in Hotel G. Perfect location. Near bus station and mrt. Plus the breakfast is superb. They clean the room daily even without telling them. Nice view since we are located in the 15th floor

Reception very helpfulSecond stay in this hotelRestaurant is excellentMenu and taste of food is very goodJust breakfast not so many choice of bread...only toast bread...pity because the buffet breakfast is okVery clean hotel and good situation very close from Mrt

Hotel G offers small-size fashionable design rooms in downtown Singapore. The design concept is like « get asleep in your bedroom, wake up in your office », which might not please everybody but has its advantages. The room space has been optimized, like in many other mega-cities in Asia, yet (almost) nothing is missing and everything seems new and clean, e.g. the high-quality bedding and posh cosmetics. Well the design still has some misses, like not having a wardrobe to put your luggage and cloths, yet overall it’s quite functional and pleasing.  Lot is made for guests to staying connected: WiFi is available all over the place while a Handy is provided in each room with tons of useful tourist information, especially about attractions (itineraries, opening hours, admission rates

review_title: The hotel misled me for the final checkin hotel versus the booking hotel
review_text: I raised my strong complaning to both hotel.booking and G Hotel for the later provide variable day rate price of the hotel and the not real discount pacakge price . Therefor I think the hotel is cheating its customer on the real price. Plus the G Hotel doen't pay the  refund for the un used last 3 days hotel fees , which is totally not acceptiable. I strongly urge th ehotel to pay me back the refund of Nov.27-29.

The room is smaller than expected but absolutely lovely, clean, and well maintained. The hotel service and staff are quite professional. It’s located at about 10 minute walking distance away from the Bugis st area.

Hotel G is a hip and happening botique hotel that will surely delight most travellers who like fashionable accomodations. The room size is on the small side like most hotels in the city state but the design and lay-out is well thought out.The hotel provides each room with a Handy phone which you can use and bring along while you are in Singapore. You can install Google Maps and other useful apps to make your stay easier.The breakfast spread was modest.The staff were really very helpful. Location was great, it is just 5-7 minutes away from Bencoolen MRT station and is situated near universities so there were a lot choices for food and was not as touristy as other locations.If there’s one thing that I wish to change is the fact that the bathrooms do not have bidet hoses. It’s not a big issue for me but it will be super convenient for people who aren’t used to wiping themselves with tissue after doing their business. I definitely would love to stay again at Hotel G in the future.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: this is a good hotel，mrt to hotel is around 10mins，the breakfast is buffet and the taste is good，the room is a little bit small，but the price is overall worth for it. the hotel have many restaurant around，and shopping mall
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: Small room but fine for a short stay where we were out most of the time. Nice perk was the free phone that you could use around the city. Close to a lot of stuff, able to walk down to the iconic waterfront without much hassle (took a quick Grab ride back). Quality food options nearby. As long as you don't need a lot of space in your room, I'd stay here again.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: It's my first time to visit this country and appreciate Hotel G to bring us excellent atmosphere in Singapore. It's a clear room, perfect breakfast, wonderful fitness equipment and patient receptionist. Thumb up this hotel room and I will visit this hotel again next time.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: Helpful staff, clean, very near transport links. Recommend the king size room if there’s 2 of you staying in the room as queen size is quite compact :-))Restaurant looks lovely ( though didn’t try it )Bar staff great, good selection of wine
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: My 3rd time to Singapore and everything just great as always.The hotel was 1 of the best i have stayed at and just love this place for the cleanliness and the Singaporean people.will be going back next year as a must for me and my wife 👍👍👍
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: This hotel one of the worst values I've ever come across in all of my travels. I will never go back and will let people know on the travel websites what to expect and to avoid at all costs. Mold in room that hits you in the moment you walk in and have to breathe all night that causes headaches. The room is the size of a shoe box and horribly designed! The washroom sink in smack dab in the middle of the room. There is no space to place your bags/luggage. There's no mini fridge to keep drinks cool, the lobby itself is nearly as small as the rooms, where guests and their luggage are tripping over one another.You have to actually walk through a bar/restaurant to enter the lobby, unless you walk all the way around to the rear of the hotel, and just all in all, an utter complete mess in every aspect. The decent things perhaps are its location in Bugis, and the room was clean (except for the stench of mold) other than that, the worst money I've spent in a long time.
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: The room was a little small, but everything else was great! loved the decor of the room, breakfast had a decent spread and the room was well kept. Location was amazing with lots of good food nearby. Would definitely recommend for a small group!
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text: A towel is very ragged. I was astonished you still provide it to ternate. The floor was also dirty. But it is at good location and prize is acceptable by general people. I still hope the cleanliness can be improved and recommend it to my friends.

With its excellent location and service minded staff, the hotel is a good choice . However, some rooms are VERY small. Allthough having a bed king size, you have to climb over your room mate to reach the other bed. Also the Good King room has a strange design having the wash basin in the bedroom ouside the bathroom. This may not give you the privacy you wish. When you switch on the light in the bathroom, your room mate may wake up since the bathroom window faces the bed.

Nice hotel.  Small rooms by North American standards. Unusual room layout.  Annoying elevator system opened door only at my floor by using room key.  (This caused problems because friends were staying on another floor, and I could not visit them directly.  It was necessary to phone them to meet us at the lobby and then take the elevator up to their floor.)

Wonderful clean Hotel, good location just a few minutes walking to the main streets. Good and nice breakfast , small rooms though, that is enough if you are going to stay just a 1-2 nights but longer stays , than bigger rooms should be considered.

review_title: Opinion of stay in HOTEL G
review_text: During stay in G, I had a good time. Especially good location, so easy to find when I back to hotel.And near Hotel, have a lot of shopping mall and good place. Worker is very kindness. Breakfast is also very good.

I stayed in Hotel G for 10D9N, it was overall a very pleasant experience.I was worried when i went through some of the review about the washroom and housekeeping issue; to my surprise, i did not encounter such issue during my stay. They attended to my request most of the time.The bed is comfortable, but the pillow quality is not up to my expectation (personal preference).Breakfast is good; but the only thing to note is the buffet breakfast which they take long to refill.I love the simple decoration in the room, as well as the concept of the hotel.Will definitely choose Hotel G for my next visit in Singapore.

Good service, nice food. Good assistance provided from staff and managers. A hotel with special entrance for lobby, clean and comfortable for staying. Walking distance to shopping mall and local food.

I had hoped that my experience at Hotel G would be as positive as the reviews had made me hope and I wasn't disappointed! Check in was quick and seamless, my room was clean and spacious, and the team couldn't do enough for me. They're happy to point you in the direction of local restaurants, the nearest MRT, call you a cab or let you enjoy an undisturbed sleep-in in your room. They were also happy to look after my luggage for the day until I could check in! I'd highly recommend Hotel G for your stay in Singapore and would stay here again.

Hi.  I have travelled to Singapore. The Hotel G Singapore is by far the best hotel i've stayed at. The staff was just wonderful and very helpfull. The room was always cleaned when i got back. The hotel is in the middle of every thing. It is so sentral that you can walk to almost every thing.  I use taxi alot when im in Singapore,  this time i walked every where.  There is a very nice bar/restaurant on the first floor.  Which is very popular.  I will use this hotel from now on and i  will tell every one thst this is the place to stay while in Singapore.   You also get this device with the room that you can bring with you on your seightseeing.  It's like a mobile phone with wifi. Shows you good places to eat, drink, shop, seightseeing,  tourist attractions, etc. I have only

review_title: A room has everything you need excepts space.
review_text: A single bed room is too small, it was not indicated clearly in the room properly. Room space is very very minimal. The toilet and shower is merged, shower head is very close to the toilet bowl. After shower, floor and toilet bowl and toilet paper are wet, it is very difficult to use toilet afterwards. Working bench is attached to the edge of the bed and you basically have to sit of the bed when using the working bench. There is no space for a chair.

review_title: Comfy design hotel with great staff and good location
review_text: The hotel is great. Rooms are not huge but they are very well designed to optimize space. The feel is of a casual but design hotel, and the beds are amazing. Good breakfast, good gym, great staff. The restaurant is on the street level and open to the public so it feels buzzy at night and is a good place to sit and work or just relax.

It's a interesting space but there are some easy improvements that could help a lotThee were no shelves for storing clothes.  Perhaps drawers could be place in the space under the bed.  There weren't  even clothes hooks for hanging up clothes.  It would be very easy to add those.

-the room are very clean and comfortable-service is good -car parking is very convenience and cheap-hotel location is very near to city -MRT accessible is very very convenience (walking distance less than 10 mins)

The location of the hotel is excellent with two metro stations within 5 minutes and everything within walking distance. The design of the place is quite good, with funky details. The rooms are on the smaller size though. Good choice if you're planning to spend your time in the city.

The hotel is very comfortable and in a very strategic position, you can use the gym if you want. The breakfast is very plenty of things to heat. But... al the room haven't wardrobe so it's ok for not long stay

A recommended stay within 10 min walk from Bugis and Dhoby Ghaut. Room was cozy and clean. The staff are friendly and helpful. We called up the hotel after we realized we left a pair of shorts in the room and the hotel staff got back to us promptly after checking with the house-keeping department.

Room was nice & comfortable, even though a bit small and there are barely space between the bed and bathroom. Room entertainment works perfectly fine. Location quite strategic, near MRT station and bus stop.

Hotel G is my regular hotel when in Singapore. The staff are great, location is perfect and pricing is always competitive. The rooms are small but the bar is big so just go down there and meet people!

review_title: A bit overpriced but compensated with excellent customer service
review_text: · •The staff service is absolutely excellent with all requests being attended immediately, excellent predisposition, accurate information and warm treat every time.  •The building is quite new and everything looks immaculate.  •Great location, if you’re a walking traveler, you can literally reach all the main attractions by walk easily (be ready to sweat with the Singaporean weather).  •Area seems safe.  •Bed if very comfortable and everything looks super clean.  •Breakfasts offers good variety.  •Very easy to reach by public transportation. (Bencoolen metro station is 150mts away or less).  •Wi fi works perfectly.  •The handy offered for free during the stay to make calls, book tickets and have a Singapore guide is an amazing  • Safe in bedroom is bigger than average.

Very clean and comfortable.  An industrial funk atmosphere.  All the amenities were very well thought out with the best shower ever in a hotel.  Excellent value... Cant say enough about it.  Great place to stay in Singapore!

I have a great business trip in Singapore. The hotel was good and clean. The bar in first floor was very nice. Your personal services were great and very helpful.Hence, i would like to thank you for all again.

Not far from CBD and close to shopping as well. Suits both leisure and business travellers. Liked the ambiance of the restaurant, hip and cosy at the same time. Breakfast was outstanding when compared to similar priced places. Rooms are small but you get what you pay for, remember Singapore is expensive per m2!

I made the right decision to stay at Hotel G. The room is lovely functional with minimal but good design.2 restaurants are brilliant with everyday promotion and warm welcoming service from the staff.It's superb!

Stylish interior, supreme service and very good breakfast at a prime location in Singapore. Unfortunately the rooms are very small and the bed is too small if you are taller than 1.85 m. The bathroom gives you only very little privacy. Expect long waits at the elevators and the only toaster and coffee machine at the breakfast room (I assume the latter two could be quickly resolved by the management if wanted).

Breakfast spread was great. Excellent service all through. Middle road is a very good location to access all the exciting areas for fun and shopping and business . The rooms were very quiet, even though the hotel was full. Front desk staff where outstanding. Fantastic value for money. Even though the rooms where small, it had everything you needed. Good design.

Hotel G is a great new property tucked on bencoolen, the hotel is new and has decent amenities. One thing to note is that the rooms are quite small, the breadth of it is the same as the bed so might not be ideal if you’re claustrophobic but I genuinely didn’t mind. The size of the room means that the room doesn’t have a proper cupboard, the sink is in the living area too and the ironing facility needs to be requested for as it’s not available in room. Location was great and very central, although the entrance is to be made through a restaurant which can get tricky if you have big bags. The breakfast was probably the weakest attribute as the option were very limited.   Would recommend this place if you don’t plan on staying in the room for long hours, it’s pretty cozy and the bed

Fantastic breakfast, very friendly and helpful staff, the room was a bit small but the bed was comfy and everything was clean. The location is perfect. Most sights are within walking distance. Would definately recommend this hotel!

-Amazing interiors and well thought of spaces-Loved every detail in the room -Amazing restaurants in L1-Would recommend the lobby to be brighter-Loved the idea of a water & ice dispenser in every floor-Please offer free laundry bags-hair dryer is cold air so it takes awhile to dry the hair-please have a separator in the floor between shower and toilet so water is not spreas everywhere-Great location Overall, great stay! Would stay here again.

Perfect stay for a city break. Location is central so easy to get around via foot, bus, taxi etc. Hotel is nice and modern and the staff are very helpful. The rooms are small but cleverly designed & clean.

Happy with all except the bartenders. We were there to collect the complimentary mocktails that night. There were no eye contacts, them saw the papers I was holding, prepare the drinks, take away the papers. Done. Where's the greetings or at least a smile? We were given the complimentary drinks, don't make us feel like we're begging for free stuff. After all, a warm smile is the universal language.

review_title: Messed Up with Credit Card Payment
review_text: My company booked my room for me with the company credit card.The reception still asked me to pay by my own credit card, explaining that "guests must be able to present the credit card in order to proceed payment set up through online booking".Now they double charge my company credit card too.Also the room is next to a big road so expect to hear car passing by all night.

review_title: Falling in love with this chic lifestyle hotel
review_text: I was stayed at Hotel G Singapore last week for my business trip. The overall was good and the receptions were very helpful. I love the food at Ginett as well.   By the way, I would suggest to always fill the food during breakfast since when i went down on 8.15-8.30 am there were no more food.

review_title: Service is good! But the bathroom could be better.
review_text: I like:1. Every staff has a nice smile and good service.2. The location is near MRT station and bus stop.I don't like:1. Water easily come out to the bathroom when taking shower and made the floor wet.

The traffic fron airport to the Hotel is about 20min by car.The room is clean and comfortable.It is easy to find some restrant around hotel.The location is close to Little India, we can visit there by walk about 15min.

Clean room.The location is very good, there are shops nearby to shop at night.Good sleep quality.The bar is at 1F and you can have a drink at any time.The breakfast menu is a bit monotonous, but there are still some

Seldom does one come across such customer service, nothing was too much, the staff go well over the top to succeed in their efforts to msintmai the high standards.def stay there again from little things like extra tea bags, to really fulfilling your every request.

review_title: Taxi drop off and pick up
review_text: Overall, the hotel is very clean and quite. However, it would be better to have breakfast start earlier than 7AM,such as 6AM. And also the dedicated lane to the taxi drop off/pick up area on the 2nd floor is abit too narrow and the location is not easy for Taxi driver to find..

I did spend one night at the Hotel G and it was wonderful, small room but ok, we are in the center of Singapore I guess, so what !?very good value for money!only the hairdryer did not workone has to get used to the fact that the shower is in the same room that the toilet but ok, not much space and a good solution

Hotel G is a quite new hotel and you can definitely see that. The rooms are modern equipped and have everything you need. We had the standard room; the only thing you have to keep in mind for this type of room, is the fact that it's quite small (and so is the bed...). The breakfast buffet has great options, there is something for everyone! I had a nice time staying at hotel G. Also, the location is perfect. Close to all the highlights.

The room was small but comfortable. The A/C can't get switched off. When you come back to the room, it's very cold but dry :) Smartphone 4G provided for the stay.Quite big breakfast buffet, but no fresh juice.

Good location with MRT quite close. Clean rooms, free water, mobile to use for internet. Amazing breakfast. Helpful reception. Quite busy bar at the lobhy, whre breakfast is served in the morning. All in all good hotel.
