There is a 24-hour burger right next the hotel.    The room is a bit dark and small but considering the price it is value for money.  I'll definitely stay here again.

Staff were so rude and not helpful in the slightest, rooms were tiny and very basic with awful bathrooms, breakfast was very poor and be careful of the breakfast scam where they book you for 2 people but only give you 1 breakfast so you have to pay for another one. It was our honeymoon by the way, which they knew, and still the staff couldn't even be friendly or nice.

The room is actually great, but the staff gave us the wrong room. I booked greater room and she gave me great room. If I did not call and check we will have paid extra for a smaller room. The room is very clean and spacious. It will be better if there is a fridge in the room (or maybe I didn't manage to find it) It's a little expensive to pay 15 bucks for the carpark.

Love the creative & artistic idea of room decor.  Good location. Polite, Nice, Helpful and friendly staffs. Breakfast line should be more various items to choose. But hey, you have a real good bread selections. I'll stay at your hotel again for sure.  Thank you for your hospitality!

Stayed on a 16 sqm, room with King Size bed. Room has TV, Phones, Safety Deposit Box, Rain shower and amenities. Complimentary Bottled Water, Coffee and Tea, Extra Pillows, Laundry Service. No Bidet at Toilet.

Hotel is conveniently located in Bugis area of Singapore, close to Bugis and City Hall MRTs, malls and restaurants. Room is very small but it's cheap considering the location, so it's good value for money. Staff were friendly and helpful. Free use of Handy was great, I didn't have to get a local # fot a short visit. When I checked I found hair in the bathroom and sink wasn't very clean. The next day after room cleaning saw another hair on the bedroom floor. Cleaners can do a better job, but that's my only complain about the hotel. Will recommend it to friends who want to a good value stay in Singapore.

Stayed at the newly named G Hotel previously called The Big Hotel. Well it is just the opposite as the rooms in the hotel are very very small. Everything was very compact. It is very clean and pleasant. You need to get your own hit water if you want to make a cuppa.  Staff are friendly and helpful.  However quite a few Uber drivers were not able to find the entrance to the pick up point which is frustrating and they cannot stop in front of the hotel as it is a main road. Location is great and the crowd is young and trendy. Lots of eating place. Might stay there again but not with wife as the room is far too small for 2 people.

amazing location close to the bus stop and subway stop. The room was lovely, views out on Marina Bay sands. Small bedroom but equipped with every comfort. Continental breakfast and tasty food. Staff always helpful and polite.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    .

review_title: Goof place to stay within heart of SG
review_text: Very nice deco hotel even room a little small but well equipped with all needed stuff. Very close to MRT ( Bugis stt or Rochor stt), shopping mall and easy access to any place around SG city.  Warmest welcome that you may feel right after step in yr room. Restaurant in 1st floor is a good place to take dinner with friends. Highly recommend ^^ Will be a plus if room equipped with refrigerator

review_title: Enjoyed our stay in this funky, chic hotel
review_text: We really enjoyed our stay at Hotel G, which has a funky boutique hotel feel. They upgraded us upon check-in, and our room was comfortable, quiet and had more charm than most hotel rooms. We slept very well.   The burger bar and hotel restaurant are both very good; the burgers are fantastic and so was the luxurious brunch we had at the hotel restaurant in the morning. Service was very good, too.   Our only complaint was the inefficient check-out process. While check-in was seamless, we stood in line for 15 minutes in a packed and claustrophobic lobby to wait until we could hand in our keys and settle our tab. Too many people were checking in at the same time as people were checking in; the hotel should consider having a dedicated line for guests checking out to expedite that

I had a great time during my stay in G hotel, from the hip design, affordable price and prime location. The check in and check out were very smooth, staffs are helpful. I definitely will recommend and make a come back. Thank you!

Very small room, with no natural light, sink is so small you can’t wash 2 hands at the same time. I’m 2m tall and i would not fit in the bed. It’s ok for business if you stay a night but not for holidays

Loved our 3 night stay at Hotel G. Close to Bugis shops and MRT train station. Great hotel. Loved the dream catcher light above our bed! If you are adventurous and like to explore Singapore with a comfy hotel to come back to, Hotel G is a perfect choice.

No fridge, bed was placed in an awkward position and i had to climb over every time i need to go to the toilet. Noisy as some renovation works were under going. Do not like the dream catcher hang on the ceiling.

Spent 4 nights at the hotel. A nice and clean, though small, room with a very comfortable bed. I felt it was a bit weird having the sink in the room itself and not the bathroom, but it was a minor thing (and likely more of a personal preference).   Free water bottles were restocked every day (as opposed to what I usually experience that bottles are present on arrival but then don't get restocked afterwards).  Located a few minutes' walk from the nearest rain station and 30-45 minutes from Chinatown - though only a few minutes by train. It is easy to get anywhere in the city by accessing the train system.  Overall a very nice stay.

I went on to book breakfast, however the staff that serve me didnt tell me about the timing or the breakfast too. 10 plus i call and check then was informed that till 10 am. Cant refund too although i went to check. Lousy, wont want to stay here anymore

review_title: Great guest services, a good scent
review_text: Recently stayed at this hotel, have a minor problem about the room I just checked into, within hours, the guest service manager upgraded my room so me and my wife would have a better experience, the ambience is great, room is always serviced by the afternoon, and the scent of the lobby to the hallway of the hotel is great, I regret not asking the front desk how they did it.

review_title: Service was horrible wasted my money and time.
review_text: Im Singaporean citizen and  enjoy doing staycations. I visited many hotels in Singapore. And I've experienced the best and the worst hotel services. But I have never been so disgusted and disappointed with the service of G Hotel & Ginetti restaraunt. My 2 days stayed in was a waste of time and money. From the very first day till I checkout.  1. Water heater in the bathroom is definitely NOT working.  2. I was not inform the breakfast timing upon checking in. 3.Host ( Irene) was not professional at all. She need to learn what Customer service is all about.  4. They mess up my breakfast again.  5. Even after I checking out the head of customer service officer ( Farhan) still failed to solve the issues that they cause.  I don't believe that Mr  Farhan insisted on not returning my

Great location (once I discovered the nearby MRT!), cool vibe, helpful staff and good value for short stays in Singapore. Whilst small, the rooms serve their purpose and this place is overall more fun than one of the more traditional mainstay hotels in SG.

It's our first time staying at this hotel. And we're really impressed. The staff are so friendly n welcoming. Hotel setting is so cool n nice. Room is very clean, quiet, not really that spacious, though...but it'd good enough. Free Wi-Fi. The coffeehouse-bar-restaurant is so nicely done...nice deco n food. Wow! It's the happening place at night, nice place to chill n hang out. Strategic location, walking distance to many good eateries n shopping areas. It's so good.

Easier to ask the Taxi driver to stop you at the main road instead of driving up to the 2nd floor as the turning up to 2nd floor is quite tight If you need to get a cab, wait at the main road. No need to call for booking with extra charges  I like the water dispenser at each floor - easy to get hot water and no need to boil

I stayed here for 4 days had just a few days to see Singapore I must say good hotel for few days unfortunately not a swimming pool  liked the modern style of the hotel,   the location was great in the centre of Singapore lots of shops around and Bugis shopping very close on walking distance, supermarket very close 2 minutes walk especially the smart phone in the room maked everything easy to reach with maps and free room to room calling  the funvee bus was just 10 minutes walking buy your hopper pass in advance on klook.com  just a tip  the rooms where very small almost no place to leave your luggage's certainly if you have 2 each, but the rooms where very clean and 2 water bottles free a day and the use of free smartphone certainly a bonus point definitely good location but

review_title: Nice location, good design small rooms
review_text: The room is too small. Not enough space to put my suitcase anywhere else than under the bed.  The wifi is good. but sometimes whatsapp communications don't work.  Overall average experience, mostly due to the size of the room

Room environment quite beautiful and clean. Staff services and attitude very nuce and kindly including receptionist，waiters and waitress and housekeeping. Gym and food is good. The water refuse refill machine is convenient.

Had a great few days based here. Rooms were small yet efficiently laid out. Staff super-friendly, professional and helpful. Would definitely visit again. Gym small yet . Handy phone option useful. Breakfast was lovely.

I love the design of the room! It is so cool and feel like home! We love the provided toiletries as it is a natural product and it has very nice lavender smells. Also, there is even a water and ice cube dispenser outside the room, which is very convenient for us! Last but not least, the staff are very nice :) Overall, we LOVE the hotel :)

Awesome room, centralise,  helpfull staff, definately will come back again.  My only concern will be the car parking lot for guest. I gotta pay $15 for a night parking which i believe most Hotels dont charge their guest for a stay.

review_title: Clean Rooms and nearby Bugis area
review_text: The room clean but small , need to put bags on the small  table, waiting area also small.  the gym is small but equipment is suitable. No swimming pool and no free breakfast. Have to pay extra for breakfast. A bit overpriced considering the facilities and guest area is mostly taken over by a Cafe and Restaurant  downstairs. Lobby is at 2nd Floor which is small. Waiting area for customer also very small and cramp.  Feels more like a Hostel but paying Hotel price.

Located in mid Bugis and near MRTs (blue, yellow, and green line). Room and decor was really nice and modern, amazing facilities (you will get a free phone with free internet and calls). The downside was the bathroom shower was too small and easily get flooded (because of the design). It's hard to take a shower with 2 yrs old haha (i brought my daughter). There is no mini fridge in the room which is weird for this kind of hotel, however you will get a ice bucket and also a thermos for hot water. A little bit hard to enter the hotel from L1 if you bring pram, but it's not a huge problem. Overall, it's a really nice hotel.

Very nice small hotel with small but decent size rooms. Decor with taste and very good location. On the ground floor access to restaurant with a nice morning breakfast.  Very friendly and helpful staff.

If you are in Singapore, Hotel G is the place to stay! Beautiful and clean rooms, great amenities, and phenomenal location! It was beyond our expectations and we can't wait to go back and stay even longer next time!

A very pleasant stay in a very well located hotel in the city of Singapore. The staff is extremely competent and friendly and the food and drinks are great. I absolutely recommend this hotel for business or pleasure.

The hotel is simply amazing and has very convenient location. rooms are new and clean with fancy design. I especially love the comfortable bed and a free handy phone to take out. will stay here for my future visits to Singapore

The hotel and the room are well designed, and very clean.  Front desk staffs and cleaning staffs are always with a warm smile and kindly help us. The location is good that there are 2 MRT stations nearby and it is also convenient to take bus. And the dining area of this hotel is also fantastic!

Hotel G is a well run hotel with everything you need on hand. It conveniently located to the city centre with a short walk to the local MRT station. The only negative is that there aren't kettles in the rooms but a conveniently located Starbucks remedies this.

The stay was good and comfortable. I am yet to get confirmation of cancellation of deposit made with the hotel.The hotel is well located and accessible to transports of different modes. The service was courteous.

Hip hotel in grate location, love the decorations and cleanness of the room. Excellent staff, all helpful and friendly. Love the Handy Phone service provided in every room, very useful to have free internet service all around especially travelling solo, although the phone is a little hard to use. Definitely will recommend Hotel G to all my friends who is travelling to Singapore!

It was my first time staying in G Hotel. Overall experience was great. I just had difficulties with the entrance. I used uber all the time and they often got confuse on where to pick me up. I even had cancellation because they entrance was difficult.

General speaking the experience, it was my third time to stay in this hotel, great location, near to Bugis, but everytime if I need to walk out of the hotel, I need to walk thought a western restaurant, especially at weekend night, the feeling was so weird. Make me feel like Where am I . But the room and staff is really great, the front desk staff was very friendly, when she knew I'm from china, she changed to speak Chinese with me. And said welcome me back to hotel G again.  I'm sure that I will come back again. It is a good hotel to stay.

I love everything about this place.. the room is amazing even though it is small but it's just nice for two people.  The location is great. In between bugis and Dhoby gaut, more food choices can be made and a lot of exploring to do.  Oh! I love the full bath amenities they provide!

Overall the stay was fine for a short 3 night business trip. However, the check in experience was one to forget and given first impressions count, this did not bode well for the stay. The person checking us in decided to "round up" by about S$20 our room charges (my colleague and myself) to get to a round amount. This was without even asking us first. This is a ridiculous dishonest policy and I would ask all future visitors to beware of this practice.

Perfect for trips to Singapore because of close location to MRT Bugis and Bras Basah (10 min and 5 min). Modern room concept so that there is enough space even in small rooms. Stylish Hotel concept which makes it easy to feel like home. BReakfast varaiation, selection and distribution of the breakfast court could be improved but all in all great modern Hotel.

review_title: Very nice Hotel, but problem with space in room
review_text: Everything is perfect in this Hotel, but there is no space wardrobe in the room and that's a big problem I did not where to store my dress and shirt :-( If I should stay a couple of days I will come back here for sure, but for longer stay I am not so sure...

This place is fantastic. Been to Singapore many times and I found this to be a real gem for the price! I was very happy with the staff and I feel the room had great modern decor. Close to great spots!

Everytime I go to Singapore, i always stays in Hotel G. Great service and friendly staff, I also like the decoration of the guest room, simple and kinda vintage. The location of this hotel is perfect to go to Bugis where I can go shop.

This is the second time i stay in this hotel (first time was known as BIG hotel). Overall, everything still remains good as before and even better. No doubt the restaurant is serving quality food, however not much variety available for the the breakfast buffet if compared to international group hotels; but the price is almost equally the same as international group hotels.

Overall is good but might can have some improvement in the room as me and my mum, our leg keep knock the bed rack accidentally, quite narrow and wish to have Swimming pool. They are good and considerate, very suitable for old peoples and people who got disability as they got the facilities in the room.

Fantastic staff, great stay in Singapore. Perfect location with a great restaurant offering delicious food and the best value glass of wine in town. Rooms are compact offering everything you need, nice amenities and a comfortable bed. Modern design hotel a 4 min walk from Bugis MRT.

The location of the hotel is very convenient, walking distance to Bugis area. Rooms are very comfortable, love the decors and the amenities. Maybe can improve on the hair dryer though. Staff is friendly and efficient.

Singapore is a shoppers paradise! Hotel G is very convenient located close to 3 MRT atations within a 5 min walk. Easy to find and very modern and clean. Communication is great and check in and out was seamless! Thanks so much for your hospitality. Will definitely stay again!

Hi, i am a frequent visitor to your hotel on business trips. sometimes a day and sometime the whole week. everything is ok except that as a 4 star hotel, i would expect that laundry bag is made available free. apart from that, everything else is good.

Great location, friendly staff and super breakfast. Clean and quiet. Room phone very helpful in town. Room very small, no space for even a chair (1202). Moisture in room too high after shower. Entry via stairs a bit strange.

Service, location, room interior, staff are very good. I think the cost is a bit expensive because there are no bath room and refrigerator. When you buy a drink you must deposit it at the reception desk. but I want to stay again when came to Singapore with short trip!

Thanks for good accomondation, nice location, Burgis near - china street food, market, some suveniers you can buy there. The room is rather small but comofrtable, furniture is new, the condition system is okey.

The hotel was clean cosy and well located! The service was excellent and the staff was helpful! But the rooms were really very small you can't even walk or store your suitcases! The bed will be small If you are over 1m85. The breakfast was so poor that we regretted to wake up for, small omelettes, no cheese, no fruits and bad machine coffee!

A really good base. Safe, clean, private and centrally located, and a really amazing breakfast. I have used a similar chain over-seas. They are ideal for business and, due to the lack of carpet and modern decor scheme, a lot cleaner than some of the 5 star options.

review_title: Great location, atmosphere, very clean and bar staff were fantastic!
review_text: First impression was the back street carpark that led to reception which didn't feel like the best start to what turned out to be a beautiful hotel.  Once checked in we found our modern and well presented rooms to be ideal for our stay except there was no storage for clothes other than some hangers and a shelf, again this ended up working out for us but just not what I've been previously used to.  From there it was only upwards.  The foyer bar and restaurant are beautifully presented and the staff were extremely helpful.  We had dinner one night at the restaurant and it was a high quality meal.  The French influence really showed in the menu. If we had a question the management staff would spend the time and effort to help us and also spend time making us comfortable.  The

review_title: Very Small, Refurbished, Mid City Location
review_text: Rooms are clean, refurbished, modern - but too small for families or for friends traveling together. More suitable for single backpackers or couples. Very expensive for the size (S$180/night, perhaps due to location). For wheelchair/stroller, can use mini stair lift at the bar lobby. Many eateries & shops near the hotel. This kind of place would've suited my backpacking days - but now that i got 2 babies; it bothers me that the stroller is occupying the whole room alley. That's how compact the room is.

review_title: This is a great experience in this big city
review_text: I find it delightful the quality and the good taste of the refined furniture and general appearance of this hotel. Tiny, well conducted, with friendly and helpful staff, I really couldn't ask more...maybe some more space in the rooms! The great restaurant is also the element to complete your staying in the best way.

review_title: Very small still on 2nd visit after new brand.
review_text: The room have slight renew.. still clean and cozy.. but is very very small...  Compensated that it is well located with must vegetarian stall around the hotel... very good location... and new subway opening next month.. will be even better.  Have slight issue with the door key scanner... not able to enter the room for few times.. need to go up and down to get the technician.  *p.s.   no fridge provided...

review_title: Small but well located and cosy
review_text: Clean and very well located hotel, close to MRT stations and most attractions in a walking distance. Rooms are small but stylish. Perfect for a short stay.  Water dispencer is a great idea, more hotels shog!ld adapt this, saves the city from a lots of plastic bottles..

review_title: Shower problem and a little details
review_text: Hot water was not stable and cannot adjust, 1 sec was cold 1 sec later was very hot. Electric plug cannot use, they are loose. Shampoo / Soap/ Cotton bud quantity are not enough for 2 person, too stingy .

Rooms are tiny but they are very clean. It's a great location to get around to sight see.reception staff not the most helpful. No maps in English, I had booked breakfast in my stay but it didn't open till 7am so missed it due to early flight and nothing was offered instead like a pack to take with me

review_title: Awesome Hotel in really good location
review_text: It was an awesome stay and I really enjoyed my time at the hotel. Really good service in a really good location and the room was so nice and modern. I liked it very much. So I would come back anytime!

Smooth Checking and they gave us a early check in. Wifi speed is good. Friendly & helpful staff. Poor breakfast, Less varieties. Room was smaller than expected but the bed was comfy.  Could have been better experience if the wash basin was inside the wash room.

I made the right choice to choose Hotel G  the employee are very helpful, nice and we had an excellent service.  Our room is very clean and bed are very comfortable. The hallway smell very clean and smell good!

I think all work good, may be you can not make limitations for filling this column, i think it is just make people lazy to read reviews or should i postpone it?  Hsjsj j jgj j gk g j g jj ggh k kjjူ ့ ူ jjj g k hj g ig

Hi there, Thank you for hosting me for the past 6 nights. I like this hotel so I would like to give you some feedback to help you improve. First, although you help me store my stuff in fridge, rooms without fridge quite surprises me. It's not convenient I can't store some drink or food in my place especially I am a long-stay traveler. Moreover, there is only one wall socket while the port was loosen! I felt annoying when having my laptop and mobile phone charged while the charger kept falling down. Last, just a suggestion that bathrobe can make travelers feel home, if you can consider to offer that. Overall, the cost of price value is lower than I expected. (Probably because of F1 period.)

review_title: Great budget Hotel in city center
review_text: Hotel G is a great place for a short stay. Essentials have priority: good shower, good mattress, good internet. The rooms are quite small but comfortable. Nice materials used. Staff is extremely helpful and attentive,

review_title: Nice boutique hotel with vibrant night life.
review_text: The overall experience is superb. The only complaint is the mattress is too soft for my back and I didn't sleep the whole night. But that's more my personal issue and not the hotel because I believe many would appreciate it. The walking distance to Rochor station is manageable.

Stayed there for a short business trip. Short ways, friendly staff, very small (but sufficient) room size. Just confusing is the entrance in a parking-house and where to go out first time. Don't bother to go to public transport: Taxis are reasonable priced and fast on call from reception.

Great location, clean rooms, and staff are very helpful, bar is great and food was very tasty! However rooms are extremely small!  You don't want to be a tall person staying here! The room is as wide as the bed!

review_title: Excellent location! Room is very clean. and bed is extremely comfortable ! I will stay in this hotel again in future.
review_text: Bus stop and MRT is walking distance and it is easy to travel to tourist attractions. Bugis shopping area and little India is also walking distance . Room is not in big size but for single traveller , it is good enough.

This hotel it's very good location and easy for go everywhere. It's easy to find food and drink around there. The room very clean and good smell. The staff very good for service to customer. The room small but it's have everything full option.

Had a great experience with the team and very impress with the interiors and concept of the hotel. Definitely coming back again and will also recommend friends over. Recommended for business travelers due to the convenience of location.

review_title: All good apart from room being too small
review_text: The hotel location is great, the staff are nice and accommodating, only drawback is the room being too small and so is the front lobby which is also a bit tide to get into by cars, even for a single use in my view the room is too small, no closet, no place to place suitcase.

Fantastic little tourist haven central to all Singapore can offer. Tidy cosy room with everything you need. Fantastic addition of a handy phone providing guests with a Singapore  phone with calls, data for maps etc on the go whilst exploring the city. Super concept.

I always stay at Hotel G whenever I am down to Singapore for Business trip. The staff are friendly and helpful and the bed are one of the best I have ever slept on. The burger restaurant at ground floor is probably the best burger joint in Singapore. Love it.

review_title: Good Hotel But Room Ergonomics Let's It Down
review_text: Good location and a very modern vibe to it, but the layout of our very small double room was poor. The double bed touched 3 of the walls and you had to climb over one another to get in an out. The light switches we're out of arm's length and the one for the sink area (outside the shower) was right by the door. All in all, it was a disaster of a room to use, with nowhere to store luggage and difficult to move around in without tripping over one another.  On the plus side, nice breakfast and handy location.  Don't be fooled by the kettle. It's actually a thermos flask you have to fill with hot water from the machine outside the room; again counterintuitive.  And be warned: $SG16 for a large beer in the Ginett bar downstairs is taking the proverbial even by Singapore price

review_title: A comfy boutique hotel at the heart of singapore
review_text: Everything were great , only maybe the room was too small for 2 persons. Location was perfect , only walking distance to bugis market and bugis junction.  The environment were great, walking distance aswell to the nearest MRT and bus station

the small stair on the wall is tilt. putting the shampoo and the body wash on it is difficult. if the wall is wet, the bottle is easy to drop off. it did bother me during the period I stay. i need to take care of the bottle during the shower time.

The hotel is well situated between China town and little India in walking distance of countless theatres and restaurants. The facilities are well maintained and the hotel provided one of the better breakfast buffets I have experienced in a number of years. The staff were all very friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay here again given the chance.

review_title: Nice design but the bathroom not clean enough....
review_text: Nice design but the bathroom not clean enough.... like the location.... and the service is good.....  check in place looks nice and good service overall........  I will suggest to my friends if come alone but not with family... the room I stayed was not big ....

Room was small,but comfy for a solo traveler. Friendly staff please maintain it :) comfy bed and linen,complete amenities.handy is very very useful,great idea :) will recommend this hotel to Friends:)

I recommend if you want good value for money, central, and direct to the airport. Fun fact, the room comes with a cellphone with unlimited data. Could be useful to find its way accross Singapore small maze.

value for money, strategically located. recommended for solo traveller. nice restaurant on the first floor. friendly and helpful staff. newly renovated room. nice bed, cool aircon, good decoration. satisfied customer

Super friendly service started before arrival!!  I required some parcel to be received on my behalf prior to check in and it was delighted handle. Room is small but nice and comfortable, add one small fridge will be a big help!

The room size are small but trendy. A mobile has been provided to guest for free call to hometown and free online data usage, excellent!  The hotel location is good, just few minutes to shopping center / MRT station by walk.

We travelled by MRT from Changi and had no problems finding this Hotel. Check-in was busy, but the staff were very efficient and we had no issues. Our rooms were small, but very comfortable and totally adequate for our stay - we could even see Marina Bay Sands from our window. Everything was really clean and properly stocked. Breakfast was excellent, with lots of choice and provided a good start to the day. All the staff from those at reception, to the cleaners and the breakfast staff were very friendly and helpful. We walked everywhere from this hotel - up to Marina Bay Sands, Gardens by the Bay and Little India - using the maps from the Hotel. Singapore is beautiful and Hotel G just made our holiday totally fab.

review_title: Nice location, comfy room, just the cleanliness is a concern
review_text: Overall, I had a quick but nice stay. Location was close to Bugis stn, direct from airport, restaurants widly available. Nice hotel staff and comfy bed. Only issue was a bunch of hair found everywhere

The hotel is clean and well-presented, but the rooms are barely wider than the bed.  I would stay for 1-2 nights but no longer.  Food was decent at breakfast (I did not eat dinner at the hotel).  The included laundry was a good touch and was convenient.

The hotel is overall an ok one. I've been staying at other hotels just a bit more expensive that has more space. Stayed in rooms from 2 different price categories in this hotel and both are very small. I'm tall (191 cm) and my feet is touching the opposite wall when lying in my bed in the smaller of the rooms I tried.  Was also unlucky to move in to a room that wasn't clean. Dust in the corners also on the 2nd day, i.e. after the room had been recently cleaned. The gym is ok size but quite small, but that's more common here in Singapore. It lacks some simple and very useful things like a yoga mat, foam roller, etc.

It was an extremely comfortable stay, the staff were all very friendly and helpful in providing whatever I need. The stay would have been beyong perfect if there were rooms with bathtubs available, the bed facing the TV (instead of facing the toilet in the room I got), and Netflix or movies instead of cable channels! :) but overall, I'm satisfied with what I got for the price I paid. Would also like to commend the buffet breakfast, was very pleasant and enjoyable! Love the stay!

review_title: A great hotel for the traveller with minimal needs.
review_text: If you want a clean room with decent bed and a shower at a great price this is the hotel for you. No pool for gardens, rooms are simple and efficiently designed to maximise the size of the room. suitcase fits under bed, room is width of the bed, TV over bed, Don't expect full room service, so this is not a hotel you should be planning to spend a lot of time in, They have a decent food options onsite, staff are friendly and willing to help were they can. I would certainly look to stay here again. if you know what you are getting and not login to get (i.e.. pool) then this is a great hotel for the price.

We found the decor and location excellent and enjoyed our stay. Unfortunately we were in town for only the one night and will quite happily book again when we are next in town. Only 10 minutes from MRT and five minutes from Bugis St.

We had an amazing time at Hotel G Singapore. The staff was very very friendly and helpful about everything. The room was very clean and comfort. We think that the hotel is in the best location in the city. It is nearby metro and near to very nice places to visit. The breakfast and the restaurant were awesome too! Also it was perfect that the hotel gave us a smartphone with internet that we use it for exploring the city ! Thank you for everything... We had a great time and we hope to visit Singapore and Hotel G again!!!

review_title: location is good. beautiful compact hotel.
review_text: small, but quiet and clean and room. small shower room. too small space for opening and packing for big suit case in the room.  minimum traning machines and equipments in fitnes room.  We Japanese people want Washlet to be equiped with toilet.  good location for walk around little India and China town for shopping and dinner.

Was here in June earlier this year with friends. Had a good experience earlier in terms of hotel experience and also local town connectivity. Had to come back to Singapore for a single day trip for my exam and had no doubt regarding my choice of stay. Love the phone handy. Great going hotel G.

I really love the location of hotel. Very Convenient and full of food stores. This time we live four nights n every day we get back room will see all equipment are cleaning up. Let's have a good sleep. A Very Good Hotel .  btw , If rooms have refrigerators will be better .

Hotel G is located in an active part of Singapore and has a very friendly and helpful staff. The restaurant is very nice, especially the breakfast. The only thing I did not care for was the size of the room, very small.

review_title: Simple and That's All I need
review_text: I loved staying at Hotel G, it's what I really wanted, a small space but is made up with good food and amenities. When I had arrived I was greeted with the friendly staff even though I was soaked in sweat carrying my luggage from the MRT.  The Brunch was great, a good pick me up from being Jetlagged.  Also important to note, you get a cellphone with the hotel that gives you unlimited data and calling locally, in a word LIFESAVER! It helped a bunch to get around, I debated extending my stay because of it

Tasteful contemporary decor. Economically designed yet comfortable. The room isn't big but it benefits a lot from high ceiling which I really loved. Staff are effective and helpful. Only downside is perhaps the elevators which are kind of slow and confusing. Wine selection in the restaurant is great too!

The location of the hotel is good, walking distance to bugis and dohby ghaut. However, the room is really really small, so not recommended for people who cannot take small constraint space. Overall it was a pleasant stay, the room is clean with a nice dream catcher hanging from the ceiling.

The room is small, and there is no refrigerator, and no table/tray for placing the baggage. Only two AC outlets avaiable which made charging my electronic not convenience. The power cord of hair blower is hard to extend to view the mirror.

always love this hotel. location is very convenient near Bugis station.  tastefully decor a little chic and a little artsy. decent breakfast. nice bar at night too.  there was a burger place at the corner looks good but haven't had a chance to try it.  only down side, the sound proof of the room not up to expected level.

review_title: Very good place even for staycation
review_text: Within walking distance to both Bugis and Dhoby Ghaut Nice room design and decor with pretty dreamcatcher despite the small room size Good breakfast There are 2 restaurants at level 1 for dining and drinking

review_title: near to bras basah and rochor mrt station
review_text: good service and the rooms decoration was so unique  near to mrt station  if beencolen mrt station have operating  it will be the nearest mrt to the hotel  near to orchard and city hall so you can reach them with the nearest bus stop

Your hotel is very nice for single budget traveler ,with walking distance from MRT. The room is just big enough ,but that's all I need with bet and toilet. I would like to advise you to have more TV channel because all I could watch was CNN other channel was even more boring. I did bring my own ,a HDMI player , but your TV's HDMI was lock for what ever reason. I also like to have a stool or chair in the room ,because I don't always want to sit on the bed such as when I put on my shoe. I'm giving cleanness 4 because I found the matress was a bid dusty under the sheet. THank you

I love the ambience and the theme .Location is perfect but if only the Great rooms were a liitle bigger,it would have been perfect! I love the idea of a free phone and internet use to call love ones back home.It was very useful when we went around the city.Will definitely come back again.

The room was way too small, with a bed against the wall , which was not great for a couple as I had to jum over my husband if I wanted to get out of bed earlier. I had requested an early check in and the staff at the counter didn't even acknowledge it or offer me a service or a space to change or refresh.  Hotel facilities are neat and well designed, but the above made my impression of the hotel not great.

EXCELLENT. - get rid of dream catcher, please.  - room was not vacuumed of swept thru whole 3 night stay - handy phone was terrible, kept on rebooting every few minutes - love the water pressure and heater! and super comfy bed!

Overall the hotel interior design is beautiful, the staffs is friendly as well however when i about to check-in there is a guy who wear suit which  might be the manager didn't get to service me, instead another guy came over approach me for checked-in

I have traveled all over the world, mostly being put up in 5 Star hotels around the world. Hotel G is a fresh new approach and market niche that will certainly have many takers. I am sold. That is for sure.

Rooms are very small, have limited storage space, and do not have a complete separate bathroom(the washbasin is in that part of the room that contains the bed). Other than that, I was very pleased and satisfied.

I spend two nights at the hotel. The first feeling is of it being a bit "crowded" as the building is narrow and the reception small. Service was correct. The room was small but cozy and well designed, I missed having a mini fridge, but they solved it with some free ice and water on every floor, which was interesting. The best of the hotel is their restaurants with amazing food.

review_title: Nice Hotel. Simple Rooms. Cool bar/restaurant. Great location.
review_text: We stayed in Hotel G for one night. $100/night (including taxes). The location is good - in more of a residential area. From here we walked to local coffee/breakfast places and had traditional kaya toast breakfast. Our room was very simple and VERY small, which was fine with us. We were just looking for a room to crash in for the night. The hotel is close to  Orchard Road (high-end shopping) and Bugis Junction (a large mall, shopping complex).The location of this hotel is perfect if you don't mind walking a bit. It is smack dab equal distance to Little India, Bugis Junction, Orchard Road, and the colonial section of Singapore.

review_title: Value for money at a beautifully designed boutique hotel
review_text: I stayed in the standard Good Room Queen for a 2-nights staycation over the long weekend. At that time, Hotel G just got rebranded and was newly launched so I wanted to try staying at the hotel. It was a great experience. Here's why.  Location: The convenient location of this hotel is probably one of the factors why many will stay at this place. It's a short walk to either Bugis or The Grand Cathay. You can catch a late night movie at either place and not have to worry about missing the last train. It is also very near to Rochor Beancurd, which you can go to satisfy your late night food cravings.   Cleanliness: Rooms and the general interior of the hotel was kept very clean and is very new.   The Room: The room was well designed and made the most use of the space available.

Great value. My girlfriend and I spent the week in Singapore staying at this hotel. It's at a great location and the breakfast is awesome. I would definitely stay again. The rooms are interesting. The Prince music every time you enter the room gets old after a few days, however. The bed was short for me. I'm 6 feet tall.

Strategic location hotel, 24hours halal food beside hotel..they give me room upgrade for two nights..great experience and nice breakfast, friendly staff, nice decoration room, there is a free dispenser in room corridor

nice location and great idea to connect a bar and a burger joint to the hotel. only complaint might be that the wifi should use an encryption password (open hotspots are bad) especially cause there's a request to login

review_title: Highly recommended for a short stay!
review_text: This was my first time visiting after the  renovation. It was good but I like the previous concept and reception location - very accessible particularly for business travelers. But anyway, I am recommending this hotel... value for money , accessible with any options and cleanliness of the room.

review_title: Excellent service i was accorded to me.
review_text: The hotel is very good and centrally located, it is very easy to access other places from there. I enjoyed my stay there, very quiet and relaxing environment. however, in the room i occupied, the lighting system need much to be desired. Am usually particular with food, but i had no problems. The hotel serves very delicious meals with wide variety to accommodate almost all people. I will definitely remember about G hotel, and each time am in Singapore, i will try to lodge there.

My office booked the room and I was a bit disappointed as the room was so narrow. I stayed with my wife while I just checked out from bigger hotel. I think the hotel is good for short tripper and backpacker as the room offers only the essential of having a good night sleep.

Good location and stylish decoration, however, air conditioner's fan is directly to the head, which is annoying during the night. 24 hours fitness center and good coffee at the first floor. 7-8 minutes walk to the metro station.

review_title: I had a great time in Singapore!
review_text: The room was very clean and comfortable. And you can use wifi always smoothly. Especially, Handy(mobile phone for customers. It's useful when you need to contact with someone!) was awesome! I had a great time in Singapore. This hotel is perfect, except the bathroom! Because the bathroom didn't have a door between toilet to bath space! Just bath-curtain is not enough...!!!

small room but excellent business  hotel average breakfast kind house staff Claen room with new renorvation comfortable bed  strongly recommend  for business trip or couple modern stylish room 5min fro subway station 9Rochor)

i am surprise about airplay function in tv, but sometimes i found it difficult to link on it, sometimes it's ok in the morning but after several minutes ,it can't work, and after we went out all day and came back to hotel, it still can't work

This hotel is very original, modern, the location is very good, close to the metro, the room is a bit too small, but the equipment rather not bad, by cons I can not close the lamp that is under the bed, so all night the room is light, I slept very badly

review_title: Have a glass of wine at Ginett's.
review_text: I very much enjoyed Ginett, its staff and the good (and affordable) wine list. Compliments to Toby Durham and his staff. The room (0932) however was small, just enough for 1 person. Location is good, on walking distance to all major attractions.

It's a nice hotel, food was fantastic, good location, easy to go everywhere, close to the shopping mall.  Little thing to be improved, Bathroom is easy to get wet because of the design. Room was a little humid.

review_title: Cozy, clean hotel in convenient location
review_text: I came across this hotel by the Internet search, but I was quite happy with overall experience.  Perhaps best suited for solo travelers or couples.  Nice interior with a wide range of amenities provided....if only the rooms could come with a refrigerator. The location is quite convenient too, just a few minnutes walk from Bugis metro station.

I stayed at the G Hotel for the first time and spent 3 days/2 nights in this property. I enjoyed the fresh look, the design and overall ambiance. the employees were extremely friendly and helpful. Upon arrival, I ran extremely late due to a 2hr delay of flight and traffic and once I had reached the hotel, I had a group check in in front of me. As I needed to speed up the check in process, the front desk team was kind enough to call the manager to assist me immediately to ensure I didnt have to wait until the group checked in.  The housekeeping did a great job in preparing the room and keeping it clean at all times and so did the service team in the restaurant during breakfast and lunch (I skipped breakfast but had a coffee).  I will certainly stay here again. Location is ideal

Overall is great but we stay only one night for very shot trip. Surely will be back and recommend to friends for longer trip. Price is moderate, not much high for you can afford with great and vibrant location.

It's was splendid stay at Hotel G Singapore, It's the marvelous choice for art and cultural experience since it is located every near to Design Center, Art Museum, national Gallery and other local art and design community. I love Handy, free mobile from G hotel a lot :)

It was nice, clean, and comfortable.Free ice and mobile phone services were also satisfying. However, there is a slight reluctance in the room without a refrigerator.It was mostly satisfactory service.

Frist impression for Hotel G is very fit for young traveller. The room decoration is very efficient and young generation style. Foods at restaurant are delicious. Hotel at around shopping center and public transportation so it's good for shopper. Recommended for business and young generation, but my opinion the hotel is not for recommended for family traveller with children.

Nice Fashionable decoration! Good location, a lot of museums and Bugis shopping area nearby! Only eight to ten minutes walk to MTR! Room a little noises at night! Overall is good and valuable! Highly recommended!

Hotel G pick-up and drop off point is hidden and the entrance is not clear. Very hard to spot and to know where to enter to drop off or to pick up. I got problem with my booked ride because of this. But your very helpful staff was able to help me.

review_title: A cozy place to live in Singapore
review_text: All displayed picture on G hotel website are exactly the same with reality. Rooms are so cozy and interesting with their vintage decorations. I love the way G hotel decorate rooms with Dream Catchers and room color.   The check in process was quite slow  but the staff was friendly instead.  Everything is fine to me except for the breakfast, it was not impressed, and food was just normal quality.  Since I really love the decorations so I would be back when I'm in Singapore again.

Thank you for your great helping. my staying was almost satisfied. Staff were so kind me. But I was not able to sleep well. Because, in hallway's speaker was noisy during night. Please turn down volume of speaker in late night. However, staff has changed my room. Thanks to your kindness. I'll go to G hotel again. Thank you so much!

Terrible check-in experience. Requested for early check-in but staff insisted that they do not have a room available. Then when I asked "what if I pay" they suddenly have a room available but at a ridiculous walk-in rate. I just needed a room to take a shower before going to the office. The staff tried to sell me a room for a walk-in rate of 200+ SGD. What an expensive shower! The room itself is very small and noisy. The only positive experience this hotel has to offer is its bar / restaurant. I would not recommend this hotel.

I generally think the hotel is good however the transportation to the hotel and out of the hotel was an issue. Many drivers are unsure where the lobby of the hotel is and are unable to find the pick up point. Perhaps have a sign out side the road to show a clearer direction would be helpful

review_title: TWENTY FIVE DEGREES BURGERS, WINE & LIQUOR BAR
review_text: TWENTY FIVE DEGREES BURGERS, WINE & LIQUOR BAR is located inside Hotel G.  Ordered a takeout of their Number 2 burger that comes with beef patty, roasted tomatoes, Burrata, crispy prosciutto, pesto with brioche bread.  Not the best burger in town but inexpensive at $14. Good for those that has some diet preference as well as there's craft your own burger menu.

Chic and clean room. Staff was efficient and friendly. It would be good if the room has a fridge and offer room service for food. Nonetheless, a great stay. Value for money. Would definitely recommend to my friends and family!

little room excellent experience. Location is so good, typical S'pore streets, combination of religion and morden bussiness. All time hot water and Ice. 5mins walk to MRT Bugis Station. shops close in two blocks

i think that is a good experience for me. So sad it don't have any surprise or arrange for my wife birthday.  the bathroom was too small and the temperature was cold and hot. You can't control the temperature.

I like a lot the breakfast. it is so delicious and there were many type of food. The room is small, there aren't wardrobe but it's clean. The design is very cool. it's far 650 meter from metro station.

review_title: Best in class for Singapore for this type of budget boutique hotel.
review_text: Good value for money. I was there on a short biz trip and stayed in a queen sized bed on one of the higher floors. Room design best in class for the money. I was pleasantly surprised. The staff were particularly friends which always impresses.

Good service, nice room, nice breakfast, cozy, i'll recommend my friend and my fam. It's near to MRT and bus. The service was nice, they help us for information where to visit and transportation. I hope i can back next time.

review_title: Ok, but not for bussiness travel
review_text: Stayed for 7 nights at Hotel G in a very small room, unable to hang clothes and get ready for work very easily. Could not check in until 4pm on day of arrival - nowhere to have a shower or change. Restaurant stop serving breakfast at 10am...but really stop putting food out at 9:40. Ginnet restaurant/25 Restaurant bad in the evenings - no way of giving any preference to hotel guests for tables over regular customers (not great if you have had a long day at the office to then have to leave to find food). But! Room was clean, bed was comfy, shower was good, internet was reliable - so for a vert short stay its probably fine.

Great service, rooms may be small but it's sufficient for a comfortable stay. Hotel staff is very professional and helpful. Bedding is extremely comfortable. Location is good too, lots of restaurants nearby (I highly recommend Tanuki Raw, which is just a few mins walk away).

review_title: Excellent experience to stay, hotel space is a bit limited
review_text: Overall, everything is just pleasant, except for, the room space is a bit too tight, TV programs are moderate in choices around 15-20 selected programs and the hotel entrance is not obvious to find. Otherwise, good value for money during the promotion.

There is a good shopping environment near the hotel. And there are different routes MRT can be choose to ride. There is a bar and a nearby snack bar at night, and the hotel offers many kinds of breakfast before 10:00 AM.

Excellent choice. Good and clean room. Nice toilettries. Cute decorations. Feels like home inside but small rooms. Not enough for big luggage. Anyway, definitely will come back again when visiting Singapore

a very hipster and young hotel that caters well to your leisure stay. clean and well equipped with the needed necessity. This hotel is strategically nested in the busy city of Bugis. Definitely will recommend to friends and be back to stay if i'm in Singapore.

Enjoyed our stay in this hotel except the hotel room a bit small. Very happy with water dispenser with hot and cold water at the corridor. the bed is comfortable enough with 4 pillows and toiletries provided was good quality.

review_title: Enjoyable 02 nights' stay Hotel G Singapore
review_text: With very central location on Middle Road, close to MRT station Rojor, Hotel G is very good choice of hotel to stay downtown Singapore. Rooms are not big but well shaped, breakfast is various and staff very friendly. Ginett Restaurant is a great option for Singapore's night's out as wine is very affordable.

I spent 1 day over here. Overall everything is excellent. I want to mentioned the lobby greeter, she was proactive to assist me, escort me to the front desk. I stay in Rm820, but the dress switch is faulty

Nice hotel with great design. Nice room with comfortable decoration, however, the size of room is bit too small especially the bathroom. Nice breakfast with delicious tastes. Gym room is wonderful. Overall is excellent.

We had a spare night down to Singapore on our way to Indonesia as we are traveling with my father in law and fiends we did want to stay in a great location within a budget. The hotel itself tick every box of it. Centric, contemporary deco with a nice city traveling feeling. On the ground floor  you have a burger place and a more relaxing elaborate dishes restaurant at the other side of the property. By the way... if you need to find the entrence better ask the staff. You will never find it easy as there is on the second floor and you have to take a walk into the restaurant to access to it.  Stayed at the 7th floor. No matter as there is not city view as such. Fairly small room but well stock up. You have more than you need at the room. I would not look somewhere else if I have

The hotel is well located and the staff were friendly and efficient. As an older traveller I was not taken with the rooms - very small, no wardrobe or shelving just a chrome shelf with 4 coat hangers; the handbasin is outside the bathroom and luggage must be stored under the bed in a purpose built alcove. The bed is on a platform under the window so access to blinds etc required clambering over the bed! The bed is very comfortable and  breakfast is good as long as you go early as some items are not replenished. The facilities are more suited to younger people who seemed to be in the majority when seen at breakfast.

Liked the European style.  Excellent food. - Rooms could have been a little bigger for the money - A different entry to the Hotel only from the ground level could have been nice. Instead of climbing through the Bar and Restaurant, especially when they are really busy. - Reception area space again. But overall Hotel G is unique from the regular hotel industry. And thanks for that experience. Will definitely come back for the Food :-)

Functional Hotel Rite In Town. Walking distance to nearbyTrain Station on the green light to airport Just Below the hotel is 24hours local eateries. Lots of taxis in the area. The bigger shopping malls nearby are also walk able.

Overall stay was pleasant. Size of room was compact. Cleanliness definitely can be improved on as one of the pillow cases was stained (probably with chilli sauce). Location definitely a plus however. Returned here for the 2nd (or 3rd time) for occasion. Would be lovely to have some rewards.

Average hotel, staff not as helpful.Don't know why need to pay for use of slipper? the hotel name G Hotel is not easy to find in Agoda and Hotels.com because it's a new name. A little expensive for the room size.

The standard room was very small but the room is well-equipped and well-decorated. The location near 4 MRT stations but all needs a bit of walk. Overall, It's a comfortable and nice hotel and I have a great stay experience.

Nice place to stay, but very small rooms. Was very difficult even to put a bag in the room.  Very good breakfast and good position. Almost 1km for the closest underground station. It's good but a little bit expensive

I stayed n G Hotel for business trip. I havent heard before this hotel, first time I saw.. I am so surprised! Very good decoraction.. Very good concept, very clean.. The staffs are very helpful, friendly even at that time so many guests to checking in and out.. I hope can stay there someday

review_title: woest check in and out ever, not helpful staff
review_text: worst check in and out ever, not helpful staff, no hospital skill at all, hotel's location is the best, but wont be back here again because its staff. One of my recommendations to the hotel owner is to putting more heavily on its staff

Lovely hotel, with funky décor and amazing breakfasts - plus a real bonus having a 5 star restaurant on the doorstep. Great location and handy to all the local shops and walking distance to multiple places.

I have stayed a few times at this hotel when it was known as BIG Hotel except it is now known as Hotel G. Essentially not much has changed in terms of the rooms but the service seems marginally better and the new F&B offerings seem more interesting than previously although I didn't have the opportunity to try them on this stay. I like the location of the hotel as it is walking distance to Bugis Junction / Bugis + and Bugis MRT station. I would like to mention though there was one particular staff at Front Office named Bernice who made my stay more enjoyable, she was really attentive and very friendly yet professional.

review_title: Nice and stylish hotel for a good price
review_text: From the check in to the check out we were very happy with our decision. The staff was always polite and very helpful. The room was small but cozy. We had to store our clothes and other stuff on the floor and the desk, but for two nights it was okay. The style of the room was great. It was a bit retro with a modern touch. The highlight was a mobile phone which we could use outside the hotel with LTE and local phone calls for free. The OS of the phone was customized for guests who want to do sightseeing. Many discounts for attractions were available und some interesting articles about Singapore helped us to plan our day. A coffe an tea "station" inside the room was very nice. A machine where you can get hot and cold drink water was on every floor. So you could refill your bottles

Location! Location! Location! My 1st visit was in July 2017 and I chose this hotel for my 2nd trip to Singapore. Fell in love with the hotel. Love the room decor especially the dream catcher. Will definitely come back again!!

Cons: Extremely tiny rooms No Hot water kettle in rooms Very less choice of food for breakfast for everyone especially for vegetarians No proper signage outside. So, everytime we were to be picked up, the drivers would be confused on where to come. No hair dryer in the room Pros: Appealing chic/hipster decor in rooms Staff are very very friendly and helpful

It was very comfortable to use for the first time this time. Bed is comfortable, there is also a feeling of cleanliness, and the interior of the hotel is fairly fashionable because it is awesome among others. Also, the bar restaurant and Burger Cafe were next to the first floor, and the taste was delicious so it became a repeater. Access is also near from Bugis station, I'd like to use it again in a convenient location to go to various places. It was truly the best trip.

I always plan a visit to Singapore to see good friends and of course to eat. The area of choice to stay for me is always at the BUGIS Junction area. The hotel of my choice since l'm on my own is Hotel G formerly Hotel BIG. Very clean, warm staff, complete amenities for me, comfortable bed with linen to my liking! Looking forward to my next visit!

It was a very good experience staying at this hotel. The only problem was size of the room, it was more suitable for solo traveler. Will be back here for future visits because the location is excellent.

The hotel is pretty stylish! The location is very nice, which is close to my conference exhibition and bus stops or subway stations to most of the touristic spots. The breakfast and the bar are both awesome! The room is really clean and the wifi works really well.  However, there are two flaws. One is that there is no doorsill for bathroom, after the shower, the water would leak a little, but it is not a big problem. The other is about sound insulation. The sound of door closing and the sound from the ceiling which might be caused by the people living upstairs are a little bit clear. After all, the experience was really nice. I will also stay here next time I go to Singapore.

review_title: Don't judge a hotel by it's room
review_text: You can't compare the rates with the rooms, because this is Singapore. My first trip to Singapore and had a warm welcome ,tidy Rooms, free WiFi and drink water by G Hotel. Near to MRT Station (Rochor and Bencoolen).

review_title: Room is small but location is good
review_text: Room is kinda small but location is good and convenient. Parking is SGD2/hour or SGD15/24hours. Overall experience was good. Hotel official website is promoting "Best rate guaranteed". However, room rate offered by Agoda was even cheaper. Contacted hotel to enquire about the best rate but the room rate counter offered by the hotel was still more expensive than the rate I've found from Agoda. Hotel provided a mobile phone to be brought out during the hotel stay period with free data and local call.

Nice deco, cozy, clean but tiny hotel room.   The room I booked cost around SGD 100 which pretty worth the value.  Overall have a pleasant stay here.  Breakfast pretty decent but really like the design if the restaurant.

review_title: I had a great time in Singapore by staying an excellent hotel!
review_text: I was almost totally satisfied at Hotel G Singapore other than plugs. The staff explained plugs of the hotel have international design so that Japanese plugs are available. However, I couldn't connect all of Japanese plugs to the plug facilities.   However, in total, I had great experiences in Singapore with Hotel G Singapore. Thank you!

The room was comfortable and clean. Location is awesome, few minutes walk to bugis street, bugis junction, and MRT stations. Staffs are really helpful and friendly. Will definitely go for this hotel when I return!  Cons: my friend actually booked this hotel for me and updated my name but it doesn't seem to show in the system, not sure why.. but everything went well after showing the booking confirmation.

We have good experiences in Singapore for the first time of us. G-Hotel is very night accommodation and very closed to the city center (shopping mall, MRT station). Finally, i'm very satisfy to stay to G-Hotel during our trip, especially breakfast and dinner times at the first floor place.

review_title: Good location, Smart service, Clean room
review_text: As titled. But add on, no fridge. With security safe. All else are okay.   Location is at edge of the old civic area but now the art and literary district. Close to books, cafe, ethnic temples, modern shopping malls. Eager to please staff. Well decorated room with cosy lighting.

Breakfast has very good spread and good quality. Location is superb. Service is very good at breakfast. Hotel lobby is a bit confusing for taxi driver. Is it possible to consider renovating to have option of  2 single beds in some rooms.

I so enjoyed staying in the hotel. I wanted to leave to sleep the whole day as the bed was so soft and comfortable. One thing I really liked and was unique was the interior of the room. I would love to come back the next time I am in Singapore.

Best choice to explore the city of Singapore, to walk around and to have quiet rest at night time. Well designed space with atmosphere - you'll love that cup of coffee with smart book from the library on the ground floor.

Farhan indeed made our day, he has been at our service sine the days of BIG Hotel. He has checked me in on many ocassions, and I must say he has good memories of my requests. He has went all the way out to ensure that the replacement blanket was indeed nicely prepared and personally delivered it with a Housekeeping staff. I would like to comment on his service standards. well done!

Location, price and rooms are awesome. It is near town area i.e. Bugis, just a walk away. Halal food downstairs and easy parking for locals who is her for staycation. Nice decor and rooms and Handy phone is something unique and helpful especially for tourists.

Room ID was impressive and it has everything inside that space. You don't have to walk far from each space. Drawback is the room is really a confined space that my ear is not comfortable with that. And the car parking is chargeable at SGD 15/night. I got served by a male staff and the face is like i'm owing him 1mil and still need to serve me. Others staff was great with smile and greetings.

Stayed 5 nights - staff super helpful and friendly - breakfast food delicious and plentiful, great range of hot and cold foods- omelettes made to order. Great location, central but quiet. Ginette bar and restaurant downstairs was lovely.  We Will return again. Perfect for our needs.  Room small but clean, neat, and well presented.

Room is compact and nice for the price range but room amenities is lacking such as fridge. Lights are damaged. Room wall is quite thin that we were disturbed by guest in the corridor ar night, even though i had asked for quiet room. Staff were friendly and nice.

The room is small, but, only as for staying, needs no problem. It is convenient to go to wherever! The room is very clean, too! It was hard to know an entrance. When there is the staff who can do Japanese at the time of check-in, is great; is saved.

The interior design of each room is special. The rooms are cosy and very clean. It is located in a busy area but u can have really good quality sleeps without being disturbed by sounds on the roads. It will become even more convenient because of the new MRT station Bencoolen opening soon

actually this is a modern style hotel,room is clean. Only the shower space very easy get wet after you make a shower.  Better make a bit height step between the shower space and toilet.   Also the direction to the hotel better describe more easy to reach the hotel.  I been get lost when the day I arrived.  I following the instruction from your hotel web site but its really make me confuse.  I suggest exit from the Bugis station No.B will be more easy to find your hotel.

Great hotel.. Close to mrt and shopping malls.. Lot of places to get food if you're dining outside.. hotel restaurant was also really good.. room was a bit small but they have though about everything.. Clean rooms, friendly staff..

Our stay at the Hotel G in Singapore was tip-top! The hotel is modern and hip, the breakfast buffet vast and delicious. The hotel is located on Middle Road, which is quite central and close to subway stations.   Highlight: the hotel offers you a mobile phone that you can take out, make free calls, send free messages and surf the internet - for free of course.   Lowlight: yes, the rooms was quite small for the two of us (we stayed at the smaller room). We’ve already read it in reviews before we made the reservation, so we knew what was coming. Just be aware, that if you‘re travelling as a couple with two suitcases, it might get a bit cramped.   All in all, it was worth the money!

The location is good, short walk to 2 MRT stations plus one more in the near future. The room is clean and filled with required stuffs. Water filling and ice station on each floor is the plus. Staffs are friendly and helpful. The room and the public area is small and they managed the entire space to be most profitable, filled with bar and restaurant. The check-in counter is on the 2nd floor where guests need to take stairs. This will be a trouble to those who have large baggage.

I've been stayin here multiple times & i've no issue at all! From the day it's called BIG then it's renovation period (i stayed durin reno too!) mgmt changed, renamed G hotel but service was never compromised! Great location! Room was always clean & comfortable! Easy access to shopping malls & foodies. It's even great when staffs remembers u!   Will definitely stay again! 👍👍👍

It was an excellent choice, the location was great, just 20' walking downtown, the shell phone idea was brilliant especially for non Asian customers. Great breakfast, clean but quiet small room. Excellent wifi reception in all places

review_title: Really clean but absurdly small rooms
review_text: Great location, nice restaurant, clean but rooms so small and devoid of facilities that it would be best for single, very small people. Otherwise, everything was attractive and the staff courteous. They should mention in the ads that this hotel targets exceedingly diminutive guests.

The design of the hotel was really nice. But there's no Swimming pool which is a bummer. And the room was rather small without any closet space.  The restaurant has a Nice looking Bar and serves relatively good breakfast.

The decoration for the room are special even through the room a bit small but it is comfort to stay. There have a water dispenser nearby the room but the hot water are not so hot. Just couple of minuts it became cold water.

review_title: Very nice staff but room layout is a little unusual
review_text: Singapore was our last stop after travelling for 40 days. Hotel G was in a really handy location and the Bugis train station was a 10 minute walk. The staff were very helpful and pleasant and our sink was fixed very promptly ( it wasn't draining properly). Our shuttle was super easy to book back to the airport, water was supplied and a water refill/hot water station was on each floor.   Unusually, the bathroom was frosted glass, so turning the light on at night lit up the whole room. Not great if your other half is trying to sleep. Also, you had to hold your mouth a special way if you wanted the bathroom slider door to stay shut. Lastly, the basin was on the outside of the bathroom- so that was a bit annoying when you wanted to wash your hands in the middle of the night.  The

Singapore is one of those places where there's so much to do til late in the night that you don't really spend much time in your hotel. Hotel G accommodates this very well with its great location within walking distance of three mrt stations, and a 24 hour front desk with very friendly and helpful staff. The free cell phone to use is so helpful whilst out and about.  The room we had was definitely on the smaller side, with the handbasin outside of the bathroom which was odd. They also played loud elevator music through the night in the corridors but turned it off during the day again - very strange and somewhat annoying, but not a deal breaker.  Overall we were very happy with our stay - a couple of odd quirks but still a very nice place in a top location. We'd stay here again.

Hotel G, great location, friendly helpful staff, a great bar with excellent wines and food. Handy mobile phone provided with free internet use, handy for exploring the city. The only down side was the bed and access from just one side.

The place is nice and cosy. Had a wonderful night. The whole experience was excellent. The room is good, had a free upgrade to a better room. Went to the room, like everything about it. Most of all, a free phone to use for us to move around Singapore. Great for overseas travellers to try this experience.

Hotel G is amazing. 9.5/10 Just that I wish there's a mini fridge in the room. Lucky that the ice were just right infront of my room. Haha. Love the decoration of the room as well. Would definitely come again!

review_title: Pleasant stay in Hotel G Singapur
review_text: We had a pleasant stay in the hotel G SIngapur. The room was good. We enjoyed the breakfast and also the restaurants of the hotel. The staff was rally friendly and always helpful and could help us with all our requests.

review_title: Good hotel with a reasonable price
review_text: The hotel is located very conveniently around the MRT services and there are many foods/malls around . The room is a little small but everything is well equipped and maintained. For the price you get for this hotel, I must say it is really worth it.

Several problems.  The ice machine on floor 15 worked exactly once during my stay.  It was switched off when I arrived, and I had to raise that with reception; ice was only available after 30 minutes.  Then it broke down again, and for the rest of my stay, I had to go up and down the fire escape to get ice from other floors, since my keycard didn't enable the lifts to take me to floors 14 or 16.  (I had to seek guidance on that, since the sign on the fire escape door said "One way through door", which at worst was meaningless and at best suggested that once you had entered the fire escape stairs you wouldn't be able to get back out.)  Having to muck around to get ice is a particular problem at a hotel where there are no fridges in the rooms.  And I would observe in passing that

This is a wonderful hotel handy to MRT and local bus services. The rooms are small but so nice and provide a lovely place to rest after a day in the heat. Very much styled like Australia's QT Hotel chain but much cheaper. Great rain shower also. Staff helpful and taxi to airport readily available without delay. Breakfast is reasonably priced but range is very limited so I would question value for money. Bar is very pricey even in Singapore terms. Choice of cheap local eats nearby are excellent. Would happily stay at Hotel G on my next visit to Singapore.

Arranging taxis was a bit of an issue for my party. One staff used the singaporian app for taxi and the driver's license was not displayed in the taxi & the driver was driving dangerously. I asked about it and had explanation that the taxis were too busy and the staff used the the app. The next day another staff called a taxi for us but this time it was a taxi with a higher surcharge. The staff should have explained and asked if we were happy about it.   Other than this the service was just like the one you can expect in most of hotels.

review_title: one of the best hotel in singapore!
review_text: i have stayed for 2 nights in this hotel and its almost perfect hotel experience. the location is great, near food, market, malls, bus and train stations. the room is small but with a great style! checking in and out is fast. friendly staffs. free phone to bring when you go out!  the only comment is, they dont really check all the stuff inside the room. like the metis lotion, maybe the last guest who used the room i was in put something dirty and was still in my room. the welcome note in the room was not changed. the note was still for the last guest i think.  i suggest, that they check everything for it will be checked by the guests.

Nice place to stay in Singapore! Central located. Nice, small, tidy and cleaned room. Just missing a small fridge and proper coffee machine with pods in the room. Lovely and helpful staff. Fantastic breakfast!

review_title: Great experiences in Hotel G Singapore!
review_text: Nice location, close to Rochor MRT station, about 5 mins walk. Very friendly and helpful staffs. Clean and comfortable room. However, the room is a bit small and has no fridge. The bathroom is a bit small as well.

The location of Hotel G is nearly perfect because it's surrounded by numerous shopping mall / restaurant/ convenience store, as long as you willing to talk (2-5min) then you will be able to find a restaurant or shopping mall ! However the room is small but with this price in Singapore I can't complain about it ... I am very happy with my stay and will definitely come back again if I visit Singapore.

My travel companion and I were in town for the weekend to catch Cirque du Soleil and Yayoi Kasuma, we choose Hotel G Singapore because it offered good rates for Room+breakfast, which can get very expensive in Singapore. We don't regret our choice as the breakfast was good! There were pancakes, cold cuts, an egg station, and lots of freshly baked pastries.   The check-in and check-out process was smooth, and the staff were always smiling and very helpful. The hotel itself is located close to good food (Artichoke was our favourite) and walking distance to Bugis+, Bugis Junction and Bugis street.   The only downside was that the shower area was rather small, and water would flood the dry side of the bathroom. The bed was a lovely king bed, but getting on and off the bed would be a

I have very impress of kind and thougthful service, especially the handy phone. It helped us to experience Singapore more. Your location is perfect business as well as tourist. Your design is giod. We also love you coffee at the breakfast. Keep on good work.

review_title: Good spot, nice environment, with a fancy pub
review_text: Very nice experience in this hotel. Staffs are very very nice. Room is super clean. Plus, it has a very fancy and popular bar at the first floor. People are gathering there very night. Highly recommended if you are a social person.
