Generally, Hotel G is awesome in terms of location, cleanliness, values and service. Staff are friendly and polite to guests. All necessary information was provided at the check-in and when need. I did not use the gym.

Extremely comfortable bed in a very conveniently located hotel. The room has a mobile phone the guest can take during the stay to enjoy free internet everywhere and local calls included! Very good decoration and good bar. The rooms have everything one may need during the stay but they are a little small tough.

Kudos to your staffs! Very relliable and helpful especially the guy with glasses named Javier. You should keep him becauae he is the best! Always on smile and ready to attend us!  I will definetly comeback in Singapore and check in to your hotel. Keep up the good work!

This place is anazing for couple's trip. Their room at small but looks spacious. Good for two people. Their bed is amazing soft like duck feathers. The hotel gives us free hot and cold water including ice maker on every floor how amazing is that.

Stayed over the weekend in this very trendy property. Friendly and efficient staff at front desk and restaurants. I tried both outlets including the burger at 25 degres and the chocolate molten cake at Ginett. Room has got a very good flow and functional. By the way there is a dream catcher above your bed, a nice touch.

I like the room style. The staffs are really friendly and helpful. I would like to recommend my friends. For the hotel's restaurant, the cocktails are not good, a bit too watery, probably need to change the ice quality.

The room was really small - even for a city hotel. The shower curtain was moldy. We had a really nice view out of the hotel room and the distance to the next underground station was only a couple minutes walk away.

review_title: Fixed the lift and sign to enter hotel G
review_text: the lift is very slow, other is oke, and also please put clear SIGN to enter hotel G, because UBER / GRAB cannot find this hotel entry, sometimes they need 20-30 mins only to find, because no qlue for that

review_title: A best deal in a central location
review_text: The staff above all were extremely friendly and helpful. Although compact the rooms are well equipped and compact with all the amenities you would need. Internet was so reliable and fast. The continental breakfast served had a good range. It was so thoughtful of the hotel to offer a free of charge handy mobile phone with unlimited data and international calls to selected countries. The bar and restaurant on the ground level was fancy yet reasonably priced and attracted quite a crowd too. The place is walking distance to public transport, shopping malls, food courts, convenient stores etc. What more could you expect....

Stayed here with family in June for 2 nights.  Very near Bugis Junction.  Modern, funky decor throughout the hotel. The room is tiny (most Singapore hotels are) but it is clean and bed was very comfortable.

I had a good room with a window! Extremely comfortable very clean bed, plenty of space. Hot water and ice for drinks available all the time. Very friendly staff, very helpful. Breakfast reasonable price and choice. Breakfast system could be improved- not always enough tables and often window tables prepared for lunch at 9.30 -so even fewer available!! Maybe need a few more staff to clear tables at breakfast time- mess spoils experience. This is my only moan- I will stay at hotel G in the future - good situation.

review_title: Perfect base camp for Singapore exploring
review_text: Rooms are clean, well furnished and with good A/C. Staff are friendly and efficient - no complaints there. Central location - easy access to Orchard Blvd and food hawker areas. Only complaint is that the restaurant/bar is pricey for what you get. Cocktails are average and same with the food. Good bar service staff though.

For environmental friendly, no need to deliver everyday new set of shampoo and body wash, only change the towel if being put into a towel basket. Better to have twin beds room for choice. Better to inform guest about need of charge of local call through room telephone. Better to have shield to prevent shower water spreading to the floor near the toilet

Good Location. Good Value for Money. Nice Design. Friendly and helpful staff. Very interesting design without exaggerating. A bit difficult to find the entrance if not arriving by Taxi. Frnt Desk speed can be imprved

Receiption ares is a bit small that makes the check-in and check-out a bit congested.  T he staff are very helpful and sincere.  Room is clean and modern. Breakfast does not have much choices. There is a good variety of drinks

review_title: A cool, funky hotel close to all the action
review_text: From the décor to the service, I found my stay at Hotel G Singapore to be a most pleasant and memorable one :) The bar at the base of the hotel was also a nice touch and served as a great meeting place for friends.

Is a excellent hotel in everything. The room are not big but they are perfect, the decoration is very good and turns the room in a cosy room. The breakfast is amazing, all good, a lot of things. The staff is very good, every time ready to help. The location is good, very near little India, and with a small trip with taxi is easy to go to all singapore attractions.

Very good hotel and friendly staff, i really love this hotel because there's a free flow hot and ice water also ice cube ! The room design is so unique, a bit problem with the hot water in bathroom because the water temperature keeps on super hot sometomes eventho we're turn the temperature to normal, but thats oke not a big problem, love the ambience.

4 stars? Maybe not! I think that not deserve 4 stara, this hotel seems 3 stars, for some things maybe also 2, rooms sooo small, staff for the breakfast sad and tired...  And.. Why the restaurant is francois style???? Is terrible!

Close to everything I need on my business trip. The F&B outlets serve as both meals and entertainment cum meeting venue. There's also a convenience store & local fastfood that open til very late. My room on 15th floor was quiet & undisturbed by sounds of traffic. Extension of my checkout to 1pm was very much appreciated, as I had could rest a bit more until my flight in the evening.

Good location** **require more information upon check in.  Good but except, No lift at 1st floor. We have to carry the bag by ourself upon C/I. C/O no one bring luggage down for us. **Staff at breakfast was very nice.

Stayed here recently for seven nights. It's located close to the Bugis area of the city at the junction of Middle Road and Bencoolen Street. The nearest MRT station is currently Bras Basah, which is 5-10 minutes away on foot. However, Bencoolen station will be open from October 2017 and that will be a little nearer.  I arrived at the hotel in the small hours and was dismayed at the smallness of the room, given that I was on a ten day trip plus only two clothes hangers were provided.  However, once I'd managed to arrange my belongings, it wasn't too bad. The room was pleasantly cool and the shower good and hot. Beverages were provided, but you need to get hot water from down the corridor in the provided jug.  I didn't use the adjoining Ginnet restaurant for breakfast, but I did

review_title: Check in was very slow but the it's a good place to stay
review_text: The place has the chic and stylish appearance and very easy to look for. The room was clean and bed was nice. I enjoy hot and cold water and ice that hotel supply. Coming to the hotel can be by Bras Basah, it's closer than Bugis the hotel advise.   Check-in was very slow and taking a lot of time though, I was very tired by looking at the staff doing all the check-in process for us. Could be faster!

Location quite good.  Not so far away from MRT station.  Hotel lobby located on 2/F.  It might not be convenience for bulk luggage visitors cos visitor need to get up a narrow stair from G/F to 1/F to take lift to 2/F.

Nice hotel with friendly staffs. Only 5 mins to orchard road or lityle india by bus. Small restaurant and 7-11 are not far aways the hotel. Hotel is very clean with comfortable bed. Room is not too small.

It is good location and nice facilities. Room it's self wasn't so big but good enough to stay one person by business. I haven't tried but there was nice bar and hamburger restaurant at ground floor. Maybe I'll use again when I come back.

The stay was alright.. The handy guide phone in the room doesnt work. The lotion was already open wen i wanted to use it that means the cleaning staff did not check n replace a new one. The shower is leaking so its annoying at night. Overall everything is ok. The room is very nice..

The first room assigned to us is too moldy, but reception arrange another bigger room for us to deliver their apology. The experience of staying here is great, and the facilities in room and public spaces are both pretty and modern! The gym is also cool!

review_title: Really great hotel, great location, good room.
review_text: We stayed in this hotel as a couple for two nights in July 2017.  We found this hotel to be fantastic location wise as it was walkable to some attractions but also quite close to an MRT stop which connected two lines. This gets you pretty much anywhere you need to go and is so easy to use. There's also a closer stop currently under construction just down the road.   The room was good and definitely had a lot of character. The shower was great and we had plenty of towels and toiletries. The bed was really comfortable, there was good AC and we had something I've not seen before - a free mobile phone for you to use during your stay. It connected to the internet, you could call mobiles for free and take it out and about with you. We didn't use this but it would be a good addition to

Facilities: public vending machines for hot, cold potable water and ice cubes / mobile phone called `handy` for free INTERNATIONAL unlimitted calls for some countries (Indonesia is in the list).   Room has no fridge and the sad thing is, I was put in a disabled room -.-" . The room is big though

It was an amazing 4-day stay at Hotel G! Would definitely come back again and recommend to my family and friends who will be travelling to Singapore in the future! Everything in the room is on point!!!

Room too small and unable to move around much. No refrigerator, swimming pool & pipe sound in the middle of the night. Walking distance to MRT a little far and not that convenience. Air-con temp no different when switch from 18-26 degree

Its location was very great to walking subway or bus station.And I was very happy for the handy phone is very useful for my tourist.I will have it next time and share to my friends. A happy time. 200enough

The hotel was located at a very strategic location, however the lack of signs made me confused of where the entrance was located. Thought he bar and restaurant at the entrance of Hotel G was amazing and the overall designs of the room was amazing, including the gym as well.

I booked this hotel based on positive reviews which I still believe is the experience of most guests. Location is great with easy access to transport and commercial areas. Hotel seems newly renovated and is clean but be realistic with expectations of space. The small reception lobby is on level 2 and to get out into the street is via the restaurant on level 1. I was not so lucky being given this teeny tiny room with a big column in the middle of the window thus blocking almost half the window. The bed's length is the room's width so so you can only get to the bed on one side and cannot get to the other side. As a person who is almost claustrophobic, the room was too small for me to be able to relax. Please understand my ratings will be based on my personal experience.

Great job hotel G providing us an wonderful experience in Singapore, keep it up and we shall visit you guys again soon. We also wish to seek you guys improve on the cleanliness of the bathroom as we find out there is some hair left over when we first step in. Overall was great.

I stay for 7 nights, 10 mins walk from bugis MRT, many shopping center, food court and i can enjoy buffet breakfast but few of choices on hot plates. For the welcome drink if i can enjoy for every day and would be perfect~

Really nice experience at Hotel G Singapore! Room is clean and well-designed with lovely decor. The space in room is quite enough for one person and one luggage. Staffs are friendly while check in and check out. Recommend to everyone!

My partner and I just returned home after spending 2 weeks at the Hotel G and it was an awesome home away from home. The staff were always helpful and accomodating, from check in, booking taxis, providing extra blankets to the brilliant housekeeping staff who no matter what time we went out if we put the sign on the door, we came back to fresh linens and clean towels.  We stayed in a Good King Room, so had a king size bed. Only downside was due to Size of the room the person sleeping near the window had to climb over the other if they neeeded the bathroom during the night. For a long stay there was a lack of cupboards to unpack proper but storage cove for the bags under the bed was great and they provide hangers and a rack to hang things if needed.  The location is perfect for

review_title: Very pleased with affordability, design, food offerings, location
review_text: Hotel G exceeded expectation with streamlined check in, polite staff and espcially sweet house keeping, clean rooms, great amernities inside the room, design concept in the room with care to conserve, food options downstairs and central location. A diamond!

From the minute we enter until the moment we checked out. The best! Very helpfull.. very nice room! And the smell is so nice! Down side only the bathroom. The water keep splashing out makes it wet on the toilet area. Other than that.. A+++

Nice and clean hotel. Eventhough the room is small and no wardrobe, the furniture is placed and decorated properly. Not recommend for the man who is over 185 cm tall, your feet may exceed the bed and against the wall. Very nice restaurant and wine bar. The location is 300 meters far from Rochor Station. It's so convenient.

Special appearance of the hotel and facilities, quite and clean environment, 10 mins walking to MRT station, fair prices for the service. Providing drinking water helps travelers a lot since the weather in  Singapore is hot and humid.

The room is super tiny, but clean and well decored. Hotel is strategically located and the restaurant serves until late. Didn't granted when requested for late check out so I don't know if they could.

review_title: Great spot for a Singapore stopover
review_text: I stayed at Hotel G for one night on a stopover in Singapore between Europe and Australia.  I really like the decor and amenities of the hotel, but I did note that the room I had (single room but with a double bed) was extremely small.  Twas totally fine for me, travelling alone and just staying one night, but I think it would be very cramped for a couple or a larger person!  The room is cleverly designed for compact storage (eg there is a space under the bed for your suitcase, and the safe is also in a drawer under the bed) but I imagine this could feel cramped for a longer stay.   I do really like the fact that Hotel G provides you with an internet-enabled smart phone that you can take around with you during your stay (eg for maps, tourist offers etc) and they also had a

Room is too small, difficulty in walking around. At Mid night, I ned to to to Toilet, I must crawl over my partner's body in order to get on Floor, as a result, my partner was awaken. I have left no more space to walk after putting my 2 luggages. Definitely, No worth value of Money. Also, I was suprised during checked in. The staff asked for deposit SIND 100. I visit Singapore and stay in Hotel twice every quarter, They (Hotel) never and never asked for Deposit. I guess it is not a very good approach. Positively, I got what I requested, Thank you.

I had 3 nights stay at Hotel G . Overall experience was great, hotel staff are very friendly and helpful. The room is very clean and cozy. Good location; Just a few minutes walk to Shopping Centre and metro station. I would definitely recommend this hotel to a friend.

Very good hotel rooms are small but very sufficient ... no mini bar/ fridge in room to store drinks  Very close to mrt and china town short walk to many shopping and sight seeing  Hotel very easy to get to and find Great friendly staff

It's a good experience to enjoy this hotel. I like our hotel room. It's recommended for young people who like to take photos bcs the room has a good decoration. However, the check-in procedure takes a lil bit long for me and I can say this hotel also a lil bit expensive and when I slept there the room beside or in front of me are really loud, I can hear their voice clearly so it makes me feel annoyed. But still, this hotel is good enough. Thanks for the good services.

Services, breakfast buffet are very good except room size (G Good Queen Room), not suited for family trip with a lot of luggage. Just a few minutes walking to Bugis Street and Bugis MRT. There are 2 restaurant next to hotel which provide Halal Food.

Heart of little India, location is good. Chic type hotel, well fitted out & comfortable.  Booked the Great King room & while it's small, it's well appointed, nice amenities including rain shower.  Staff are nice, German staff woman at breakfast intro seemed totally disinterested though. Breakfast selection is fine, only realised there were two levels to restaurant half way through meal. Recommended 👍🏽

This is a very nice hotel. We stayed there for a few days with the family. It is very near to a lot of fine places. The rooms are small but but very clear. Excellent shower and bed! Breakfast is a bit expensiver when you compare it to nearbye local places.

well location and easy to connect to different MRT and even just walk distance to hot spot, clean room and well facilities as well. staff is also friendly and provide really nice service. absolutely recommend to stay in Singapore if visited.

There's no chair, so you don't expect to work or eat something in the room. Otherwise, you should do those on the bed. This is a little bit awkward for me.  You don't expect to take shower twice a day? I had to clean up the floor after taking shower because I hate using the toilet on the wet floor. And then, taking shower and cleaning up the floor again. Is there any smart way to use both toilet and shower?

The hotel is located in intersection, so it makes it easy for me to get to the bus stop. 10 minutes walk from MRT Bugis. The bar on the first floor is makes this hotel looks luxurious. The staff are very friendly and very helpful. The room decorated is so cool. I love that. But, the electric socket for hair dryer was so bad, it difficult for me to dry my hair.  I will stay again in this hotel when I visit Singapore.

review_title: Funky, hip hop and happening Hotel G Singapore
review_text: Quirky,hip hotel with the comfiest bed!! Amazing use of space. Staff were efficient and very helpful. Conveniently located to all the major attractions in Singapore. Hotel has 2 restaurants open to the street - Burgers were delicious. Breakfast was chaotic so get there early. A very busy, vibey lifestyle hotel - recommended for a 2 night stay max.

Nicely designed room, clean and clutter free. Easy walk to harbour/CBD and MRT stations, including airport line. Close to a great hawker food hall. I've stayed at different kinds of hotels in Singapore, from budget to fancy - this wins.

All staff are very nice. Good service. They always help us. The room is very good and comfortable. I love free ice and hot water. The decorate in the hotel is cool. I also love the good smell in the hotel. :)

Room is cleaning, Food is good,Stuffs are kind, Traffic is convenient, Check in and check out experience are good, But room/washroom is relatively small, and will go out for hot water(it's better to be mentioned clearly). and lobby is not easy to be found when first come.

I have always booked Hotel G or Big Hotel for my short trips to Singapore and never had any unpleasant with my stays ever. The room is cozy with amazing bed. Wifi is fast and stable. Nice decoration and clean. The bar downstairs is chic and has excellent cocktail. My only drawback is breakfast buffet does not have many choices for hot food and i wish soup based dish to be added.

the place is really nice, well designed and thoughtfully decorated  staff are helpful and informative, yes there are some that looked so young and seemed puzzle when stream of people coming in inside the room, the ambience is really soothing and cozy (just too bad that the hair dryer can't seem to stick on the plug so it was really hard to use)

Overall is good besides hard to find the lobby and room kind of small. The signboard to lobby need to state clearly as most of the ppl were searching the lobby besides us. Location and services are vry good. Average i will rank this hotel 3 out of 5.

Need proper co-operation into the hotel. City map and Bus & metro station location map provide into the hotel room. Foreign visitor give the metro and bus card for as their need. Visitor give the tourist place information book for visiting tourist sport. .

review_title: Excellent hotel for short stay, the hotel is in very good location with easy access to all sights and food.
review_text: Excellent hotel for short stay, the hotel is in very good location with easy access to all sights and food.The only down side is the room and bathrooms are on small side.we were not there to stay in the room

Good location and affordable hotel.  Lots of food choices since it's around bugis area. Walking distance to bugis junction / bugis mrt station. Clean room and good housekeeping. The amenities are well re-stocked.

Hotel location is good in terms of distance to office buildings, shopping center and subway station. You can also easily find restaurants nearby. Although the restaurant in hotel seems to quite renowned in dinner time, I find the selection for breakfast very limited for fruits and warm dishes. They serve plenty of breads but that's not enough when a guest is going to stay for five nights. The room size is small but good fit for single traveler who carries 20" suitcase. If your luggage size is bigger than 20", you won't find a spot in the room to put your suitcase. Also, there is no fridge in room. I wonder is it because its a three star level hotel?

I was enjoying the breakfast. However , the room is a bit small, I took the first range of their room ( forgot the name) but still a little small to fit my luggage. But overall I will recommended my friends to stay there.

Pros:  * Good location. It's not right next to Marina Bay Sands etc on the waterfront, but it's not the opposite end of the island either. The walk there isn't too bad and cabs there are decently priced (we never paid over $12 anywhere except to the airport). It's also conveniently located to Little India! The immediate location surrounding the hotel is a nice area too.  * Friendly staff  * Well decorated room and very clean  * Two restaurants downstairs inside the hotel. We only ate in one of them (25 degrees, a burger bar) but we went twice because it was that good! And there are plenty of convenience shops and restaurants nearby too.  * Very comfy bed  Cons: * No wardrobe in bedroom. The room had a rail to hang clothing on, but not much space and only 4 hangers.  * The

Very good quality price. The staff was very kind and helpful. The breakfast place decoration was great and the good quality service. Quiet place to stay for leisure or business. Ideal for a short trip!

Every thing is great. Gym is nice and clean. Breakfast is not bad. Room has a little small, we order Hotel G Good King Room but the real room size is out of our expected(King room, we thought it will be a larger room). But totally is great!!!

Whilst the hotel was new and trendy, unfortunately I think a grave mistake has been made in relation to the size of the rooms - WAY TOO SMALL! For 2 adults with luggage this space is extremely too small. We had to climb over each other to get into bed, and step over our suitcases everywhere we went. There was "no room to swing a cat"!!!!!

Cozy and Comfortable. It is very near at Little India and Marina Bay Sands where you can walk around the place. It is very convenient. There is also a lot of choices of food chains to eat. At night you can feel the view from the outside. Their bathroom has no bidet washer spray and small and it makes us feel a bit uncomfortable.

review_title: small room but clean and neat
review_text: I stayed a week on July. It was good overall, (location, accesibility to MRT, breakfast, gym, staff). Although I just slept at my room, if you stay in a room long time, bigger room is recomended if the budget allows.

Room is too small for 2 person and a unslightly pillar dividing the 2 small window. I made the reservation for my guest.... why do I have to be there during the check in with my NRIC? And There is no complementary parking and it cost me a fortune for the whole day parking.

review_title: If you are a tiny person this works well
review_text: The rooms are small, really small.  Not designed for someone with more than on small suitcase, if you reserve a single.  The photos on the website do not show how small this is.  You continually dance with the bags, to get around.  Now hanging space if you plan on hanging up any clothes, just a rack on the wall.  Great location in the city with easy access to MRT and shopping areas.  Great restaurant, Ginette.  The 3 lifts are not computer synchronized, so they are either all on the higher floors or on the lower floors.  You spend a lot of time waiting for lifts.  Staff need to use them too.  They call the lift, when the door opens, they see guests then do not get in.  Dumb.  If they call the lift, then they should get in unless it is full. They have caused the stop on the floor

Hip and modern but with a minimalist edge. The bed was comfortable and the room had everything you need but was undeniably small. Plenty of lighting options, an above average wine bar, and there's a vegan sushi restaurant right across the street.

review_title: Great check-in experience! I recommend checking in
review_text: The room is small! But the equipment is complete! Also very clean service attitude is very good! Front desk staff can speak Chinese!The location of the hotel is very convenient! It's only a few stops away from the main attractions!All in all very good

I had a good stay in Hotel G. The room was so pretty and the staff is so helpful and nice. The decoration was impressive and the personal mobile guide was also a surprise for me. Just that the phone was not functioning well. That would be the only thing that needs improvement. Overall, I would definitely come back again for my next trip in Singapore !

review_title: Love this artsy vibrant boutique hotel
review_text: I love this interior decor hotel, very artsy, unique and vibrant. Fresh look for me who does travel a lot. The location is very strategic nearby to mrt, bugis junction, shops, churches and museums. The room is clean, but the mattress is a bit soft for me. The bathroom is clean and good amenities.  The receptionist check in is a bit serious, maybe too tired but the check out process is good friendly and quick. But the entrance to hotel for me is a bit uncomfie coz through the bar resto entrance, no direct entrance. Next time i will try the bar resto below, seems good and nice to have a beer there. Many good spots for taking photos for those like to selfie, wefie or prewedding pics.

The place felt quite cosy. Though it was only a quick in and out trip for me, I felt it's a rather personal hotel with a nice looking bar at the entrance and the burger outlet they had also looked delicious. I never really tried any of the amenities there as I was really in a short trip. I would have gone for the burger deal if I had stayed another day :p  It's a 10 minutes walk to either Dhoby Ghaut or Bugis MRT station, depending on the line you want to go to.   Plenty of F&B around the area and some even open 24 hours. There's corner of pubs nearby at Prinsep Street. For breakfast, I'd just head to Albert Hawker Centre for that good ole local food!  Bugis Junction is nearby should you want some shopping. And if you are looking for bargains and souvenirs, there the Bugis

The front desk is very warm and helpful (I think she's from Taiwan), while I need separate invoice for the business and private trip. Although the room is a bit small but it's cozy and I really like the decoration and lights. Location is great, you can easily find buses or MRT to several major spots. Overall I would absolutely revisit Hotel G for my next trip to SG.

Single bed is too small for a Westerner as I am nearly 180cm.   My feet touched the end of the bed and head almost touched the other.   TV channels were good.  Food in breakfast is ok.   Mostly non Western, but I am sure Asians like it.   Food at restaurant at dinner was EXCELLENT.  Staff are very nice.

This hotel's name was BIG Hotel, and i REALLY understand why they changing the name, because it's not so big hotel's room LOL..instead it has a small room. But even it's a small room, the design of the room is quite efficient. They provide everything in this room although i had to put my 2 giant luggages under the bed =D
The bath room is also small, but like the room, it is clean and provide everything we need.
The breakfast is so-so. Quite delish but very very limited option. The price is quite good compare to expensive hotel rates in singapore.
I choose this hotel because some people in tripadvisor said that it closed to MRT Station but in fact it quite far LOL. Maybe it's ok if we're going as a couple. But we're going with two toddler, it's not as near as i imagine ahahaha..

We visited it for business purposes. The hotel is in lines with other business hotels like- Ibis. Had we visited it on leisure I would have definitely given it a 3 surely coz of the size of the reception, absence of a pool and small size of the rooms. From a business hotel perspective, the good parts were that all amenities were available from business trip perspective even in the very very compact size. The downside bar and restaurant is definitely worth a try. We stayed there from Friday till Saturday and there was parties till midnight in the pub 25 degrees. It seemed like a prime spot of the surroundings. We not being truly party people loved the flow and stayed there till 1 am. One thing to note for all travelers to Singapore. It's very safe even at 4 am. We went for a stroll at garden by the bay at midnight and it was surreal. The next day we went to Clarke Quay at midnight for drinks. The taxi drivers work by meter at all times and no negotiations are needed.

Room size is small, but it is clean and comfortable. Great that handy phone provided by hotel is convenient to travellers. Staff  are nice and helpful. I would recommencement to friends and colleagues.

Unique of room interiors design.
Drinking bars with feeling of relax. Breakfast very delious. Staffs are very nice & helpfully.Surrounding of areas very convinence with public transportation, shopping mall, foods courts.

The hotel was excellent. Staffs were friendly and very helpful. We have been there for a short holiday in 5 days. The room will be a bit tiny for those who prefer to stay in a bigger room but for us it was ok. Just a little bit far from the train station so it will be tired of walking to the hotel after a long day travelling. But I noticed a new train station about to open just nearby the hotel.

Very great experience overall however the receptionist took quite long to check us in. It took so long we were literally pespiring in an air-conditioned room (or maybe the entrance to the drop off point was letting too much hot air in). Could improve on this minor issue. But once again, great experience. Will come again!
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_text:
Located next to little India and near Bugis, the location was great.
The room served as nice retreat from the heat and humidity of Singapore.
The room fit out was quirky cool and it provided a handheld electronic travel guide.
This allowed for you to use for free; google maps, internet and local calls. A great touch!
travel_type: Trip type: Travelled as a couple

review_title: Great location, good breakfast a bit small room
review_text: Nice boutique hotel, in a great location - 10 mins walk to Orchard on one side and 10 min to Little India on the other. Very well connected by public transport. The breakfast is good with a good range which is well replenished. The room size is a bit small but that is the norm across Singapore. Will surely stay again on business.

Initially the hotel was selected due to very convenient location. Easy to reach, great surroundings and close to a lot of happening. However after check in I need to say that it has far more to offer than just the location. Nicely designed and clean rooms with sufficient space for a Business Traveller or short SQ visitor, not to forget a confortable bed. Next to that was their F&B as well very good. The 2 Restaurants/Bars offer great choices and a very friendly service. At the same time the staff is not intrusive and keeps a very good relationship with their customers. I can certainly recommend this hotel and on my next SQ trip surely book again.

review_title: Value for money but can improve.
review_text: - my room are not ready so need to ask for a new one - they didn't replace new toiletries after i finished - i don't like their toilet design, the floor will flooded - the room aircond keep changing back to 23 Celsius

We stayed at this hotel for 4 days, the location was very nice. It had a lot of good restaurants nearby. And 3 different MRT stops depending on which area you're heading to. Rochor station would be the closest MRT station to the hotel. They also provide a phone with unlimited data, so that was very helpful especially being in a different country. The staff was really nice and helpful too. Would definitely come back here again.

- Fast check-in - Provide a mobile phone with free worldwide calls and data - Clean and comfortable room - Nice soap, shampoo, conditioner, body lotion and others - Nice and helpful staffs - Good location with all kinds of transportation

Enjoyed our recent stay at hotel G.Whilst the rooms are small,having access to bed from only one side in our case,they were clean and comfortable.The hotel is a walk from centre but there are plenty of places to eat and drink nearby.Staff vere faultless and very helpful.

Tiny rooms but decor and vibes made it feel very cozy. Sink was outside of the bath area, which was at first a little odd but didn't really bother me.  Great staff - very helpful and polite. Overall good experience. Great location. Nothing to complain, really.

The check in process was easy and quick. I got a room in 13th floor. The room was quiet big for 2 people (i reserved a good king bed room). The interior decor was super cute. But the bathroom was rather small yet i enjoyed it because it had hot shower! Its place is quiet near from Bras Basah or Rochor MRT station and quiet far from Bugis MRT. I can say that its location is really approcachable to any places e.g National Museum, Bugis+, Bugis Junction, Bugis Street, etc. I had a good time staying in Hotel G:)

I have been booking this hotel for my staycation and it's always a great time spend there. Hotel staff are friendly and rooms are well clean. Facilities are good and well maintained. Will be booking this place again soon.

The hotel location is very good because it's near to everywhere, basically. The room size is small, but design is super efficient. The provided phone is very useful, mainly use it as GPS eventhough it can't do tethering. Overall, that was a great stay :)

Stayed in the Great room and everything goes fine with wonderful amenities , location located in the centre of bugis , everything is on walking distances. Hotel room come with HANDY smart phone where you can surf , browse and call with F.O.C. Basically you can get food , drink or visit an art center within the Hotel G 5km radius. Would highly recommend Mikkeller Bar Singapore just at the back of the hotel ! They serve their own brewed beer and excellent outdoor or indoor for you to drink or smoke.

I love the hotel, the staff and the environment are so nice. Hotel even provide a cell phone for my convenient of contacting friends. I definitely will come back stay Hotel G for my next trip. 1 small thing is the breakfast not wide variety enough.

the total experience was good and wasn't expect the room ambience and overall decor to be so nice and practical..it will suit s best for couple as the overall was nice and romantic in some way.. ......

Greta hotel with great staff and facilities. Will go back next time in Singapore, can't rave enough how good the hotel was from the bar to the overall experience. One issue was the bar staff down stairs weren't that attentive as if they were too busy but wet just walking around after just purchasing a bottle of champagne. Other than that great hotel.

The swimming pool  i saw is beautiful! but i don't know how to go! maybe when person check in can told the people how can go to use facilities! just this ~ The room is very good! next time i will booked again!

new hotel, clean, very cool aircon, a bit far from mrt station but overall a very nice trip. Even though the room was small there is so much it is very close to a hawker center and it has very good interior and I enjoyed my trip I can't wait to come back!!!

Overall we were satisfied with the location service. Check in check out experience was very smooth with no problems and was well explained at the beginning. Not the best place if you are looking to have a long stay as the room size is small. If your looking to stay in Singapore for a few days its great

i enjoyed my stay at Hotel G. The room are so welcoming after a long day walking outside especially th bed. the room are quite spacious and clean. and i got free upgrade from a single bed to double bed.

Absolutely recommend staying at Hotel G. Everything about it is great. Especially the location, room, and amenities.  There's also the restaurant below. A bit pricey, but was convenient to get a drink downstairs.

It is a good hotel, although the room is relatively small but having all the functions.  Not close to the MRT station but all your needs can be satisified with the adjcent malls and supermarket.  The sound insulation is really good. No any noise from other rooms or corridor.

I stayed 1 night in Hotel G Singapore. I was in Singapore to see my friends and the location was amazing! I was near my friends, and all the trendy areas. I was able to walk to my favourite club (which was great!) As well the staff was very friendly and helped me to get around when i needed help. The room was great as well, loved the decorations.

Pleasant check in experience and the time to do so was short. Only inconvenience is the reception located on the 2nd floor. Ideally located to various amenities, food court and in addition to being closed to the MRT station.

Honestly, I only booked with Hotel G because of the $6 wines at Ginett. I did not expect much from the hotel itself and I was pleasantly surprised.   Check-in: I emailed a few days earlier to ask for early check in as I need to freshen up before attending a conference later that day. As usual, it's based on availability and I was lucky that day. Check in process was quick and easy.  Room: No doubt the room I got was tiny (not sure if I got Good or Great), but it's very comfortable. The toiletries smell divine, I had to ask housekeeping for extras. There's the usual 2 complimentary bottled water which you can refill at the water cooler in the corridor of your floor. There's a usb port you can charge your device from. The Handy phone is very convenient so there's no need to buy a

the property is very nicely appointed but the rooms are simply too small to be comfortable. if one has no need or desire to chill in the room, then its adequate. not having a fridge is not great as well. ginnet bar/restaurant is very nice though and this is a good place to chill at. perhaps having more dedicated areas here for hotel guests would be helpful

The hotel location is great. Close to Bugis Junction. The room is small but coZy. It's lack of electric kettle, though, make it harder to make a noodle cup. The restaurant is understaff for a busy morninf breakfast

Dont trust if they said they have upgraded you.  Dont ever move into a corner room. Dont wear slippers after your shower, the wooden floor is so so slippery. The main entrance/lobby is so hard to access by cab or someone dropping you off. Some of the lights cannot off (no switch), dont understand why.  So have to sleep with lights on.

there is a lot of spots and shopping mall near the hotel. the overall appearance is quite good. you are a young people, you should like this hotel.  but please remind that the room is a little small. it may not good for a family trip.

The possible optimization we wish to feedback is front desk service to customer; At 5/7/2017, we planned to travel to Night Safari and we were advised by the Hotel G staff to use the SAEX bus but the staff do not perform prior check with the bus provider because the bus was downed for that time slot. After 30min waiting, we made a phone call to bus provider to find out the reason and lastly we have no choice but to take a cab which cost SGD35 to night Safari. Thus we wish to advise the Hotel G staff to perform a quick check with any service provider at the early of the day prior to advise to the guest. Thanks

All compliments to Nurfahana for a wonderful check in experience. Thumbs up for having this staff at your front desk.  You may want to reconsider your room wall artwork as some of the artwork may be unpleasant for some guests.

I was on a business trip. The room was cosy and it was like a boutique hotel. The internet service is excellent and I could do much work faster.  Wish the handy could have free calls to Malaysia and India Would like to stay again on my next trip .

Overall experience is good.  There is only one problem that I encounter.  The noise from closing doors and corridors have kept me awake a few times at night.  Would be great if rooms have better noise insulation.

My brief stay in Singapore was amazing, in part due to the excellent location and facilities at Hotel G. The staff were extremely helpful and friendly, and were able to help with all of my questions and requests. The Handy phone was brilliant, allowing me to explore the beautiful city with the internet at my fingertips! The hotel was within walking distance of multiple MRT stations, and I was able to get onto any line within minutes. I would definitely stay at Hotel G again and recommend it to anyone who visits Singapore!

The room is so small but I think it is moslty the condition in Singapore new small hotel nowadays. Very small and I have a one big luggage and one medium so it hard to mobe for 2 person with 2 luggages. But it's nice because they provide a mobile phone we can use and take outside and a dispenser in every floor so we don't need to buy water anymore .

My wife and I came to Singapore as I was having a presentation to my client from US. The presentation was at The Intercontinental at Middle Road. We search thru Agoda for hotels around Middle Road and found Hotel G suits our budget. Although the room was compact but it was practical, clean, hygienic and full of purpose. We would definitely recommend to friends. We did not try the food at the hotel though becos we are not sure of the halal status. Overall it was a pleasant stay and we really enjoyed it and will definitely come again to stay in a bigger room. One drawback is there's no halal restaurants in the vicinity of the hotel or maybe there are but we didn't know...

Friendly, clean and a little funky, Hotel G was the perfect place to stay for a few days. The hotel is great value for money.  It's only a short walk to various MRT stations, the gateway to many attractions such as the shopping mecca of Orchard Rd, downtown and Gardens by the Bay.

A very nice hotel  The staff is very polite and helpful good dining facilities  Very good rooms and beds Handy phone facilities to use also outside of the hotel for free (free phonecalls free internet access)

review_title: Great location, lovely staff, tiny rooms
review_text: If size isn't a problem for you the Hotel G is great. A boutique hotel in a very central location. Very small room, no room service but great restaurants downstairs. We walked everywhere from the hotel - Bugis, Raffles, Orchard, Haji Lane. All close proximity. Room was quiet so we slept well. We struggled to fit our luggage without almost tripping over it all the time though.

review_title: 1 WEEK IN HOTEL G - Setting the standard for boutique hotels!
review_text: CENTRAL, FRIENDLY HELPFULL STAFF, MODERN, CLEAN AND BEDS SO COMFORTABLE THAT YOU DON'T WANT TO WAKE UP.  I just wanted to list the main bullet points above that make this hotel so great for the people like me who don't usually have time to waste reading long reviews. So if this meets your budget, then just book here and you won't be disappointed, or if you are still not convinced, please continue reading below. _______________________________________________________________________  WHO SHOULD STAY: I recommend this hotel for singles and couples 20 - 40 years old, it's classy with a fresh modern vibe and inviting social areas to meet people.  RECEPTION: Bella at reception who has been working at Hotel G since it opened is great and always willing to go the extra mile for the

Hotel and its room are alright and clean too with few eateries around the area. Metro station is +10 mins away, which is slightly far for the very hot weather. Nevertheless will recommendation to friends.

Hotel, is in a very good central location. The restaurant is excellent with very good selection of wines. Perfect for a solo traveler as my room was a bit small. Check in and out perfect staff very helpful.

Staffs are very friendly and took their time to explain the hotel's rules and regulations and ensure that we understand. Room is very clean and cosy and definitely sets the mood for couples. The lights, room furnishing and all was really awesome. Will definitely return again!

The queues for check in/out were long (only 2 were mending the counter) so we had to wait quite a while before 1-2 more staff came out. Alexander was friendly and helpful - he made our interactions pleasant :) the other staff could be more friendly/cheerful!   We loved the gym (it'd be even better if floor mats were provided) & the location of the hotel - just 10-15minutes walk to the malls in Bugis + lots of good food. The hotel breakfast was great and worth the $$ ;)  We stayed in the Great King (still considered quite small but it was very cosy) & the basin in our room kept choking up whenever we turn on the tap. The hotel provided free wifi & a mobile phone in the room with internet + mobile tethering!   We'll definitely be back :D

The moment the taxi driver dropped me off at the hotel. The staff were very welcoming and warm, showed me to my room. Room was just perfect for the price, location was right in the heart of Singapore. Would Definitely visit again

Booked this hotel through a friend's recommendation and I loved it! Location is good as it is near mrt stations, shopping district and food! Great service, hotel room was nice as well. Would totally stay at hotel g again :D

review_title: Great option, but we need shelves!
review_text: Very nice stay. The room is small but OK. Very nice and comfortable. However there is no place to organize our things. We had to leave everything in the suitcases because there was no place to put them. A couple of shelves would be a quyite simple solution to make your guests life much esaier.

Great location. Very friendly and professional staff. They were very helpful with my late check out. Rooms are very small but I think this is the trade off betwen centrl location and size of the appartments.

Only issue was post checkout.  No where to shower before having to catch a 13hr flight after a day in meetings.  Otherwise it was a nice hotel and well priced.  Breakfast was expensive for what it was. I would still go again.

for a short stay a good proper hotel  rooms are small but good compact designed  no separate entrance - you have to go through restaurant ground floor  top room wifi a bit slow - staff are quite friendly

I chose this property as it was close to SMU where my son studies. The check in area , though small, was very effecient and the rom, again, though small, had all the amenities required. The F&B outlets - Gennett and 25 Degree were excellent and the staff treated me as a friend by the tme i finished my 9 day stay. Overall a very good hotel.

a bit far from Bugis MRT to G hotel, and reach cant find the lobby. the room is small but well equipped. room doesn't provide electric kettle,so if want make tea need to walk out to take. and that day i stay cant get the hot water. still want to improve..

I didn't know it was BIG hotel before until my partner and I reached the location. I'm not gonna lie, I'm we're loving this concept a lot better! I like how they incorporate the woods and blacks and also the food area, classy!

near many mrt station, near many restaurant, near many convenient store, really love the location and very friendly staff and good facilities. my suggestion is for the tv channel, i think will be really great if its include channel for kids/toddler because lots of people bring kids/toddler in this hotel

review_title: Cute quirky rooms - clean - Comfy and great location.
review_text: We arrived at about 7am after a long flight from London- we were able to check in easily & use the bathroom to change clothes etc. Make sure your taxi/uber go up the ramp to take you to reception level if you have big/heavy bags...  We stayed grabbed a drink at the 24 hr eatery right next door - in attempt to stay awake and push through jet lag...  we went out and explored (on foot) Chinatown, little India, the shops local as I left my camera battery charger at home... Buddha tooth relic temple and came back to check in around 3.. to change and then headed out again to visit raffles (under renovation until 2018)  We then spent the evening at the marina bay/ supertrees show and gave in at 1am to  The most comfy bed- we were going to get up early but slept in-   Shower was lovely-

Cleanliness - could be improved especially on bed linen. Spacious - the room and toilet quite small and the toilet door is without lock. Security - quite satisfied with the security system in placed..

Friendly n helpful staff.  Nice setup though Reception area abit small.  Cozy room, nice ambience.  Can increase the bkfast spread & less salt in some dishes.  Location convenient with many eateries around, near shopping area.

really clean, friendly and good location. rooms are very small but well designed. Comfortable bed. The entrance is a bit hidden (you have to enter through the restaurant on the ground floor. Room comes with Wifi hotspot that you can carry around the city.

review_title: Modern and cozy space to stay
review_text: The room design is youth and modern. And cozy, especially a nice bed and pillows for good night sleeping. Location is great and easy access to shops, restaurants, transportation. Only if they can provide more hanger in room, it would be perfect.

Very good location. The hotel is surrounded by malls and market, mrt. Very helpful and friendly staff. The room was cozy although it is quite small. It would be better if the room is equipped with a small fridge.

Great Location nearby with city, mall, and easy to access. The room is clean, good design, and have free water drink (hot & ice). But for room size is very small and for the facillities just standard not beyond my expectation. I trust G hotel can improve for future, ^^

I stayed here during a business trip and was very happy with the hotel. It is close to multiple MRT stations, the rooms are small but functional, there is free Wifi and the staff was very friendly. They even provide free mobile phones for guests to use during their stay.

Great property. Friendly and helpful staff. Rates are good. Staff looks less experienced and needs to be more hands on.  There are some challenges with regards to bathroom size. Got upgraded easily. Restaurant has only continental spread. It is good to keep few Indian items so that breakfast experience can be better.  Overall very impressed with the stay at Hotel G.

Very close to MRT and many attractions, including National Museum of Singapore, Bugis Junction, etc. Price is quite valuable especially if it is booked in advanced, such as via Hotels.com and other hotel booking website.

Serves are almost perfect. But you have to tell the customers what you don't have (e.g.planing), that's what you have to tell customers you have to bring this, you have to bring that. Because some customers are really careless.

have booked 2 nights stay at Hotel G for my 4 days trip at Singapore The hotel design was really lovely especially there is a dream catcher inside the room The location of the hotel is also very convenient with a walkable distance to nearby attraction

The room is a little bit to small. The faucet located outside the restroom cause the floor to be wet. However, the television opens itself is really cool. It looks like it's saying welcome back to me.

Location is good. Few minutes walk to MRT station or shopping malls. The room is clean and I can bring out hotel's mobile phone, excellent. However, the room is quite small and no refrigerator provided.

Staycation for 2 night in Hotel G. Relatively new hotel, located centrally in singapore. Catch a bus to town, Bugis and be there in 15mins!  Hotel is clean and nicely decorated. Rooms are small for families but sufficient for a couple Travelling about most of the time.

Overall, Hotel G was very good hotel, clean and good location. But Breakfast was too simple and felt not worth to SGD15++. And want more Wi-fi speed.  Even cheaper hotel secure over 10Mbps but HOTEL G's speed was less than 5Mbps.

Nice room and great location. Very close to mrt station (Bras Basah) and bus stop (147 to Clarke Quay), walking distance to bugis+, bugis junction and downtown line (Rochor station). Highly recommended!

Nice décor but very small room, cant turn around when taking bath. Water is not warm enough sometimes. The floor is very cool. The reception counter is at 2nd floor...(hmmm...) Hotel location near to shopping mall, 10 mins walk to MRT station.

review_title: Comfortable hotel close to the downtown
review_text: Comfortable and clean hotel at 10 min walking from Bugis MRT  and 30 minutes walking from the Esplanade theatre. The room was clean and well equipped. It was unfortunately quite small and the both wc and shower were within the same glass cabinet (no shower box or curtain). Breakfast is various and good quality, recommended. Besides, the hotel has 2 restaurants for lunch and dinner and a nice bar. The bar itself is the hotel entrance, which is a bit confusing on the first arrival but very nice after understanding where to go. The Staff is helpful and friendly. The  hotel has a very good quality/cost balance

Generally a good experience - small but cozy rooms, good service, location, etc. Needs to improve on cleanliness of shower/bathroom. Also the way shower is built feels a little bit cheap for a 4 star hotel (choice of tiles, shower curtain).

All the staff in your hotel are excellent and kind. But there is no comb in rooms,and 0711's dressing botton is broken. Breakfast is very delicious,hope breakfast is provided to every rooms( I only enjoyed once). Staffs can speak good Chinese ， it's really helpful for us. I don't know what to say XD. Just excellent excellent excellent excellent excellent excellent excellent  excellent excellent excellent excellent excellent excellent excellent

Hotel is clean and modern. Provides in room slippers, toiletries and towels were changed daily.  For a hotel as a base where you can get ready, shower, sleep for a good price is a fairly easy location with friendly staff it is worth every penny.  A little bit of noise amd reception a bit small so got a little crowded but service at reception was fast.  Taxi drivers were a little confused to find the drop off in the parking but once you know it yourself you can easily direct them. Stopping on the side of the road is not allowed and they could get fined.  Breakfast is not worth it. Layout of the buffet is confused. Waffles and pancakes not hot and egg station they don't lnow how to cook eggs. I tried fried and poached eggs. Both were cold and not properly cooked so I had to waste

I dont know why.. bur when I first walked in the room, there were some special smell which I am not sure some scent or not. ans the bed was really nice but it was a bit moist every time I work in the room. The closest MRT is Bras Bas. Bugis and Dhauby Ghat is a bit far for walking with carriers.

The room ("Good Room King") was very very tiny, about 13 meter square in size, but definitely comfortable and cozy.  Okey for one-person stay. The bed may be too short for western people.  Location is nice, 5min to MRT DT13 Rochor; and 10 mins to DT14 Bugis 武吉士 廁所設計有些問題 沖完澡水會流到外面。 Considering the budgeted price, I still recommend it.

review_title: Excellent hotel with well thought details
review_text: Really clean, friendly, renovated hotel with all details thought through. They even provide a cell phone with unlimited internet and calls so you don't even need roaming. The rooms are a bit small but nicely decorated and has everything you need.

In General, this is a good design and very new and clean hotel to stay, location still consider okay and Bugis Juction just nearby.  Except the water temperature need to adjust and control to avoid suddenly cool and hot.

the room super super super super small. And can hear the noise from the road and neighbor rooms. the slipper very slippery when there is water on the floor. The only good thing is the hot water really nice when taking shower.

There rooms are very small, but Ok. There is a good french wine bar in the hotel. It is good to have gym in the hotel. Cleanness of the bathroom could be better. There is a water dispenser in the corridor with hit and cold water, so one can have own tea/coffer in the room.

One of the best hotel I've stayed. Nothing more to say.  Would have been better if the room came with a refrigerator and was able to smoke inside the room, but no big deal.  Great access to hot spots like Bugis Street and Bugis Junction.

Cosy, average. Only disappointing thing was that there wasn't a mini fridge in the room itself. We were only given an ice bucket. Had to fetched the ice from the lift lobby which was rlly a hassle to store our drinks. Blankets were quite thin

Over all, it was a good experience to stay for 4 nights. The only thing bothers me was every time we took a bath, the floor will be flooded, and the water almost get into the room area. There was nothing to stop the water before it goes to the drain.

Nice room but quite small and limited space. No fridge in the room. Breakfast taste is okay. Recommend to have more variety of food. Complicated way to get through reception for check-in. (It's on Level 2)

Checked in at 2.15pm. Was informed that room was not ready and it will only be ready between 3 and 4.  I asked about the parking, and was told this  " the first 24 hours is on us, and the rest it will be on you" From 2.30pm onwards, we began to see people who came later than us but yet have their cards to their rooms. Not one but many of them.  Decided to check with another staff at 3pm and I got my room immediately. So make sure u check back again if they say they are looking for a room for you.   During check out, ask about the parking, the staff told me the first 24 hours is $15.  He told me this : I always told them to say correctly to prevent misunderstandings I replied : I did not misunderstood, he clearly told me is "on us". He smiled and brushed it aside.  Room is clean

Rooms are too small to move around. However the quality of breakfast is good.Hotel staff is cooperative and good. Hotel is situated in a good location but entry is not attractive.Room price is ok and value for money if you can adjust in the small room.

Good experienced in the hotel. Love the design of the room. Cleanliness is pretty good. It's convenient as downstairs is a cafe but it's inconvenience also as there's a distance to reach MRT. It worth the price.

Nice room. Excellent breakfast. Nice staff. I spent 5 nights here. Across the hotel there is fortune building, inside the building there are kiliney kopitiam, ya kun toast, bakery. We enjoy the hotel but i think distance beetwen hotel amd mrt is too far. Soon there will be bencoleen mrt which is close with the hotel.

When we visited this hotel it was called BIG Hotel. There was a constant sound of construction during the day. They should have closed the hotel instead of taking bookings during this time. The staff was initially not very pleasant to interact with - probably they were also irritated with the construction sound. Rooms are really small. You could think of it being just a bed-enough room hotel. Though the rooms were need and clean.

Hotel G was a unique boutique hotel. It is well located in the city, has access to transport. Staff are pleasant and helpful, however the city map and directions we received had us going in the wrong direction at first!  The room was small, as was the bathroom, but both were clean and comfortable.

review_title: start up experience in singapore with Hotel G!!
review_text: when you want to go travel the world, The resident is very important If stay in very good place you have very happy in your trip and Of course if stay in bad place you not happy in your trip. The Hotel G Singapore make me feel stay at home all of i need and fill experience in my trip when i out of energy this place can make me quick recovery. So Let's start up experience in this place when you go to Singapore i ensure that you will not be disappointed like me ^^

I've found my hotel at last!! I travel to Singapore fairly regularly and tend to stay somewhere different every time. Not anymore! Hotel G is perfect for my needs. While the rooms are compact, they have ample space for one, and not too cosy for two persons.  The room is modern, contains everything you need, has good wifi, a bar & restaurant downstairs and is handily located for many places of interest.  The staff were professional and friendly and I don't have a negative thing to say about my visit. I will be back.

review_title: lower price with good service and location
review_text: It is very convenient to go to the MRT station to the airport or the other places. It has USB for foreigner to charge their phones. There is also a handy phone which can surf the internet and have free international call. We can get water and ice in the corridor.  When we check in, there is a handsome man can speak Chinese.

A very nice and hipster hotel. Very first good impression and will continue giving a good review. Room is narrow in size but its well compensated with cleanliness and a nice environment. Air con too cold for me but that's just one minor set back. Was sad to leave the room at the end of my trip. PS: my bedroom isn't as nice

Great location near multiple stations, shopping centers and interesting neighborhoods. Trend rooms and great breakfasts. Complimentary mobile was useful but somewhat slow to use. Highly recommend, great stay.

Great experience. The room is very small but perfectly organised and well designed, ideal for short stays. Very clean. The staff was polite and happy to help. The restaurant and bar are have a great vibe. Highly recommended.

Hotel is good, wi55h fast internet and clean and tidy. Location is quite convenient and easy access from MRT. but the only thing is without bidet in the toilet . And not easy to locate the entrance of the hotel..

The location is good because there are many subway stations near the hotel depend on which line you need to go and 25 degree restaurant is great as well. About the room is simple, quite small for family but for couple is ok

Check-in/out counter isn't easy to found out. There is  a dirty spot and a hole on my pillow.Sound insulation equipment isn't good enough that l can hear someone talking outside and cleaner who is working.

The staff was very friendly and the room was a little small but it didn't matter. We satisfied with everything in G Hotel and if we have a chance to come back, we would stay here again and also suggest for our friends to come here.

Good for couple if for family you need more room many food around hotel G  and near mrt and if you like electronic device very near at sinlim  and very important to me i can sleep well in this hotel and not expensive

Stayed a week and had a great time. Snug rooms but very well designed. Everything was brand new. Breakfast was fantastic and changed every day. Staff were nice and courteous. Very convenient location - could walk or take the MRT everywhere.

Love the hipness of the hotel.  Bed was super comfy and room is well designed even if it's small.  Much thought went into ensuring the guests' needs were met.  There was an ice and water dispenser in the hallway and a smart phone with unli data was provided.  We could call home for free and surf / navigate the city with ease.  When the rain poured unexpectedly, the staff loaned us an umbrella for our entire stay.  Will definitely stay here again when we visit next.

2nd time here, standards were consistently good as the first. 1st time here was when Hotel G just took over. Room was abit cramped though, but nontheless was a very good experience and value for the amount spent. Thank you for the efforts!

Tiny room not even space to put your suitcase and amenities are in bad shape, the wall plugs Are loose making it unsafe to plug in your chargers and the shower hose was leaking spraying water all over. Definitely needs better maintenance the place.  Room looked clean but had problems with WiFi initially logged in but next morning the log in screen/ welcome page wouldn't load. Staff was clueless and couldn't assist at all that was a big inconvenience not being able to work online on my laptopp!  The gym quite small but clean.  Overall its ok for a nights or two stay  when you are a tourist and breakfast was ok.   Avoid the next door Burger joint 25C, totally overpriced .

review_title: A regular guest (even when it was Big Hotel before)
review_text: Even though the room is small, I and my boyfriend always stays here because of the bed! Their bed is really of good quality, soft and spacious and their pillows too. Cable channels are always available with no disruption. Their room smells good! Shower room is clean. Even the shampoo n shower gel are of good quality, to think that most hotels have the same smelling shampoo n shower gel. Breakfast food is really good! They have a phone inside the room which I think you can bring with you(I think it is chargeable though) Staff are very friendly, even the housekeeping and maintenance guy. Because there was a time when we stayed there and we cannot find the remote control for the TV and we thought since they changed to Hotel G, it is already a touchscreen whatsoever, ahhahaha! But

G Hotel is recommend by my friend who stay in Singapore.  1.The hotel is near to MRT station, just a 5 min walk will reach the MRT station.  2.The restaurant below the hotel is great, night time is always full. 3.The room is clean & comfortable. Will definitely stay here again when I drop by for business trip.

review_title: It is well decorated, comfortable and clean. It located near MRT station and there are malls nearby. There are many  as
review_text: It is well decorated, comfortablecomfortable and clean. It located near MRT station and there are malls nearby. There are many restaurant as well. There is no hot water in the bathroom on the first day of stay. But it is fixed very soon.

Highly recommend. Only issue was the design of the shower space could use improvement.  Turned the shower head on and it sprayed the toilet paper.  Had to put a towel down as there was no mat.   Staff were helpful and flexible.

review_title: Tiny room, but very good breakfast
review_text: Room was a bit tiny comparing to the pics of agoda, but for short staying (max 2-3 days) its okay. Breakfast was good. After I checked in, a staff came to my room, rang the bell but before I could response, she already opened the door...

review_title: Hotel is good, but rooms are too small
review_text: Rooms are too small, the wash basin is tiny and there is no closet to keep one's clothes. Otherwise, a good option. I understand Singapore is an expensive place and this location is downtown (expensive), but I wish the room a bit more storage space.

Overall excellent stay, comfortable cozy room with friendly staff. Location was good, easy excess to taxi stands and MRT stations. Room was a little small but good enough for a 1 person stay. Only downside- no cupboard.

I keep coming back as I love how clean an well designed this hotel feels.   The only challenge I face is that it's​a little tight for space. I'm a business traveler so I usually take a single room and the space forces me to keep my room tidy. Which I sometimes don't have the time for.  Having said that, the hotel is a 10 to 20 min cab ride from everything important.

Do need to be careful when extending your stay. They deducted from my credit card without showing me the invoice for my first few days of stay before I extended. Not very professional.   Rooms are on the small side, but cosy and clean.

The room was small (about 15 sq. meters) but very nice. The décor was very modern and stylish. The bed was very comfortable and the bathroom was fine for the size of the room. The housekeeping was great. Very clean and a nice touch.

The hotel has never failed us for a quick stay in Singapore. Great price, great location and unique decor.   It is a boutique, however there is a restaurant downstairs for basic breakfast and meals. The surrounding neighbourhood is also filled with food options (not far from Arab street for more options).

The overall experience is good, feel fashion! The room is clean and staffs were friendly, especially house keeper who say "Good Morning" to me everyday till I am depart of 6th day, but the staff at breakfast reception was still not wake up and never smile to clients.....  The room amenities is really fashion, especially handy mobile as well as unlimited ice cube at corridor, even though I didn't use them, but I am impressed by little detail of new hotel gen!   Cheers!

Well located trendy hotel, fantastic wine bar and restaurant at ground floor level with street fronting access. Efficient rooms with funky design. Friendly staff that were very helfpul with check in/out getting taxi etcetera. We very much enjoyed our stay.

Almost everything was ok. There was a door at my room which made a lot of noise during the night (much worse than the a/c). The rest was ok in a small size (like everything in Singapore). The location was in the university place.

review_title: Love Hotel G for a quick stay in Singapore!
review_text: Very cosy and clean hotel! The staff at the reception were nice and helpful. The Ginette restaurant has the most amazing steaks in town.  The rooms are clean and has everything you need for a short stay in Singapore. Would recommend to anyone.

review_title: Excellent location, hotel ambience and super clean
review_text: Only 7 mins walk from Rochor MRT, tiny room but good decoration. Many nearby budget food shop (Chinese, western and south Asian ). Close to all tourist attractions. It would be great if hotel can include breakfast with this price. Overall is perfect for me.

review_title: Not the centre of the city
review_text: A little far from the focal of famous views，but staffs are really friendly and kind.Room is not very big but clean.There were no senerary from our window. What a pity.In short，it was a nice experience

review_title: A perfect small design hotel refuge!
review_text: Our four day stay at Hotel G was part of our 10 year wedding anniversary celebration. This was the perfect little refuge and conveniently situated, a short walk from Bugis MRT station and all the Bugis shops, local stores and food outlets. The National Design Museum and Singapore Art Museum are also nearby. Design surrounds are casual and chic, there is free and consistent wifi throughout the hotel and also in Ginett restaurant, with a casual workable area off the bar at street level.  Hotel staff were all professionally polite and responsive on any queries, requests or issues. We greatly appreciated that the hotel kindly upgraded us for our anniversary from a Good King to a Great King room, with an earlier check-in time to accommodate our morning flight arrival, and a late

Conveniently located, 5 min walk from Bugis MRT. Adequate sized room which is beautiful, clean and quiet. Great range of toiletries (better quality than the normal hotel ones - they smell great!). Cant boil water in the room but there is a water dispenser outside on each floor I believe (hot and cold) and also an ice cube dispenser. A flask is provided in the room. No issues with checking in and out. Two great restaurants downstairs and many more around the hotel.  Will definitely come back !

It was a nice stay  though the room was small.Excellent and helpful staff. Enough. Enough enough  Eeeeerrrrrrrrrrrrrrffffffffgggggggggggghhjjjkkklll  A nice hotel really but the room was small. The service was excellent and the staff  polite and efficient.

Superb 👍🏼👍🏼For couples ..i wasnt expecting much but it was super comfy and super clean and everything we liked about this hotel..tge staff were very friendly...would recommend this hotel if u are travelling alone or if you are couples..its too cute

Very clean and new love the decoration and facility good price . Good location for travel and food to  all good .Will be back Agian for sure มาจากจากประเทศไทย โรงแรมดีมากสะอาด ใหม่ ราคาไม่แพง มีดีไซน์ สิ่งอำนวยความสะดวกครบ อินเตอร์เน็ตดีมากๆ ห้องสะอาดดูดี เตียงนอนสบาย พนักงานน่ารักมาก

My plane was delayed so I had a late check in. They upgraded me to a king bed. The hotel was very clean and tidy. The rooms are small but this wasn't an issue for me as I only stayed one night. I had a restful night's sleep. The staff were very helpful. Thank you!

review_title: Nurhana, the Receptionist, Spoiled an Otherwise Good Stay
review_text: Nurhana, your face combined with your answer/tone to me shows full dissatisfaction of helping me when I asked you to speak with the uber driver using my phone. I expected full well that the uber driver may not be able to find the exact place (just outside the reception) where I wanted to get picked up. The uber map shows the pick-up in front of the restaurant at ground level. I did not want to get picked-up there since I had luggage with me. Since I gave you the phone, I could very much feel your unwillingness to help me out through a combination of your disgusted facial expressions, cold tone, and wanting to hand back the phone to me as soon as possible. You were behind the reception desk at Hotel G last June 12, 2017 (Monday) at 10:00AM. Congratulations, sadly to Hotel G, that

It was nice experience fromthis hotel. The price is affordable and the bar under the hotel was also nice. Ginett Singapore (the name of the bar) provided nice mojito and other cocktails also. I fully enjoyed

Small room but smartly designed. Really like the METIS products provided. The mobile phone is really handy and save me from roaming charges. Location is pretty convenient but may need to walk a distance to the nearest mrt station. Breakfast has limited selection.

Great location with many restaurant around the hotel. You can find 24hrs Indian food just below the hotel. Only 5 mins walking to an Indian and Chinese temple and another 5 mins to Bugis Street and Bugis Junction. Breakfast was tasty, I love the pumpkin soup! Entrance by car was a bit tricky to find, you need to enter the parking lot to level 2. But There's an entrance on the street level, between Ginett and 25 degrees burger. Oh, they didn't provide fridge and electric kettle in the room. You can find water and ice dispenser near the elevator.

review_title: Will always be my number 1 choice
review_text: Cheap yet with class. Near a lot of places, always convenient. I hope there is a loyalty program because I will always choose to stay here. I probably would go back again and again to singapore just because of this hotel.

The location is quite far from Bugis MRT, the next morning we just found out from the staff that it's more near to the Rochor MRT. The hotel staff is mostly friendly but 1 lady staff on the breakfast place is really arrogant and not even give a proper welcome greetings/smile. The room was small & compact but still ok. The internet connection is also good. However if you could improve the variety of tv channel will be nice. The hotel only have 1 channel for kids. We actually got a room with a little broken shower head & power switch but overall it's still a nice experience staying at the hotel.

I stayed your hotel very comfortably. But I want to point out only one story. When I checked out, staff(man)  said that I already paid all amount when I checked in. But, when I checked in, I didn't show my credit card to your staff. Maybe my all amount will be automatically charged ? If yes, whan I checked in your staff should have let me know about this situation. Only this point. Thanks.

Overall is good but most of the uber driver can't reach the pickup location which is at level 2. please do something to let them easier to find. 2nd, during the 2nd day stay your cleaner doesn't give us a new body wash and shampoo, i need to request myself.

Really loved my stay here! I wish i could stay longer.  The reception area looks soo nice and rad. I only regret not being able to get my breakfast or meals in their resto. maybe next time. I'd also like to suggest they put in Movies to watch in their TV.  Last time they had this feature and i appreciated it a lot.

Everything was great except the room looks bigger in your photos.  It gets a bit cramped with nowhere to put luggage. Even a luggage rack would have been helpful.  We travelled for 5 weeks in Vietnam and Cambodia and your room was the smallest.  Apart from this we enjoyed our stay with you.

Great location near Bugis. A little confusing to get to reception desk at first but smooth check-in process. Tiny but cozy room with comfy bed. No minibar but ice/ hot water right outside at corridor. Stayed at this place when it was BIG hotel so the current TV was a little disappointing (no more free movies-on-demand and limited channels) Found hair in the towels but nothing too bad, overall still pretty clean.
